These are the people of the province who came up from the captivity of the exiles whom Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon had taken captive (they returned to Jerusalem and Judah, each to his own town,	Aba ni bo bantu bo mu gihugu cacu bādūze bava mu kinyago mu bo Nebukadineza umwami w’i Babuloni yajanye ar’ inyagano, bakagaruka i Yerusalemu n’i Buyuda, umuntu wese agasubira mu gisagara c’i wabo;

Umuherezi abaye mukuru muri bagenzi biwe, yasutswe amavuta mu mutwe yo kumurobanura, akaba yashikirijwe ibango ngo yambare ya myambaro, ntaz’ ahamburure umushatsi wiwe, canke ngo yitantamurirekw impuzu ziwe agandaye;
For Christ also suffered once for sins, the righteous for the unrighteous, to bring you to God. He was put to death in the body but made alive in the Spirit.	Kuko na Kristo yababajwe rimwe ahōrwa ivyaha, umugororotsi yababarijwe abagabitanya, kugira ngw adushikirize Imana; yishwe umubiri, ariko yahinduwe muzima mu buryo bg’impwemu:
“ ‘When any of the Israelites or any foreigner residing in Israel separate themselves from me and set up idols in their hearts and put a wicked stumbling block before their faces and then go to a prophet to inquire of me, I the Lord will answer them myself.	Kuk’ umuntu wese wo mu nzu ya Isirayeli, canke wo mu banyamahanga aba muri bo, yitandukanya nanje, agakimagiza ibigirwamana vyiwe mu mutima, agashira imbere yiwe igitsitaza kimutsinda mu bigabitanyo vyiwe, maz’ akaza k’ūvugishwa nanje ngw amunsigurize; jewe Uhoraho nzomwiyishurira ubganje:
You must not live according to the customs of the nations I am going to drive out before you. Because they did all these things, I abhorred them.	Ntimuze mugendere mu migenzo y’ihanga ngira nze nirukane imbere yanyu: kukw ivyo vyose ari vyo bākora, bigatuma mbanka urunuka.
Therefore, hear what the Lord has planned against Edom, what he has purposed against those who live in Teman: The young of the flock will be dragged away; their pasture will be appalled at their fate.	Nuko rero ni mwumve inama Uhoraho yarunduye kuri Edomu, n’imigabo yagabiye y’ivyo azogirira ababa i Temani: ati N’ukuri bazobakwega nk’imyagazi yo mu mukuku; n’ukuri azobagesezanya n’aho baba.
For he says, “In the time of my favor I heard you, and in the day of salvation I helped you.” I tell you, now is the time of God’s favor, now is the day of salvation.	kuko yavuze, iti Mu gihe co kwemererwamwo ndakwumvise, No ku musi wo gukirizwako ndagutabaye. Ehe none n’igihe co kwemererwamwo, ehe none n’umusi wo gukirizwako.

Now Ahaziah had fallen through the lattice of his upper room in Samaria and injured himself. So he sent messengers, saying to them, “Go and consult Baal-Zebub, the god of Ekron, to see if I will recover from this injury.”	Umusi ur’ izina, Ahaziya akoroka aciye mu nshingo z’idirisha ryo mu cumba ciwe co hejuru, ah’ aba i Samariya, yenderamwo kurwara. Give generously to them and do so without a grudging heart; then because of this the Lord your God will bless you in all your work and in everything you put your hand to. I love foreign gods, and I must go after them.’	Enda ni wirinde, ibirenge vyawe ntibibure inkweto, n’imihogo yawe ntiyume; ariko waravuze, ut’ Oyaye, n’unyiziguruke; kuko jewe ngomwe imana z’inyamahanga, nkaba ari zo nkurikiye.

I plead with you, brothers and sisters, become like me, for I became like you. You did me no wrong.	Ndabinginze, bene Data, mumere nkanje, kuko nanje mmeze nkamwe. Nta nabi mwangiriye,

It eats away parts of his skin; death’s firstborn devours his limbs.	Ingingo z’umubiri wiwe zizotsontsomerwa, Mber’ imfura y’urupfu izozitsontsomera.

They do not turn to the Most High; they are like a faulty bow. Their leaders will fall by the sword because of their insolent words. For this they will be ridiculed in the land of Egypt. for when you are eating, some of you go ahead with your own private suppers. As a result, one person remains hungry and another gets drunk.	Kuko mu kurya, umuntu wese yisangiza ivyiwe agacura abandi: maz’ umwe agasonza, uwundi akaborerwa.

Simon Peter asked him, “Lord, where are you going?” Jesus replied, “Where I am going, you cannot follow now, but you will follow later.”	Simoni Petero aramubaza, ati Mugenzi, uja hehe? Yesu aramwishura, at’ Aho nja ntushobora kunkurikira ubu, arik’ uzonkurikira hanyuma.

Their tongue is a deadly arrow; it speaks deceitfully. With their mouths they all speak cordially to their neighbors, but in their hearts they set traps for them. Ariko Dawidi arababarira, ati Bagenzi banje, ntimwogenza murtyo ivyo Uhoraho yaduhaye, n’ukuntu yatuzigamye, akagabura mu maboko yacu ico gitero cari caduteye.
No longer will you be called Abram ; your name will be Abraham, for I have made you a father of many nations.	Kandi ntucitwa Aburamu ukundi, arik’ uzokwitwa Aburahamu; kuko nkugize sekuruza w’amahanga menshi.
As far as the gospel is concerned, they are enemies for your sake; but as far as election is concerned, they are loved on account of the patriarchs,	Ku vy’ubutumwa bgiza, n’abansi kubganyu: ariko ku vy’ugutoranya kw’Imana, n’abakundwa kubga ba sekuruza.
Every place where you set your foot will be yours: Your territory will extend from the desert to Lebanon, and from the Euphrates River to the Mediterranean Sea.	Ahantu hose muzokandagiza ibirenge hazoba ahanyu; urugabano rwanyu ruzohēra ku bugaragwa rushike i Lebanoni, ruhēre no kuri rwa ruzi, ari rwo Efurate, rushike ku kiyaga c’i burengerazuba.
David came to Saul and entered his service. Saul liked him very much, and David became one of his armor-bearers.	Nuko Dawidi ashitse kwa Sauli arenguka imbere yiwe; Sauli aramukunda cane, amugira ūmutwaza ibirwanishwa.
Naomi said to Ruth her daughter-in-law, “It will be good for you, my daughter, to go with the women who work for him, because in someone else’s field you might be harmed.”	Nawomi abarira Rusi umukazana wiwe, ati Mukobga wanje, ni vyiza k’ujana n’abigeme bamukorera, boye kugusanga mu murima w’uwundi.
The God of our ancestors raised Jesus from the dead—whom you killed by hanging him on a cross.	Imana ya ba sogokuruza yazuye Yesu, uwo mwebge mwishe mumumanitse ku giti.
The disciples went and woke him, saying, “Lord, save us! We’re going to drown!”	Baraza baramukangura, bati Mugenzi, dukize, turapfuye.
But Abijah grew in strength. He married fourteen wives and had twenty-two sons and sixteen daughters.	Ariko Abiya arushiriza kuba ūhambaye, arongora abamikazi cumi na bane, avyara abana b’abahungu mirongwibiri na babiri n’abakobga cumi na batandatu.
And God said, “Let the land produce living creatures according to their kinds: the livestock, the creatures that move along the ground, and the wild animals, each according to its kind.” And it was so.	Imana iravuga, it’Isi n’izane ibiri n’ubugingo, nk’ukw amoko yavyo ari, vy’ ibitungano n’ivyikwega hasi n’ibikōko vyo mw isi, nk’ukw amoko yavyo ari: biba kuno.
For great is the Lord and most worthy of praise; he is to be feared above all gods.	Kuk’ Uhoraho ahambaye, abereye gushimwa cane: N’uw’ igitinyiro kuruta ibigirwamana vyose.
Peter went with them, and when he arrived he was taken upstairs to the room. All the widows stood around him, crying and showing him the robes and other clothing that Dorcas had made while she was still with them.	Petero arikora, ajana na bo: ashitseyo bamujana muri ya nzu yo hejuru, abapfakazi bose bahagarara i ruhande yiwe barira, berekana amapfundo n’imitamana Doruka yapfunditse akiri muri bo.
He was going down the street near her corner, walking along in the direction of her house	Aca mu nzira hafi y’inkokora y’inzu y’umugore ameze artyo, Anobanga mu nzira ija ku nzu yiwe;
She was taken to King Xerxes in the royal residence in the tenth month, the month of Tebeth, in the seventh year of his reign.	Nuko mu kwezi kw’icumi, ni kwo kwitwa Tebeti, mu mwaka ugira indwi umwami Ahasuwerusi ari ku ngoma, Esiteri ajanwa mu ngoro ku mwami Ahasuwerusi.
Even when I call out or cry for help, he shuts out my prayer.	Mber’ iyo ndamutakambiye ndamutabaza, ugusenga kwanje akwugaranira hanze.
The woman was given the two wings of a great eagle, so that she might fly to the place prepared for her in the wilderness, where she would be taken care of for a time, times and half a time, out of the serpent’s reach.	Umugore ahabga amababa abiri y’inkukuma nini, kugira ngw agurukire mu bugaragwa ahantu hiwe, ah’ agaburirirwa igihe n’ibihe n’igice c’igihe, arindwa ico kiyoka.
I, the Lord , watch over it; I water it continually. I guard it day and night so that no one may harm it.	Jewe Uhoraho, ni jewe ndaruzigama; nzohora ndaruvomera akanya kose: nzoruzigama ku murango no mw ijoro, kugira ngo ntihagire ikirwona.
Why do you discourage the Israelites from crossing over into the land the Lord has given them?	N’iki gitumye murandura imitima y’Abisirayeli, kugira ngo ntibajabuke ngo baje mu gihugu Uhoraho yabahaye?
Make room for us in your hearts. We have wronged no one, we have corrupted no one, we have exploited no one.	Muduhe ikibanza mu mitima yanyu; nta we twagiriye nabi, nta we twononye, nta we twagunze.
Then the Lord said to Moses, “Get up early in the morning and confront Pharaoh as he goes to the river and say to him, ‘This is what the Lord says: Let my people go, so that they may worship me.	Uhoraho abarira Mose, at’ Uz’ uzinduke kwa Farawo mu gaturuturu, uhagarare imbere yiwe; eh’ azoba yīkoze aja ku ruzi; umubarire, ut’ Uhoraho agize ngo Reka abantu biwe bagende, bamusabe.
who says to the watery deep, ‘Be dry, and I will dry up your streams,’	Mbarira idamba, nti Kama, kandi nzokamya inzūzi zikujamwo;
and Heman’s associate Asaph, who served at his right hand: Asaph son of Berekiah, the son of Shimea,	Hāri na Asafu mugenzi we, yahagarara i buryo bgiwe; Asafu uwo, ni we mwene Berekiya, Berekiya wa Shimeya;
and is to splash some of the blood of the sin offering against the side of the altar; the rest of the blood must be drained out at the base of the altar. It is a sin offering.	Yābīre ku maraso y’ico kimazi gitangirwa ivyaha, ayacucagire ku gicaniro ku ruhande rwaco rumwe; ayandi maraso ayamiminurire hasi hambavu y’igicaniro: ico kizoba ar’ ikimazi gitangiwe ivyaha.
Then the cherubim rose upward. These were the living creatures I had seen by the Kebar River.	Maz’ abo bakerubi bādūga intumbgejuru; abo ni bo vya binyabugingo nari naraboneye ku ruzi Kebari.
(Barabbas had been thrown into prison for an insurrection in the city, and for murder.)	Uwo yari yashizwe mw ibohero bamuhōye ukugarariza kwabaye mur’ ico gisagara, bo n’ubgicanyi.
I will send fire on the walls of Gaza that will consume her fortresses.	nuko nzokwanda umuriro uruzitiro rw’i Gaza, utongore ingoro zaho;
Let no yeast be found in your possession in all your land for seven days. Do not let any of the meat you sacrifice on the evening of the first day remain until morning.	Mur’ iyo misi ukw ar’ indwi ntihaze hagire icitwa umwambiro kibabonekamwo, mu gihugu canyu cose; kandi ku kimazi muzotanga ku musi wa mbere ku mugoroba, ntihaze hagire inyama zaco zirāra ngo zishitse mu gitondo.
I will do this because they have forsaken me and worshiped Ashtoreth the goddess of the Sidonians, Chemosh the god of the Moabites, and Molek the god of the Ammonites, and have not walked in obedience to me, nor done what is right in my eyes, nor kept my decrees and laws as David, Solomon’s father, did.	ngw Abitewe n’uko bāmutaye, bakaja gusenga Ashitoreti imanakazi y’Abasidoni, na Kemoshi imana y’Abanyamowabu, na Milikomu imana y’Abamoni; ntibagendere mu nzira ziwe, ngo bakore ivyo abona ko bibereye, bitondere amabgirizwa yiwe n’ivyagezwe vyiwe, nk’uko Dawidi se wa Salomo yagenza.
to them I will give within my temple and its walls a memorial and a name better than sons and daughters; I will give them an everlasting name that will endure forever.	ati Nzozishirira icibutso mu ngoro yanje no mu rugo rwanje, ndazihe n’izina riruta kugira abahungu n’abakobga; nzoziha izina ritazoshira, ritazokūrwaho.
He looked around at them all, and then said to the man, “Stretch out your hand.” He did so, and his hand was completely restored.	Abēraguzamw’ amaso bose, aramubarira, ati Ramvura ukuboko kwawe. Arabigira, ukuboko kwiwe kurakira.
He prowled among the lions, for he was now a strong lion. He learned to tear the prey and he became a man-eater.	Nuko kigendagenda mu zindi ntambge, kiba umugunza w’intambge; yiga guhīga, iromagira n’abantu.
Make a horn at each of the four corners, so that the horns and the altar are of one piece, and overlay the altar with bronze.	Ku nkokora zaco ukw ari zine uz’ ugihe amahembe, ayo mahembe yaco az’ abāzirwe kuri co, abe kimwe na co; uheze ucomekekw imiringa.
Esther replied, “My petition and my request is this:	Esiteri aramwishura, at’ Ico nsaba kandi ndondera n’iki:
Jesus gave them this answer: “Very truly I tell you, the Son can do nothing by himself; he can do only what he sees his Father doing, because whatever the Father does the Son also does.	Nuko Yesu asubira kubabgira, ati N’ukuri, n’ukuri ndababgire: Nta co Umwana ashobora kwigenera, atabonye Se agikora, kukw ivyo Se akora vyose n’Umwana aca abikora kuno.
I always thank my God as I remember you in my prayers,	Nshima Imana yanje ubudasība, nguhoza mu kanwa uko nsenze,
So the Danites went their way, and Micah, seeing that they were too strong for him, turned around and went back home.	Nukw Abadani baca bīgīra; maze Mika abonye kw atobashobora, arahindukira asubira i we.
When the ark of the Lord ’s covenant came into the camp, all Israel raised such a great shout that the ground shook.	Nukw iyo sandugu y’isezerano ry’Uhoraho ishitse aho bashagaje, Abisirayeli bose baca biha akamo icarimwe, isi irāsīra.
“I have revealed you to those whom you gave me out of the world. They were yours; you gave them to me and they have obeyed your word.	Nahishuriye izina ryawe abantu wampaye mu b’isi; bar’ abawe, urabampa, kandi bitondeye ijambo ryawe.
There is, however, some good in you, for you have rid the land of the Asherah poles and have set your heart on seeking God.”	Mugabo harih’ ivyiza bimwe bikubonekako, kuko wakūye mu gihugu inkingi zāshingiwe Ashera, ugashira umutima ku kurondera Imana.
‘Why have we fasted,’ they say, ‘and you have not seen it? Why have we humbled ourselves, and you have not noticed?’ “Yet on the day of your fasting, you do as you please and exploit all your workers.	Barabaza, bati Mbeg’ igituma twisonzesha, nturuhe ubibona, ni ku ki? Igituma twibabaza, nawe ukavyirengagiza, ni ku ki? Erega mbiterwa n’uko ku musi wanyu wo kwisonzesha mupfa kwikorera ivyanyu, mugakoresha nabi abakozi banyu bose.
They made the table of acacia wood—two cubits long, a cubit wide and a cubit and a half high.	Maz’ abāza ameza mu giti citwa umushita: uburebure bgayo bg’umurambararo bgar’ amatambge abiri y’ukuboko uciriye mu nkokora, ubgaguke bgayo bgar’ itambge rimwe, uburebure bg’ igihagararo bgar’ itambge rimwe n’igihimba.
He then brought me to the outer court and led me around to its four corners, and I saw in each corner another court.	Maz’ anjana mu ntangaro, angenduza imfuruka zine z’urugo; nsanga izo mfuruka zose z’urugo zubatswek’ utunyubakwa.
Then I saw three impure spirits that looked like frogs; they came out of the mouth of the dragon, out of the mouth of the beast and out of the mouth of the false prophet.	Kandi mbona mu kanwa ka ca gisato no mu kanwa ka ca gikōko no mu kanwa ka wa muvugishwa w’ibinyoma, havamw’ impwemu zitatu zihumanya, zisa n’ibikere:
You are witnesses, and so is God, of how holy, righteous and blameless we were among you who believed.	Mwebge mur’ ivyabona hamwe n’Imana vy’ingene twamerera mwebge abizera, tur’ abera, tugororoka, tutarik’ umugayo:
The angel swung his sickle on the earth, gathered its grapes and threw them into the great winepress of God’s wrath.	Umumarayika arekurira umuhoro wiwe mw isi, aca inzabibu z’umuzabibu w’isi, aziterera mu bgato bunini bg’ukuraka kw’Imana.
As a result, many of them believed, as did also a number of prominent Greek women and many Greek men.	Nuko benshi muri bo barizera, n’abagore b’icubahiro b’Abagirikikazi n’abagabo batari bake.
for, “Who has known the mind of the Lord so as to instruct him?” But we have the mind of Christ.	Ni nde yigeze kumenya ivyiyumviro vy’Uhoraho ngo yigishe Uhoraho? Ariko twebge dufise ivyiyumviro vya Kristo.
The Lord stripped away the defenses of Judah, and you looked in that day to the weapons in the Palace of the Forest.	Agukūrakw igitwikirizo, yewe Yuda, ng’ uve i marwi; maz’ uwo musi ujarajara ibirwanishwa vyo mu nzu yitwa iy’ Ikibira.
This is how we know what love is: Jesus Christ laid down his life for us. And we ought to lay down our lives for our brothers and sisters.	Iki ni co kitumenyesha urukundo, n’uk’ uwo yatanze ubugingo bgiwe kubgacu: natwe dukwiye gutanga ubugingo bgacu kubga bene Data.
But if the Lord brings about something totally new, and the earth opens its mouth and swallows them, with everything that belongs to them, and they go down alive into the realm of the dead, then you will know that these men have treated the Lord with contempt.”	Arik’ Uhoraho ni yakora ikintu c’inzeduka, isi ikāsama, ikabamirana n’ivyabo vyose, bakamanuka i kuzimu bakibona, muca mumenya yukw aba bantu bakengereye Uhoraho.
The Lord said to me, “You have seen correctly, for I am watching to see that my word is fulfilled.”	Maz’ Uhoraho aranyishura, ati Witegereje neza: kuko ndinda ijambo ryanje kugira ngo ndarishitse.
You must keep this ordinance at the appointed time year after year.	Ni co gituma mukwiye kwama mwitondera iryo bgirizwa mu gihe caryo, uk’ umwaka utashe.
Brothers and sisters, if I am still preaching circumcision, why am I still being persecuted? In that case the offense of the cross has been abolished.	Ariko jewe, bene Data, namba nkibarira abantu gukebga, n’iki gituma ngihamwa? Igitsitaza c’umusaraba kiba carahindutse ubusa.
Then the glory of the Lord rose from above the cherubim and moved to the threshold of the temple. The cloud filled the temple, and the court was full of the radiance of the glory of the Lord .	Nuk’ ubgiza bg’Uhoraho buradūga buva ku mukerubi, buhagarara imbere y’ irebe ry’ingoro; maz’ ingoro yuzura igipfungu, inyubakwa na yo yuzura ugukayangana kw’ubgiza bg’Uhoraho.
For whoever wants to save their life will lose it, but whoever loses their life for me and for the gospel will save it.	kuk’ ūgomba gukiza ubugingo bgiwe azobubura, arik’ ūzoheba ubugingo bgiwe kubganje no kubg’ ubutumwa bgiza, azobukiza.
Then Judah said, “Let her keep what she has, or we will become a laughingstock. After all, I did send her this young goat, but you didn’t find her.”	Yuda aramwishura, ati N’abitware! Enda tureke kwiyambika ibara: rāba namurungikiye ya suguru, ntiwamubona.
who comforts us in all our troubles, so that we can comfort those in any trouble with the comfort we ourselves receive from God.	itwirura mu marushwa yacu yose, kugira ngo natwe tubone uko twirura imibabaro abari mu marushwa yose, tuyibiruza uko natwe twiruwe n’Imana.
I will give you every place where you set your foot, as I promised Moses.	Ahantu hose muzokandagiza ibirenge ndahabahaye, nk’uko nabariye Mose.
Then they will take up a lament concerning you and say to you: “ ‘How you are destroyed, city of renown, peopled by men of the sea! You were a power on the seas, you and your citizens; you put your terror on all who lived there.	Kandi bazocura intimba bakuririra, bakubgire, bat’ Ewe kuntu ugeseye, wewe wahora ubābgamwo n’abagenda uruja n’uruza mu kiyaga, war’ igisagara rurangiranwa, kandi war’ agakomeye ku kiyaga, mwe n’abākubamwo, abāhora bateye ubgoba ababa ku kiyaga nyene!
Do you not know, brothers and sisters—for I am speaking to those who know the law—that the law has authority over someone only as long as that person lives?	Canke ga bene Data, ntimuzi yukw ivyagezwe biganza umuntu akiriho? mbgiye abazi ivyagezwe.
When Abram heard that his relative had been taken captive, he called out the 318 trained men born in his household and went in pursuit as far as Dan.	Aburamu yumvise yuk’ uw’ i wabo yafashwe mpiri, ajana abanyarugo biwe bize kurwana, bāvukiye i we, amajana atatu n’icumi n’umunani, barabakurikira, babahambiriza i Dani.
The foot of neither man nor beast will pass through it; no one will live there for forty years.	Nta kirenge c’umuntu kizoba kikihahita, cank’ urwara rw’igitungwa, kandi hazomara imyaka mirongwine ata kikihaba.
If Satan is divided against himself, how can his kingdom stand? I say this because you claim that I drive out demons by Beelzebul.	Na Satani, namba yitandukanije ubgiwe, ubgami bgiwe buzorama bute? Kuko muvuga yuko Beyezebuli ari we anshoboza gusenda abadayimoni.
He shall slaughter the lamb for the guilt offering and take some of its blood and put it on the lobe of the right ear of the one to be cleansed, on the thumb of their right hand and on the big toe of their right foot.	Akerere uwo mwana w’intama w’ ikimazi c’impongano, aheze yābīre ku maraso y’ico kimazi, ayakoze ku gutwi kw’i buryo kw’uyo arikw arahumanurwa, ahahera hejuru, no ku rukumu rwiwe rw’i buryo, no kw ino ryiwe rinini ry’i buryo.
Do not let Hezekiah persuade you to trust in the Lord when he says, ‘The Lord will surely deliver us; this city will not be given into the hand of the king of Assyria.’	Ngo Kandi Hezekiya ntabizigize Uhoraho, ababarira, ng’ Uhoraho ntazobura kubakiza, kandi ng’ Uyu murwa ntuzotangwa ng’ ukorokere mu maboko y’umwami w’i Ashuri.
When one of those at the table with him heard this, he said to Jesus, “Blessed is the one who will eat at the feast in the kingdom of God.”	Maz’ umwe mu bicaranye na we avyumvise, aramubgira, ati Hahirwa ūzorīra mu bgami bg’Imana.
I made gardens and parks and planted all kinds of fruit trees in them.	nironkeye indimiro n’amatongo, nteramw’ ibiti vyama vy’imyuga myinshi:
Early the next morning Jacob took the stone he had placed under his head and set it up as a pillar and poured oil on top of it.	Yakobo azinduka kare mu gatondo, yābīra rya buye yiseguye, ararishinga ngo ribe inkingi, arisukakw amavuta ya elayo.
In every town in Judah he built high places to burn sacrifices to other gods and aroused the anger of the Lord , the God of his ancestors.	No mu gisagara cose c’i Buyuda atabamw’ ibitabo vy’aho kwosereza imibavu izindi mana, atera umwikomo Uhoraho Imana ya ba sekuruza.
In the first year of Belshazzar king of Babylon, Daniel had a dream, and visions passed through his mind as he was lying in bed. He wrote down the substance of his dream.	Mu mwaka wa mbere Belushaza umwami w’i Babuloni ari ku ngoma, Daniyeli yarose inzozi, abona ivyo yerekewe mu mutwe, ari ku buriri bgiwe. Maze yandika ivyo yarose, arobanuramw’ ingingo zavyo zikomeye.
The Lord said to Moses,	Uhoraho abarira Mose,
You will sow much seed in the field but you will harvest little, because locusts will devour it.	Muzosohora imbuto nyinshi, mwimbure bike, kukw inzige zizobirya.
Are you so foolish? After beginning by means of the Spirit, are you now trying to finish by means of the flesh?	Mbega mwakabaye mur’ ibijuju murtyo? Mwatanguye mu vya Mpwemu, mbega none musozereye mu vy’umubiri?
saying to them, “Go to the village ahead of you, and just as you enter it, you will find a colt tied there, which no one has ever ridden. Untie it and bring it here.	arababarira, ati Muje mur’ iriya mihana ir’ imbere yanyu; ni mwayishikamwo, muca mubona inyana y’indogoba iziritse, ata muntu yigeze kuyigenderako: muyiziture muyizane.

and the glory of the Lord settled on Mount Sinai. For six days the cloud covered the mountain, and on the seventh day the Lord called to Moses from within the cloud.	Ubgiza bg’Uhoraho buguma kur’ uwo musozi Sinayi, ico gipfungu kiwutwīkīra imisi itandatu; ku musi ugira indwi, Uhoraho ahamagara Mose n’ijwi rirenga ari mur’ ico gicu c’igipfungu.
“Woe to the shepherds who are destroying and scattering the sheep of my pasture!” declares the Lord .	Bazobona ibara, abungere batikiza intama zo mu canya canje, bakazishwiragiza! ni jewe Uhoraho mbivuze.
Therefore I will send you into exile beyond Damascus,” says the Lord , whose name is God Almighty.	Ni co kizotuma mbambukanisha mur’ inyagano hirya y’i Damasiko, ni jewe Uhoraho mbivuze, kand’ izina ryanje nd’ Imana Nyen’ ingabo.
This is what the Lord says to me: “Go, post a lookout and have him report what he sees.	Kuk’ ukw ari k’Umwami Imana ambariye: ati Genda ushireh’ umushibamyi, az’ avuge ico yabonye.
Among the Levites: Jozabad, Shimei, Kelaiah (that is, Kelita), Pethahiah, Judah and Eliezer.	Mu Balewi, ni Yozabadi na Shimeyi na Kelaya (ari we Kelita), na Petahiya na Yuda na Eliyezeri.
You are my strength, I sing praise to you; you, God, are my fortress, my God on whom I can rely.	Ewe nkomezi zanje, ni wewe nzoririmbira ishimwe: Kukw Imana ari yo gihome kirekire kinkīngira, n’Imana mboneramw’ imbabazi.
I looked up, and there before me was a ram with two horns, standing beside the canal, and the horns were long. One of the horns was longer than the other but grew up later.	Nunamuye amaso mbona impfizi y’intama ifise amahembe abiri, ihagaze hakuno y’uruzi: kand’ ayo mahembe ukw ar’ abiri yari maremare, ariko rimwe ryasumba irindi, kand’ irirerire ni ryo ryaheruka kumera.
I will send you rain in its season, and the ground will yield its crops and the trees their fruit.	nuko nanje nzogenda mbarekurira imvura mu bihe vyayo, n’ igihugu kizogenda cimbuka ivyimburo vyaco, n’ibiti vyo mu ndimiro bizokwama bitengengere.
“Have you not heard? Long ago I ordained it. In days of old I planned it; now I have brought it to pass, that you have turned fortified cities into piles of stone.	Mbega ntiwumvise uko nabigenjeje kera, mbigabiye mu bihe vyashize? None narabishikije, kugira ng’ uhonnye ibisagara vyubakiwe inzitiro, ubihindure ibirundo vy’amasakamburira.
To some who were confident of their own righteousness and looked down on everyone else, Jesus told this parable:	Uyu mugani na wo awucira abiyizigira ubgabo ko bagororotse, bagakēngēra abandi bose.
Solomon’s horses were imported from Egypt and from Kue —the royal merchants purchased them from Kue at the current price.	Kand’ amafarasi Salomo yar’ atunze bāyakūra muri Egiputa; abadandaza b’umwami bayagura ar’ amasho: ubusho bgose igiciro cabgo.
For we wanted to come to you—certainly I, Paul, did, again and again—but Satan blocked our way.	kuko twagomba kuza i wanyu, mbere jewe Paulo kubigomba si rimwe ni kabiri kose, Satani akatubuza.
He did what was right in the eyes of the Lord , just as his father David had done.	Akora ivyo Uhoraho abona kw ari vyiza, nk’ ivyo sekuruza Dawidi yakoze vyose.
Listen! Your watchmen lift up their voices; together they shout for joy. When the Lord returns to Zion, they will see it with their own eyes.	Ijwi ry’abashibamyi bawe! Bashize hejuru bavugiriza impundu hamwe; bazovyibonera imbonankubone aho Uhoraho azogaruka i Siyoni.
And so you stayed in Kadesh many days—all the time you spent there.	Nuko mumara igihe kirekire i Kadeshi, nk’uko mubizi.
David answered Ahimelek the priest, “The king sent me on a mission and said to me, ‘No one is to know anything about the mission I am sending you on.’ As for my men, I have told them to meet me at a certain place.	Dawidi yishura Ahimeleki umuherezi, at’ Umwami yantumye ku rubanza, arambarira ngo ntihagire umuntu n’umwe amenya ivy’ urwo rubanza yantumyeko, cank’ ico yangeze. Kand’ imikangara yanje nayirangiye ko tuzohūrira ahanaka.

Your hands were not bound, your feet were not fettered. You fell as one falls before the wicked.” And all the people wept over him again. Nevertheless, I have a few things against you: There are some among you who hold to the teaching of Balaam, who taught Balak to entice the Israelites to sin so that they ate food sacrificed to idols and committed sexual immorality.	Ariko mfise i vyo nkugayako bike, kukw i wanyu uhafise abakomeza inyigisho za Balamu, yigishije Balaki gushira igitsitaza imbere y’Abisirayeli, kugira ngo barye ivyaterekerejwe ibigirwamana, bashakane.
But when the judge died, the people returned to ways even more corrupt than those of their ancestors, following other gods and serving and worshiping them. They refused to give up their evil practices and stubborn ways.	Ariko hanyuma, uwo mucamanza amaze gupfa, bagasubira inyuma, bagakora ibibi birengeye ivya ba sekuruza, bagakurikira izindi mana bakazisaba, bakazūnamira; mu ngeso zabo mbi bakanka kugira n’imwe bata, canke ngo bareke no gukomantaza imitima.
The Lord said to Moses,	Uhoraho abarira Mose,
Then Simon Peter came along behind him and went straight into the tomb. He saw the strips of linen lying there,	Maze Simoni Petero arashika amukurikiye, yinjira mu mva, abona za mpuzu zirambitseho,
Moses and Eleazar the priest accepted from them the gold—all the crafted articles.	Nuko Mose na Eleyazari umuherezi babākīrira ayo mazahabu: yose yar’ utugenegene tw’uducurano.
The astrologers answered the king, “There is no one on earth who can do what the king asks! No king, however great and mighty, has ever asked such a thing of any magician or enchanter or astrologer.	Maz’ Abakaludaya bishura umwami, bati Mwami, nta muntu n’umwe wo kw isi yoshobora kukumenyesha iryo jambo; kukw ata mwami cank’ umuganwa cank’ umutware yigeze gusobanuza umunyamarēba n’umwe cank’ umupfumu cank’ Umukaludaya ben’ iryo jambo.
So on that day Moses swore to me, ‘The land on which your feet have walked will be your inheritance and that of your children forever, because you have followed the Lord my God wholeheartedly.’	Maz’ uwo musi nyene Mose arandahira, ati N’ukuri igihugu wakandagiyemwo kizoba ishamvu yawe n’iy’ abana bawe gushitsa ibihe vyose, kuko wakurikiye Uhoraho Imana yanje muri vyose.
Set apart for the Lord your God every firstborn male of your herds and flocks. Do not put the firstborn of your cows to work, and do not shear the firstborn of your sheep.	Muze murobanurire Uhoraho Imana yanyu uburiza bgose bg’icitwa ishuri buvuka mu masho yanyu no mu mikuku yanyu: ntimuze mugire igikorwa na kimwe mukoresha ic’ uburiza bgo mu masho yanyu, canke ngo mukēmūre ic’ uburiza bgo mu mikuku yanyu.
Now we who have believed enter that rest, just as God has said, “So I declared on oath in my anger, ‘They shall never enter my rest.’ ” And yet his works have been finished since the creation of the world.	Kuko twebge abizeye dushika mur’ ubgo buruhukiro, nk’uko yavuze, iti Nk’uko narahiranye uburake bganje, Nti Ntibazoshika mu buruhukiro bganje: naho yari yarahejeje ibikorwa vyayo, uhereye ku kuremwa kw’ isi.
Evildoers do not understand what is right, but those who seek the Lord understand it fully.	Abantu babi ntibatahura ibiroranye, Arikw abarondera Uhoraho batahura vyose.

“You are not yet fifty years old,” they said to him, “and you have seen Abraham!”	Nuko rer’ Abayuda baramubgira, bat’ Ube utaramara imyaka mirongwitanu, ngo warabonye Aburahamu?
For troubles without number surround me; my sins have overtaken me, and I cannot see. They are more than the hairs of my head, and my heart fails within me. “Your Majesty saw a holy one, a messenger, coming down from heaven and saying, ‘Cut down the tree and destroy it, but leave the stump, bound with iron and bronze, in the grass of the field, while its roots remain in the ground. Let him be drenched with the dew of heaven; let him live with the wild animals, until seven times pass by for him.’	Kandi mwami, nk’uko wabonye umushibamyi kandi yar’ uwera amanuka ava mw ijuru, ati Ni wīcire ico giti ugicagagure, arikw igishitsi ukirekerane n’imizi yaco mu kuzimu, ugihambirize ivyuma n’ imiringa, gisigare mu vyatsi bitoto vyo ku musozi, kize gitondweko n’urume ruva mu kirēre, kirishanye n’ibikōko vyo mw ishamba, gushitsa ibihe ndwi bigikūranirwako:
As for Heman, from his sons: Bukkiah, Mattaniah, Uzziel, Shubael and Jerimoth; Hananiah, Hanani, Eliathah, Giddalti and Romamti-Ezer; Joshbekashah, Mallothi, Hothir and Mahazioth. Whoever leads the upright along an evil path will fall into their own trap, but the blameless will receive a good inheritance.	Umuntu wese azimiza abagororotsi ngo bajane inzira mbi, Na we nyene azogwa mu rwobo rwiwe ubgiwe: Arikw abatunganye bazoragwa ivyiza.

Jeremiah started to leave the city to go to the territory of Benjamin to get his share of the property among the people there.	Yeremiya asokoroka i Yerusalemu ngw aje mu ntāra ya Benyamini, gushikiririzway’ umugabane wiwe hagati mu bantu.
The king contributed from his own possessions for the morning and evening burnt offerings and for the burnt offerings on the Sabbaths, at the New Moons and at the appointed festivals as written in the Law of the Lord .	Umwami agera n’umugabane w’ivyo azotanga ku vyo atunze, ku vy’ ibimazi vyo kwoswa bizotangwa mu gitondo no ku mugoroba, n’ibimazi vyo kwoswa ku masabato, n’ivyo mu mboneko z’ukwezi, n’ivy’ imisi mikuru yashinzwe, nk’uko vyanditswe mu vyagezwe vy’Uhoraho.

I am raising up the Babylonians, that ruthless and impetuous people, who sweep across the whole earth to seize dwellings not their own.	Kukw ehe rāba, ngira nkakamure Abakaludaya, rya hanga ry’inkazi kandi ry’inkuba, bagenda batera isi iyo iva ikagera, bakikeberezako ingo zitar’ izabo.

In the seventh year, in the fifth month on the tenth day, some of the elders of Israel came to inquire of the Lord , and they sat down in front of me. The Merarites were appointed to take care of the frames of the tabernacle, its crossbars, posts, bases, all its equipment, and everything related to their use,	Aba Merari, ivyo bāshingiwe kuzēzwa zar’ imbaho z’iryo hema, n’ibiti vyo gusobeka muri zo, n’inkingi zaryo, n’ibitereko vyo kuzinegamwo, n’ibintu vyaryo vyose, n’ibikoreshwa vyaryo vyose;
Do your best to present yourself to God as one approved, a worker who does not need to be ashamed and who correctly handles the word of truth.	Wame ugira umwete wo kwiha Imana nk’uwamaze kurama, umukozi atarinda gutētērwa, aramiriza neza mw ijambo ry’ukuri.
and will go out to deceive the nations in the four corners of the earth—Gog and Magog—and to gather them for battle. Jesus entered Jerusalem and went into the temple courts. He looked around at everything, but since it was already late, he went out to Bethany with the Twelve.	Ashika i Yerusalemu, yinjira mu rusengero, maz’ ahejeje kweraguza vyose, kuko bgari bugorovye, arasohoka, aja i Betaniya, ajanye na bamwe cumi na babiri.
They are darkened in their understanding and separated from the life of God because of the ignorance that is in them due to the hardening of their hearts.	ivyiyumviro vyabo biri mu mwiza, batandukanijwe n’ubugingo buva ku Mana kubg’ ukutamenya kuri muri bo, n’ugukomantara kw’ imitima yabo.

What is more, he was chosen by the churches to accompany us as we carry the offering, which we administer in order to honor the Lord himself and to show our eagerness to help. In the eleventh year, in the third month on the first day, the word of the Lord came to me:	Maze mu mwaka w’icumi na rimwe, mu kwezi kwa gatatu, ku musi wa mbere w’ukwo kwezi, ijambo ry’Uhoraho ryanjeko,
The princes of Issachar were with Deborah; yes, Issachar was with Barak, sent under his command into the valley. In the districts of Reuben there was much searching of heart.	Abaganwa bo mu Bisakari bari kumwe na Debora, Mber’ Abisakari bakurikira Baraki; Bītera mu mwonga bamwōmye inyuma. Ku migezi y’Abareyubeni Hābaye kwibūranya gukomeye,
While they were in high spirits, they shouted, “Bring out Samson to entertain us.” So they called Samson out of the prison, and he performed for them. When they stood him among the pillars,	Maze bacuzuye umunezero, baravuga, bati Ni muhamagare Samusoni, tube turamwitwengera. Nuko baja guhamagara Samusoni, bamukūra mu nzu y’imbohe; ashitse imbere yabo baramwitwengera. Bamuhagarika hagati y’inkingi;
Even the priests, who approach the Lord , must consecrate themselves, or the Lord will break out against them.”	Kandi n’abaherezi na bo, basanzwe bīgira hafi yanje, jewe Uhoraho, ni biyeze, kugira ngo simbatsindeho.
This is what I have observed to be good: that it is appropriate for a person to eat, to drink and to find satisfaction in their toilsome labor under the sun during the few days of life God has given them—for this is their lot.	Eh’ ico nabonye kibereye kandi c’igikundiro: n’umuntu kurya akanywa, akanezererwa ivyiza bivuye mu butame bgiwe bgose, ubg’ atamira musi y’izuba, imisi yose y’ukubaho kwiwe, iyo Imana yamuhaye: kukw ivyo ari vyo mugabane wiwe.
This is good, and pleases God our Savior,	Ivyo ni vyo vyiza vyemerwa mu nyonga z’Imana Umukiza wacu,
Benaiah son of Jehoiada, a valiant fighter from Kabzeel, performed great exploits. He struck down Moab’s two mightiest warriors. He also went down into a pit on a snowy day and killed a lion.	Kandi na Benaya mwene Yehoyada, umuntu w’umuhizi w’i Kabuseli, na we yari yarakoze ivy’ ubutōre; ni we yishe bene Ariyeli w’i Mowabu bompi; kandi yaramanutse yicira intambge mw isenga, ku musi shelegi yar’ iguye.
An honest witness does not deceive, but a false witness pours out lies.	Icabona cizigirwa ntikibesha, Arikw icabona c’ibinyoma kivuga ibinyoma.
Shaaraim, Adithaim and Gederah (or Gederothaim) —fourteen towns and their villages.	na Sharayimu na Aditayimu na Gedera na Gederotayimu; vyose na vyose vyar’ icumi na bine, bifise imihana ibikūkira.
“Woe to you Pharisees, because you give God a tenth of your mint, rue and all other kinds of garden herbs, but you neglect justice and the love of God. You should have practiced the latter without leaving the former undone.	Ariko muzobona ibara, Bafarisayo, kuko mutanga ikigiracumi c’imbgija n’isogi n’imboga zose, ariko guca izibereye no gukunda Imana mukavyirengagiza. Ivyo mwari mukwiye kubikora, vya bindi na vyo ntimubireke.
When Jesus heard that John had been put in prison, he withdrew to Galilee.	Yumvise ko Yohana yashizwe mw ibohero, aja i Galilaya.
The workers from the city who farm it will come from all the tribes of Israel.	Ababa mu gisagara bo mu miryango yose y’ Abisirayeli, ni bo bazoharima.
Eat it in the sanctuary area, because it is your share and your sons’ share of the food offerings presented to the Lord ; for so I have been commanded.	Nuko mubirīre ahantu hēra, kukw ar’ umuturi wawe n’uw’ abana bawe, wo ku mashikanwa ashikaniwe Uhoraho agatōngōrwa n’umuriro; kuk’ ukw ari ko nabariwe.
Therefore, as surely as I live,” declares the Lord Almighty, the God of Israel, “surely Moab will become like Sodom, the Ammonites like Gomorrah— a place of weeds and salt pits, a wasteland forever. The remnant of my people will plunder them; the survivors of my nation will inherit their land.”	Nuko rero, ndahiye ukubaho kwanje, ni k’Uhoraho Nyen’ ingabo agize, Imana y’Abisirayeli, n’ukuri Mowabu hazoba nk’i Sodomu, n’Abamoni nk’i Gomora, ah’ igisuru ciganziye, habe iyengo ry’imyunyu, hahinduke amatongo ibihe bidashira: amasigarira y’abantu banje azobatera abasahure, mber’ abarokotse bo mw ihanga ryanje bazobatwara.

They said to the Ammonites, “Tomorrow we will surrender to you, and you can do to us whatever you like.”	Ab’i Yabeshi ni kwo kubarira Abamoni, bat’ Ejo tuzoza kubīsaba, namwe mutugire uko mugomba.
After a long time Judah’s wife, the daughter of Shua, died. When Judah had recovered from his grief, he went up to Timnah, to the men who were shearing his sheep, and his friend Hirah the Adullamite went with him.	Haciye igihe, muka Yuda arapfa, umukobga wa Shuwa. Yuda amaze kuganduka, aradūga aja i Timuna, ku bamukemurira intama, ari kumwe n’umugenzi wiwe Hira Umunyadulamu.
The words of Amos, one of the shepherds of Tekoa—the vision he saw concerning Israel two years before the earthquake, when Uzziah was king of Judah and Jeroboam son of Jehoash was king of Israel.	Amajambo ya Amosi wo mu bungere b’i Tekowa, y’ivyo yeretswe ku Bisirayeli ku ngoma ya Uziya umwami w’i Buyuda, no ku ngoma ya Yerobowamu mwene Yehowasi, umwami w’Abisirayeli, avyeretswe, hashira imyaka ibiri kwa gutigita kw’isi kuraza.
As Saul watched David going out to meet the Philistine, he said to Abner, commander of the army, “Abner, whose son is that young man?” Abner replied, “As surely as you live, Your Majesty, I don’t know.”	Igihe Sauli yabona Dawidi agiye kurwana na wa Mufilisitiya, yabajije Abuneri umugabisha w’ ingabo ziwe, ati Harya ga Abuneri, urya muhungu ni mwene nde? Na we aramwishura, ati Mugenzi, indahiro ni wewe nyene nkamumenya!
This, then, is how you ought to regard us: as servants of Christ and as those entrusted with the mysteries God has revealed.	Umuntu n’atwiyumvire yuko tur’ abasuku ba Kristo, n’ababgiriza b’amabanga y’Imana.
while he and all Israel were bringing up the ark of the Lord with shouts and the sound of trumpets.	Nuko Dawidi n’umuryango wose w’Abisirayeli badūgana isandugu y’Uhoraho basēsereza impundu, bavuza inzamba.

When Jesus entered Jerusalem, the whole city was stirred and asked, “Who is this?”	Ashitse i Yerusalemu, igisagara cose kirashwabaduka, barabaza, bat’ Uyo ni nde?

While Jesus was teaching in the temple courts, he asked, “Why do the teachers of the law say that the Messiah is the son of David?	Kandi Yesu yigishiriza mu rusengero, arababaza, at’ Abanyabgenge b’ivyanditswe bavuga bate yuko Kristo ari mwene Dawidi?
For I hear many whispering, “Terror on every side!” They conspire against me and plot to take my life.	Kuko numvise benshi bandementaniriza, Ubgoba kukantera irya n’ino; Hamwe bangīra inama Barondera ingene bonyica.
“You are a king, then!” said Pilate. Jesus answered, “You say that I am a king. In fact, the reason I was born and came into the world is to testify to the truth. Everyone on the side of truth listens to me.”	Nuko Pilato aramubaza, at’ Ubgo wewe ur’ umwami? Yesu ati Ni wewe uvyivugiye ko nd’ umwami. Iki ni co navukiye, kand’ iki ni co canzanye mw isi, n’ukugira ngo nshingire intahe ukuri. Uw’ ukuri wese yumva ijwi ryanje.
For I knew how stubborn you were; your neck muscles were iron, your forehead was bronze.	Nari nzi k’udakūrwa kw ijambo, kandi kw izosi ryawe ari nk’umutsi umeze nk’icuma, n’uruhanga rwawe ari nk’umuringa:
Nations will see and be ashamed, deprived of all their power. They will put their hands over their mouths and their ears will become deaf.	Amahanga azobibona amāramāre, nah’ ubushobozi bgayo bgari bginshi; bīfate ku munwa, amatwi yabo azibe.
He took all the gold and silver and all the articles found in the temple of God that had been in the care of Obed-Edom, together with the palace treasures and the hostages, and returned to Samaria.	Asahura amazahabu n’amafeza yose, n’ibintu vyose vy’imbombovu bāsanze mu ngoro y’Imana bijejwe Obed‐edomu, n’ivyo bāsanze mu bubīko bgo mu ngoro y’umwami, afata n’ abantu abajana bari mu bugombe, araheza asubira i Samariya.
He who made the Pleiades and Orion, who turns midnight into dawn and darkens day into night, who calls for the waters of the sea and pours them out over the face of the land— the Lord is his name.	Umwe yaremye inyenyeri zitwa Kilimiya na Oriyoni abe ari we mubaza; ni we ahindura igitūtu c’urupfu kigacika agatondo, n’umurango akawuhindura umwiza w’ijoro; ni we ahamagara amazi yo mu kiyaga, akayasendanisha kw isi; Uhoraho ni ryo zina ryiwe;
If one person sins against another, God may mediate for the offender; but if anyone sins against the Lord , who will intercede for them?” His sons, however, did not listen to their father’s rebuke, for it was the Lord ’s will to put them to death.	Umuntu ni yacumura ku wundi, Imana ishobora kubuzuza; arik’ uwocumura k’ Uhoraho, ni nde yomuvugira? Yamara bīrengagiza ivyo se ababariye, kuk’ Uhoraho yari yagabiye kubica.
I am one who testifies for myself; my other witness is the Father, who sent me.”	Jewe nd’ uwishingira intahe, kandi na Data yantumye aranshingira intahe na we.
Now while he was in Jerusalem at the Passover Festival, many people saw the signs he was performing and believed in his name.	Kandi yar’i Yerusalemu mu misi mikuru ya Pasika, benshi bizera izina ryiwe, babonye ibimenyetso akora.
I will spread my net for him, and he will be caught in my snare; I will bring him to Babylonia, the land of the Chaldeans, but he will not see it, and there he will die.	Kandi nzomutega ururiba rwanje, afatwe n’umutego wanje; nzomujana i Babuloni mu gihugu c’Abakaludaya; kandi ntazohabona nah’ ari ho azogwa.
You must obey my laws and be careful to follow my decrees. I am the Lord your God.	Ut’ Ivyagezwe vyiwe az’ abe ari vyo mwumvira, n’amabgirizwa yiwe az’ abe ari yo mwitondera, mubigenderemwo: uti Ni we Uhoraho Imana yanyu.
He must also have a good reputation with outsiders, so that he will not fall into disgrace and into the devil’s trap.	Kand’ akwiye gushingirwa intahe neza n’abo hanze, kugira ngo ntatembere mu mugayo no mu mutego wa wa Murwanizi.

At the end of twenty years, during which Solomon built the temple of the Lord and his own palace,	Nuko hashize imyaka mirongwibiri, ari yo Salomo yubakiyemw’ ingoro y’Uhoraho n’ iyiwe ubgiwe,

Our holy and glorious temple, where our ancestors praised you, has been burned with fire, and all that we treasured lies in ruins.	Inzu yacu yera nziza, iyo ba sogokuruza bacu bāguhimbarizamwo, yaraturiwe; n’ ibintu vyacu vyose vyāduhimbara vyārononekaye.

Sihon, however, did not trust Israel to pass through his territory. He mustered all his troops and encamped at Jahaz and fought with Israel.	Ut’ Ariko Sihoni ntiyabashirwako ngw abareke bahite mu gihugu ciwe; ut’ Arikw akoranya ingabo ziwe zose, abategera i Yahasi, arabarwanya.

Moses writes this about the righteousness that is by the law: “The person who does these things will live by them.”	Mose yanditse, at’ Ūshishikara ukugororoka kuva ku vyagezwe ni kwo kuzomubeshaho.
“You are the light of the world. A town built on a hill cannot be hidden.	Mur’ umuco w’isi. Igisagara cubatswe ku mpinga y’umusozi ntigishobora guhishwa.

The officials did not know where I had gone or what I was doing, because as yet I had said nothing to the Jews or the priests or nobles or officials or any others who would be doing the work. If I have sinned, what have I done to you, you who see everything we do? Why have you made me your target? Have I become a burden to you?	Namba narakoze icaha, wewe nagutwaye iki ga Ngenzuzi y’abantu? N’iki gituma unshinga nk’ uruti rw’icumu utīmba, Bigatuma nirambirwa?
The devil led him up to a high place and showed him in an instant all the kingdoms of the world.	Aramudūgana, amwereka ubgami bgose bgo mw isi mu kanya gato.
They came as a group to oppose Moses and Aaron and said to them, “You have gone too far! The whole community is holy, every one of them, and the Lord is with them. Why then do you set yourselves above the Lord ’s assembly?”	Bikoraniriza hamwe kurwanya Mose na Aroni, barababarira, bat’ Ivyanyu biratunaniye! Ereg’ ishengero ryose n’iryera, iyo bava bakagera, kand’ Uhoraho ari muri bo: none n’iki gituma mwishira hejuru y’ikoraniro ry’Uhoraho?
They sacrificed their sons and daughters in the fire. They practiced divination and sought omens and sold themselves to do evil in the eyes of the Lord , arousing his anger.	bagatanga abana babo b’abahungu n’abakobga kw ibimazi ngo boserezwe mu muriro, bakaragura bagapfumura, bakitanga gukora ivyo Uhoraho abona kw ari bibi, bakamutera umwikomo.
“You aren’t one of this man’s disciples too, are you?” she asked Peter. He replied, “I am not.”	Maz’ iyo ncoreke ikumīra ibaza Petero, iti Mbega nawe uri mu bigishwa b’uyo muntu? Petero at’ Oya, sindimwo.
The Lord, the Lord Almighty, has a day of tumult and trampling and terror in the Valley of Vision, a day of battering down walls and of crying out to the mountains.	kukw ar’ umusi w’ubgihebure n’ugusiribangwa n’ukuzazanirwa, uvuye ku Mwami, Uhoraho Nyen’ ingabo, mu kiyaya co kwerekwa; hariho gusangangura inzitiro z’amabuye, n’ amaruru ashika ku misozi miremire.
So Samuel went back with Saul, and Saul worshiped the Lord .	Nuko Samweli arahindukira, akurikira Sauli; Sauli asenga Uhoraho.
While they were on their way, the report came to David: “Absalom has struck down all the king’s sons; not one of them is left.”	Bakiri mu nzira, imbitsi ibikira Dawidi ko Abusalomu yishe abana b’umwami bose, ngo Ntihasigaye n’umwe.
You, therefore, have no excuse, you who pass judgment on someone else, for at whatever point you judge another, you are condemning yourself, because you who pass judgment do the same things.	Ni co gituma utagira ico wireguza, wewe muntu wese uhinyura uwundi. K’uhinyura uwundi, uba witsindishije; kuko wewe umuhinyura ukora bimwe n’ivy’ akora.
I will surely carry out this very day what I swore to you by the Lord , the God of Israel: Solomon your son shall be king after me, and he will sit on my throne in my place.”	uko nakurahiye Uhoraho Imana ya Isirayeli, yuko Salomo umwana wawe ari we azokwima ni natanga, akansubirira ku ngoma, ni ko ngira ndabishitse uyu musi.

This poor man called, and the Lord heard him; he saved him out of all his troubles.	Uyu mugorwa yaratakamvye, Uhoraho aramwumva, Amukiza amarushwa yiwe yose.
Jesus went up on a mountainside and called to him those he wanted, and they came to him.	Maz’ adūga umusozi muremure, ahamagara abo agomba, baza kuri we.

Look, I know you are depending on Egypt, that splintered reed of a staff, which pierces the hand of anyone who leans on it! Such is Pharaoh king of Egypt to all who depend on him. The number of all the males a month old or more who were counted was 7,500.	Abāharūwe bo muri bo, nk’ukw igitigiri c’izinamuhungu wese cari kiri, uhereye ku bamaze ukwezi kumwe no kuja hejuru, bār’ ibihumbi ndwi n’amajana atanu.
Do not take advantage of a hired worker who is poor and needy, whether that worker is a fellow Israelite or a foreigner residing in one of your towns. Saul said, “May God deal with me, be it ever so severely, if you do not die, Jonathan.”	Sauli aramwishura, ati Ni wagenda udapfuye ga Yonatani, Imana ibimpanire, mbere birushirije.

As Moses went into the tent, the pillar of cloud would come down and stay at the entrance, while the Lord spoke with Moses.	Mose yamara kwinjira mw ihema, ya nkingi y’igicu ikamanuka, igahagarara ku muryango waryo: Uhoraho akagānīra na Mose.

Nukw Abanyegiputa barabakurikira, bari n’amafarasi n’ imikogote vyose vya Farawo, n’ abagendera ku mafarasi, n’izindi ngabo ziwe, babahambiriza aho bashagaje hafi y’ikiyaga, i ruhande y’i Pi‐hahiroti, aharābana n’i Bayali‐sefoni.

He reached down from on high and took hold of me; he drew me out of deep waters.	Atuma ukuboko ari hejuru, aramfata, Andoba mu mazi menshi.
See what this godly sorrow has produced in you: what earnestness, what eagerness to clear yourselves, what indignation, what alarm, what longing, what concern, what readiness to see justice done. At every point you have proved yourselves to be innocent in this matter.	Ntimubona uwo mubabaro wo mu buryo bg’Imana, ukuntu wabateye umwete mwinshi urtyo? A person is not a Jew who is one only outwardly, nor is circumcision merely outward and physical.	Kuk’ Umuyuda wo ku rukoba atari we Muyuda; kand’ ugukebga kwo ku rukoba kwo ku mubiri atari kwo gukebga.

For six days eat unleavened bread and on the seventh day hold an assembly to the Lord your God and do no work.	Imitsima itambiwe iz’ ibe ari yo murya kumara imisi itandatu; maze ku wugira indwi muze mugire ikoraniro ry’agahebuza, mushengereye Uhoraho Imana yanyu; ntihaze hagire igikorwa muwukorako.

Of the men who went to explore the land, only Joshua son of Nun and Caleb son of Jephunneh survived.	Ariko Yosuwa mwene Nuni na Kalebu mwene Yefune baba ari bo bakira muri ba bagabo bagiye gutata ico gihugu.
He says, ‘I am going to bring disaster on you. I will wipe out your descendants and cut off from Ahab every last male in Israel—slave or free.	Mbere ngw Azokuzanakw ivyago, agufyēfyēture agukūreho, aherengeteze izinamuhungu wese wo kuri wewe, Ahabu, aho bava bakagera mu Bisirayeli;

Altogether, Adam lived a total of 930 years, and then he died.	Imisi yose Adamu yamaze yabaye imyaka amajana cenda na mirongwitatu: araheza arapfa.
Concerning Kedar and the kingdoms of Hazor, which Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon attacked: This is what the Lord says: “Arise, and attack Kedar and destroy the people of the East.	Ivy’ i Kedari, n’ivy’ ibihugu vy’abami b’i Hazori, ivyo Nebukadineza umwami w’i Babuloni yahavuye atsinda. Uku ni k’Uhoraho agize, ati Ni muhaguruke mudūge i Kedari, munyage abantu b’i burasirazuba.

For then there will be great distress, unequaled from the beginning of the world until now—and never to be equaled again.	Kuko mur’ iyo misi hazoba amarushwa ahambaye atigeze kubaho kuva kw itanguriro ry’isi ugashitsa n’ubu, kandi ntazokwongera kubaho.
The sons of Issachar: Tola, Puah, Jashub and Shimron.	Bene Isakari ni Tola, na Puva, na Yobu, na Shimuroni.
Many waters cannot quench love; rivers cannot sweep it away. If one were to give all the wealth of one’s house for love, it would be utterly scorned. and saw two angels in white, seated where Jesus’ body had been, one at the head and the other at the foot.	abona abamarayika babiri bambaye impuzu zera, bicaye umwe ku mutwe, uwundi mu mirambizo y’ah’ ikiziga ca Yesu cari kiryamye.
Didn’t we say to you in Egypt, ‘Leave us alone; let us serve the Egyptians’? If he holds back the waters, there is drought; if he lets them loose, they devastate the land.	Rāba, yimana amazi, agakama; Vyongeye yayarekura, akūbika isi.
For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.	Kuko kumenya icubahiro c’ Uhoraho kuzoba kwuzuye mw isi, nk’ukw amazi abugereye mu kiyaga.
Jesus was driving out a demon that was mute. When the demon left, the man who had been mute spoke, and the crowd was amazed.	Kand’ asenda dayimoni atera uburagi: dayimoni amuvuyemwo, uno muntu w’ikiragi aravuga; ishengero riratangara.
And you, Capernaum, will you be lifted to the heavens? No, you will go down to Hades. For if the miracles that were performed in you had been performed in Sodom, it would have remained to this day.	Nawe, Kaperinawumu, mbeg’ uzoshirwa hejuru ushike kw ijuru? Oya, uzocokezwa i kuzimu; kukw ibikomeye vyakorewe muri wewe, iyo biba vyarakorewe i Sodomu, haba hakiriho na bugingo n’ubu.
I will turn my hand against you; I will thoroughly purge away your dross and remove all your impurities.	Nzogufatisha ukuboko kwanje, ngukūremwo rwose inkamba zawe, nkumaremw’ urwevu rwawe rwose.
Walk with the wise and become wise, for a companion of fools suffers harm.	Gendana n’abanyabgenge, nawe uzogira ubgenge, Arik’ ūcudika n’ibipfu azokomereka.
“If I have put my trust in gold or said to pure gold, ‘You are my security,’	Asangwa naragize izahabu ivyizigiro vyanje, Nkabarira izahabu nziza, nti Ni wewe nishimiye;
Whoever has ears, let them hear.	Namba har’ umuntu ari n’ugutwi ni yumve.

But keep away from the devoted things, so that you will not bring about your own destruction by taking any of them. Otherwise you will make the camp of Israel liable to destruction and bring trouble on it. Your gates will always stand open, they will never be shut, day or night, so that people may bring you the wealth of the nations— their kings led in triumphal procession. “I told them that it is not the Roman custom to hand over anyone before they have faced their accusers and have had an opportunity to defend themselves against the charges. May Joab’s family never be without someone who has a running sore or leprosy or who leans on a crutch or who falls by the sword or who lacks food.”	arikw arasubira ku mutwe wa Yowabu no ku b’inzu ya se bose; mu nzu ya Yowabu ntihakabure umunyagisokoro, cank’ umunyamibembe, cank’ ūgendera ku kibando, cank’ uwicwa n’inkota, cank’ ūtagira ico ashira ku munwa.

Shitrai the Sharonite was in charge of the herds grazing in Sharon. Shaphat son of Adlai was in charge of the herds in the valleys.	Shiturayi w’i Sharoni ni we yar’ umutongore w’amasho yar’ i Sharoni nyene; kandi Shafati mwene Adulayi ni we yar’ umutongore w’ amasho yari mu biyaya;
I tried cheering myself with wine, and embracing folly—my mind still guiding me with wisdom. I wanted to see what was good for people to do under the heavens during the few days of their lives. So now take seven bulls and seven rams and go to my servant Job and sacrifice a burnt offering for yourselves. My servant Job will pray for you, and I will accept his prayer and not deal with you according to your folly. You have not spoken the truth about me, as my servant Job has.”	None rero ni mwijanire amashūri ndwi n’impfizi z’intama ndwi, muje ku musavyi wanje Yobu, mwitangire ibimazi vyoswa; kand’ umusavyi wanje Yobu azobasabira, kukw ari we nzokwemera, kugira ngo noye kubagirira nk’uk’ ubupfu bganyu bumeze; kuko mutamvuzekw ibiroranye, nk’uk’ umusavyi wanje Yobu yagize.

They have turned away quickly from what I commanded them and have made an idol for themselves.”	Maz’ Uhoraho arambarira, ati Va hasi, uve hano, umanuke vuba, kuko ba bantu bawe wakūye muri Egiputa bamaze kwononekara; inzira nabageze bayitaye ata n’akanya, bironkeye igishushanyo bakivugutiye mu nkero.
He did evil in the eyes of the Lord . During his entire reign he did not turn away from the sins of Jeroboam son of Nebat, which he had caused Israel to commit.	Akora ivyo Uhoraho abona kw ari bibi, ntiyigeze ava mu vyaha vya Yerobowamu mwene Nebati, ivyo yakwegeyemw’ Abisirayeli ngo bacumure.
At this, some of his disciples said to one another, “What does he mean by saying, ‘In a little while you will see me no more, and then after a little while you will see me,’ and ‘Because I am going to the Father’ ?”	Bamwe mu bigishwa biwe barabazanya, bati Mbeg’ ivyo atubgiye n’ibiki ngo Hasigaye igihe gito ntimube mukimbona, ngo Maze hazoca ikindi gihe gito musubire kumbona, kandi ngo Kuko nja kwa Data?
Lot and his two daughters left Zoar and settled in the mountains, for he was afraid to stay in Zoar. He and his two daughters lived in a cave.	Maze Loti ava i Sowari, adūga ku musozi, abayo, bo n’abigeme biwe bompi; kuko yatinya kuba i Sowari: nukw abana mw isenga n’abo bigeme biwe bompi.
At that hour of the night the jailer took them and washed their wounds; then immediately he and all his household were baptized.	Mur’ ico gihe nyene c’ijoro arabajana, abuhagira inguma z’inkoni, aca arabatizwa, bo n’abiwe bose.
The king’s word, however, overruled Joab and the army commanders; so they left the presence of the king to enroll the fighting men of Israel.	Arikw ijambo ry’umwami rinesha irya Yowabu n’iry’ abagabisha b’ingabo. Nuko Yowabu n’abo bagabisha bava imbere y’umwami, baja guharūra Abisirayeli.
To the one who is victorious, I will give the right to sit with me on my throne, just as I was victorious and sat down with my Father on his throne.	Ūnesha, nzomuha kwicarana nanje ku ntebe yanje y’ubgami, nk’uko nanje nanesheje nkicarana na Data ku ntebe yiwe.
As they talked and discussed these things with each other, Jesus himself came up and walked along with them;	Bakivugana babazanya, Yesu ubgiwe arabēgēra, ajana na bo.
As a mother comforts her child, so will I comfort you; and you will be comforted over Jerusalem.”	Nk’uk’ umwana ahūmurizwa na nyina ni ko nzobahūmuriza; kandi muzohūmuririzwa i Yerusalemu.
Jehu said, “Call an assembly in honor of Baal.” So they proclaimed it.	Maze Yehu aravuga, ati Mushinge ikoraniro ry’agahebuza rya Bayali. Nuko bararitāngāza.
I looked, and there before me was a white cloud, and seated on the cloud was one like a son of man with a crown of gold on his head and a sharp sickle in his hand.	Kandi mbona igicu cera; no kuri kino gicu ūkivyagiyeko, asa n’Umwana w’umuntu, yambaye igitsibo c’izahabu mu mutwe, kand’ afise umuhoro ukarishe mu kuboko.
As surely as I live, declares the Sovereign Lord , your sister Sodom and her daughters never did what you and your daughters have done.	Ndahiye ukubaho kwanje, ni k’Umwami Uhoraho agize, yuko Sodomu murumunawe n’abakobga biwe batākoze nkawe n’abakobga bawe.
I will cause your hordes to fall by the swords of mighty men— the most ruthless of all nations. They will shatter the pride of Egypt, and all her hordes will be overthrown.	Nzotuma ishengero ryawe riririkwa n’inkota z’ abahizi; abo bose ni bo b’agaterabgoba bo mu mahanga. Ubgibone bga Egiputa bazobuhindura ubusa, n’ishengero ryaho ryose rizohona.
He acted wisely, dispersing some of his sons throughout the districts of Judah and Benjamin, and to all the fortified cities. He gave them abundant provisions and took many wives for them.	Aca mu bgenge, akwiragiza abahungu biwe bose mu ntāra zose z’i Buyuda n’i Bubenyamini, ahār’ igisagara hose kizitijwe uruzitiro rw’amabuye; abaha ivyo kurya vyinshi vyo kubatunga; abaronderera n’abagore benshi.
As they approached Jerusalem and came to Bethphage and Bethany at the Mount of Olives, Jesus sent two of his disciples,	Bageze hafi y’i Yerusalemu, bashikira i Betifage n’i Betaniya ku musozi wa Elayono, atuma babiri bo mu bigishwa biwe,
For as woman came from man, so also man is born of woman. But everything comes from God.	Nk’uk’ umugore yamutse ku mugabo, ni k’umugabo avyarwa n’umugore: ariko vyose vyamuka ku Mana.
I refuse to touch it; such food makes me ill.	Umutima wanje wanse kubikorako; Bimmereye nk’ivyo kurya biteye iseseme.

For as churning cream produces butter, and as twisting the nose produces blood, so stirring up anger produces strife.”	Kuko gutērera amata kurēsa amavuta, No guhotora izuru kuzana amaraso, Ni ko kandi no kuvyura uburake kuzana imitongano.

Return to your fortress, you prisoners of hope; even now I announce that I will restore twice as much to you.	Ni muhindukirire igihome gikomeye, mwa mbohe ziri n’ivyizigiro: no kur’ uyu musi ndababgira ukuri yuko nzobashumbusha ibihetangabo kabiri.
Brothers and sisters, do not slander one another. Anyone who speaks against a brother or sister or judges them speaks against the law and judges it. When you judge the law, you are not keeping it, but sitting in judgment on it.	Bene Data, ntimuvuganane nabi. Ūvuga nabi mwene Se, cank’ ūhinyurira mwene Se ku mutima, aba avuze nabi ivyagezwe, ni vyo aba ahinyuye. Arikw iy’ uhinyura ivyagezwe, ntuba uvyitondera, uba ubaye umucamanza wavyo.

“How the mighty have fallen in battle! Jonathan lies slain on your heights.	Ewe kuntu abahizi bāguye mu ntambara hagati! Yonatani arambaraye ku mpinga y’umusozi wawe, aho yatsinzwe.
The light of a lamp will never shine in you again. The voice of bridegroom and bride will never be heard in you again. Your merchants were the world’s important people. The fat of an animal found dead or torn by wild animals may be used for any other purpose, but you must not eat it.	Arikw ibinure vy’ iyipfiriye, cank’ ivy’ ikirangara, vyoshobora gukoreshwa igikorwa kindi cose: ariko ntimuze mubiryeko na gatoya.

King Uzziah had leprosy until the day he died. He lived in a separate house —leprous, and banned from the temple of the Lord . Jotham his son had charge of the palace and governed the people of the land.	Nuk’ umwami Uziya arinda atanga akir’ umunyamibembe, aba mu nzu ya wenyene kubg’ imibembe yiwe, kukw atemerewe kuza mu ngoro y’Uhoraho; maze Yotamu umwana wiwe ni we yagaba ivyo mu rugo i bgami, agacira abantu bo mu gihugu imanza.
After many days you will be called to arms. In future years you will invade a land that has recovered from war, whose people were gathered from many nations to the mountains of Israel, which had long been desolate. They had been brought out from the nations, and now all of them live in safety. In Lystra there sat a man who was lame. He had been that way from birth and had never walked.	I Lusitira hār’ umugabo yar’ aremaye ibirenge uhereye aho yakaviriye mu nda ya nyina, nta ho yari yarigeze gutambuka.

But he gives us more grace. That is why Scripture says: “God opposes the proud but shows favor to the humble.”	Arikw itanga ubuntu burushirije. Ni co gituma ivuga, it’ Imana irwanya abibona, arikw abicisha bugufi ibaha ubuntu.
the word of the Lord came to Ezekiel the priest, the son of Buzi, by the Kebar River in the land of the Babylonians. There the hand of the Lord was on him.	ijambo ry’ Uhoraho ryanjeko jewe umuherezi Ezekiyeli mwene Buzi, ndi mu gihugu c’Abakaludaya ku ruzi Kebari; kand’ aho hantu nyene ni ho ukuboko kw’Uhoraho kwaziye kuri jewe.
And everyone went to their own town to register.	Bose baja kwiyandikisha, umuntu wese aja mu gisagara cabo.
Cursed be the man who brought my father the news, who made him very glad, saying, “A child is born to you—a son!”	Aravumwe umuntu yazaniye inkuru data, at’ Uvyaye umwana w’umuhungu; bikamunezereza cane.
Then the high priest and all his associates, who were members of the party of the Sadducees, were filled with jealousy.	Maz’ umuherezi mukuru ahagurukana n’abāri kumwe na we bose, ni bo muce witwa uw’ Abasadukayo, buzura ishari,
Now David had brought up the ark of God from Kiriath Jearim to the place he had prepared for it, because he had pitched a tent for it in Jerusalem.	Arikw isandugu y’Imana Dawidi yari yarayidūganye, ayikūra i Kiriyati‐yeyarimu ayijana aho yayitunganirije; kuko yari yayishingiye ihema i Yerusalemu.
“Have you acted honorably and in good faith by making Abimelek king? Have you been fair to Jerub-Baal and his family? Have you treated him as he deserves?	Yotamu yungamwo, ati Mbeg’ aho mwakoze ivy’ ukuri n’ibibereye, kwimika Abimeleki? Aho mwagiriye neza Yerubayali n’ab’ inzu yiwe, mwamwishuye ivyo yar’ akwiye?
And he said to them, “Truly I tell you, some who are standing here will not taste death before they see that the kingdom of God has come with power.”	Arababgira, ati Ndababgira ukuri: mur’ aba bahagaze hano harimwo bamwe batazobona urupfu gushitsa aho bazobonera ubgami bg’Imana buzananye n’ubushobozi.
So now, be sure of this: You will die by the sword, famine and plague in the place where you want to go to settle.”	None rero ni mumenye mudakekeranya yuko muzokwicirwa n’inkota n’ inzara n’ikīza, aho hantu aho mwifuza kuja kuba.
His wife Zeresh and all his friends said to him, “Have a pole set up, reaching to a height of fifty cubits, and ask the king in the morning to have Mordecai impaled on it. Then go with the king to the banquet and enjoy yourself.” This suggestion delighted Haman, and he had the pole set up.	Nuk’ umugore wiwe Zereshi n’abagenzi biwe bose bamugīra inama, bati Ni bashinge igiti c’intambge mirongwitanu z’ukuboko uciriye mu nkokora, maz’ ejo uz’ usabe umwami atange Moridekayi bakimumanikeko; uheze ubone kwinjirana n’umwami ku giturire unezerewe. Nuko Hamani ashima iyo nama; aca ashingisha ico giti.
Then the priest shall take some of the blood of the sin offering with his finger and put it on the horns of the altar of burnt offering and pour out the rest of the blood at the base of the altar.	Umuherezi aheze yābirize urutoke ku maraso y’ico kimazi gitangiwe ivyaha, ayasīge ku mahembe y’igicaniro co kwoserezakw ibimazi, ayandi maraso yaco ayavyagize hasi hambavu y’ico gicaniro.
Ezra praised the Lord , the great God; and all the people lifted their hands and responded, “Amen! Amen!” Then they bowed down and worshiped the Lord with their faces to the ground.	Ezira araheza ahimbaza Uhoraho Imana isumba vyose, abantu bose bashira amaboko hejuru, bati Amen, Amen. Baraheza barunama bashika hasi imbere y’Uhoraho, bubika amaso kw isi.
At that point some of the people of Jerusalem began to ask, “Isn’t this the man they are trying to kill?	Bamwe mu b’i Yerusalemu baravuga, bati Mbeg’ uwo si we bashaka kwica?
This is what your Sovereign Lord says, your God, who defends his people: “See, I have taken out of your hand the cup that made you stagger; from that cup, the goblet of my wrath, you will never drink again.	uku ni k’Umwami wawe Uhoraho agize, ari we Mana yawe ibūranira abantu bayo, at’ Ehe nkūye ca gikombe c’ukudandabagiranya mu kuboko kwawe, ni ko ka gakarabo, ari ko gikombe c’uburake bganje; ntuzosubira kukinywak’ ukundi:
If it was not useful for anything when it was whole, how much less can it be made into something useful when the fire has burned it and it is charred?	Rāba, kikir’ umurava nta co covuyemwo cokoreshwa, nkanswe ubu, umuriro umaze kugitongora, kigasha, har’ ico coba kikivamwo cokoreshwa?
The great day of the Lord is near— near and coming quickly. The cry on the day of the Lord is bitter; the Mighty Warrior shouts his battle cry.	Umusi uhambaye w’Uhoraho uri hafi; uri hafi kand’ urihuta; umusi w’Uhoraho, guhinda kwawo kurumvikana; umuhizi araborogana intuntu.
so that you may bear your disgrace and be ashamed of all you have done in giving them comfort.	kugira ng’ ukorwe n’isoni wewe ubgawe, umāramāzwe n’ivyo wakoze vyose, kuko wabaremesheje.
“Now then, get a new cart ready, with two cows that have calved and have never been yoked. Hitch the cows to the cart, but take their calves away and pen them up. Simon replied, “I suppose the one who had the bigger debt forgiven.” “You have judged correctly,” Jesus said.	Simoni aramwishura, ati Ngira ngo n’uwo yahebeye nyinshi. Na we aramubgira, at’ Uvuze ukuri.

May the Lord judge between you and me. And may the Lord avenge the wrongs you have done to me, but my hand will not touch you.	Uhoraho n’aducire urubanza twe nawe, Uhoraho n’abe ari we azokumpōra; arik’ ukuboko kwanje ntikuzogukorako.
Bring the grain offering made of these things to the Lord ; present it to the priest, who shall take it to the altar.	Muze munzanire ishikanwa ry’ivyakozwe mw ifu, ryakozwe mur’ ubgo buryo; rishīrwe umuherezi, na we arizane ku gicaniro.
All the Israelites, with their elders, officials and judges, were standing on both sides of the ark of the covenant of the Lord , facing the Levitical priests who carried it. Both the foreigners living among them and the native-born were there. Half of the people stood in front of Mount Gerizim and half of them in front of Mount Ebal, as Moses the servant of the Lord had formerly commanded when he gave instructions to bless the people of Israel.	Abisirayeli bose n’abakuru babo n’abashingantahe n’abacamanza bahagarara imbere y’Abalewi barerura isandugu y’isezerano ry’Uhoraho, bamwe ku ruhande rumwe rw’iyo sandugu, abandi ku rundi: s’ab’ imvukira gusa, ariko n’abanyamahanga na bo; igihimba kimwe cari gihagaze ku ruhande rw’umusozi Gerizimu, ikindi ku ruhande rw’ umusozi Ebalu, nk’uko Mose umusavyi w’Uhoraho yababariye ubga mbere, uko bizogenzwa mu guhezagira Abisirayeli.
Meanwhile Judah sent the young goat by his friend the Adullamite in order to get his pledge back from the woman, but he did not find her.	Yuda arungikana wa mugenzi wiwe w’Umunyadulamu ya suguru y’impene, kugira ngw acungure za ngwati kuri wa mugore: arikw aramubura.

For the one in authority is God’s servant for your good. But if you do wrong, be afraid, for rulers do not bear the sword for no reason. With the help of Zadok a descendant of Eleazar and Ahimelek a descendant of Ithamar, David separated them into divisions for their appointed order of ministering.	Dawidi afatanya na Sadoki wo mu bākomōtse kuri Eleyazari na Ahimeleki wo mu bākomōtse kuri Itamari, agabanganya aba Aroni mu mice, nk’ukw ibikorwa bahawe gukora bingana.
He was the one who restored the boundaries of Israel from Lebo Hamath to the Dead Sea, in accordance with the word of the Lord , the God of Israel, spoken through his servant Jonah son of Amittai, the prophet from Gath Hepher.	Mugabo asubiza urubibe rw’i Bgisirayeli aharwo, uhereye ahafata i Hamati ugashitsa ku kiyaga co mu kiyaya Araba, nk’ukw ijambo ry’Uhoraho Imana y’Abisirayeli ryavuze, iryo yavugiye mu musavyi wiwe Yona mwene Amitayi w’i Gati‐heferi, uwo yavugisha.

Like an archer who wounds at random is one who hires a fool or any passer-by.	Umuhinga yikorera vyose ubgiwe, Arikw igipfu gipfa gucisha ingero uwihitira wese.

He wanted to die, and said, “It would be better for me to die than to live.”	Maz’ izuba rirashe, Imana igera umuyaga w’indugumba, ng’ uve i burasirazuba; izuba rinaga Yona mu mutwe, bituma ahinduka urusogosogo, yisabira gupfa, ati Gupfa vyondutira kubaho.
Then these Levites set to work: from the Kohathites, Mahath son of Amasai and Joel son of Azariah; from the Merarites, Kish son of Abdi and Azariah son of Jehallelel; from the Gershonites, Joah son of Zimmah and Eden son of Joah;	Maz’ Abalewi bava hasi, Mahati mwene Amasayi, na Yoweli mwene Azariya, bo mu ba Kohati; n’abo mu ba Merari, Kishi mwene Abudi, na Azariya mwene Yehaleleli; n’abo mu ba Gerushoni, Yowa mwene Zima, na Edeni mwene Yowa.

Once these signs are fulfilled, do whatever your hand finds to do, for God is with you.	Kand’ ivyo bimenyamenya ni vyagushikako, ugenze uk’ ubona bikwiye, kukw Imana iri kumwe nawe.
You will be cursed when you come in and cursed when you go out.	Muzogira umuvumo mu maja no mu maza.
Now then, get your equipment—your quiver and bow—and go out to the open country to hunt some wild game for me.	Non’ enda rero, ni wābīre ivyo uhīgisha, umutana wawe n’umuheto wawe, ugende mw ishamba uhīge, undonderere akanyama,

Now Israel’s eyes were failing because of old age, and he could hardly see. So Joseph brought his sons close to him, and his father kissed them and embraced them.	Kand’ amaso ya Isirayeli yar’ asigaye abona ivyijiji kubgo gusāza, ntiyar’ acihweza. Arabamwēgereza, na we arabasoma, arabagūmbīra.
Saul and his son Jonathan and the men with them were staying in Gibeah in Benjamin, while the Philistines camped at Mikmash.	Nuko Sauli na Yonatani umuhungu wiwe n’abari kumwe na bo baguma i Geba h’i Bubenyamini; arikw Abafilisitiya bāri bashagaje i Mikimashi.
This temple will become a heap of rubble. All who pass by will be appalled and will scoff and say, ‘Why has the Lord done such a thing to this land and to this temple?’	kand’ iyi ngoro nah’ ar’ agahambaye irtya, ūzoyica i ruhande wese azokwumirwa, avuze agahwa, at’ Ariko n’iki catumye Uhoraho agirira artya iki gihugu n’iyi ngoro?
The Son is the radiance of God’s glory and the exact representation of his being, sustaining all things by his powerful word. After he had provided purification for sins, he sat down at the right hand of the Majesty in heaven. “Do not be afraid, Jacob my servant; do not be dismayed, Israel. I will surely save you out of a distant place, your descendants from the land of their exile. The Lord sustains them on their sickbed and restores them from their bed of illness.	Uhoraho azomwiyegeka ari ku buriri ahondobereye; Ni wewe umworohereza ibisaswa iy’ arwaye.
So they slaughtered the bulls, and the priests took the blood and splashed it against the altar; next they slaughtered the rams and splashed their blood against the altar; then they slaughtered the lambs and splashed their blood against the altar.	Nuko bakerera ayo mamasa, abaherezi batega amaraso, bayamija ku gicaniro; bakerera n’ayo mapfizi y’intama, bamija amaraso yayo kur’ ico gicaniro, bakerera n’iyo myagazi y’intama, bamija n’amaraso yayo kur’ ico gicaniro nyene.
He was chosen before the creation of the world, but was revealed in these last times for your sake.	Uwo yamenywe n’Imana kera, itanguriro ry’isi ritarashirwaho, ariko yerekanywe kw iherezo ry’ibihe kubganyu,
But Zerubbabel, Joshua and the rest of the heads of the families of Israel answered, “You have no part with us in building a temple to our God. We alone will build it for the Lord , the God of Israel, as King Cyrus, the king of Persia, commanded us.”	Ariko Zerubabeli na Yosuwa n’abandi bakuru b’amazu ya ba sekuruza b’Abisirayeli barabishura, bati Nta ho duhuriye namwe, vyotuma dufatanya kwubaka ingoro y’Imana yacu, ariko ni twebge twenyene tuzokwubakira Uhoraho Imana y’Abisirayeli iyo ngoro, nk’uko Kuro umwami w’i Buperesi yabitugeze.
But the one who prophesies speaks to people for their strengthening, encouraging and comfort.	Arik’ ūvugishwa n’Imana, abarira abantu ivyo kubakomeza n’ivyo kubahanūra n’ivyo kubirura.
He did evil in the eyes of the Lord , following the ways of his father and committing the same sin his father had caused Israel to commit.	Yakora ivyo Uhoraho abona kw ari bibi, akagendera mu ngeso za se, no mu vyaha yakoze, akabikwegeramwo n’Abisirayeli.
Look, here comes a man in a chariot with a team of horses. And he gives back the answer: ‘Babylon has fallen, has fallen! All the images of its gods lie shattered on the ground!’ ”	non’ ehe haje umuce w’ingabo zigendera ku mafarasi bagenda ari babiri‐babiri. Arongera aravuga, ati Babuloni harakomvomvowe, harakomvomvowe; n’ibishushanyo bibājwe vyose vy’ibigirwamana vyaho bihindikiraniye hasi bivunaguritse.
“Haven’t you read,” he replied, “that at the beginning the Creator ‘made them male and female,’	Na we arabishura, ati Nta ho murasoma yuk’ uhereye mbere na mbere Rurema yabaremye bar’ uburyo bubiri,
They are worthless, the objects of mockery; when their judgment comes, they will perish.	N’ivy’ ubusa gusa, n’igikorwa c’uruhendo; igihe cabo co kūzirwa bizoherengetezwa.

Like snow in summer or rain in harvest, honor is not fitting for a fool.	Nk’uko shelegi itabereye mu gihe c’umumero, n’ imvura mu gihe c’iyimbura, Ni ko n’ukwubaha igipfu kutabereye.
Intermarry with us; give us your daughters and take our daughters for yourselves.	Kandi mushingirane natwe: mudushingire abakobga banyu, namwe murongore abacu.
But if a priest’s daughter becomes a widow or is divorced, yet has no children, and she returns to live in her father’s household as in her youth, she may eat her father’s food. No unauthorized person, however, may eat it. Jair, a descendant of Manasseh, took the whole region of Argob as far as the border of the Geshurites and the Maakathites; it was named after him, so that to this day Bashan is called Havvoth Jair. )	(Yayiri umwuzukuruza wa Manase ni we yanesheje iyo ntāra yose yo muri Arugobu, ari ho i Bashani, gushitsa ku rubibe rw’Abageshuri n’ Abanyamayaka: ibisagara vyaho avyitiranya n’izina ryiwe, avyita Havoti‐yayiri, nk’uko bicitwa na bugingo n’ubu.)

This is your lot, the portion I have decreed for you,” declares the Lord , “because you have forgotten me and trusted in false gods.	Ivyo ni vyo bizokubako, ni wo mugabane nkugereye, ni jewe Uhoraho mbivuze, kuko wanyibagiye ukizigira ibinyoma.

“You have made your way around this hill country long enough; now turn north.	at’ Igihe mumaze muzenguka iyi misozi kirahāgije; ni mukevye, mugende mwerekeje i burārūko.
a wild donkey accustomed to the desert, sniffing the wind in her craving— in her heat who can restrain her? Any males that pursue her need not tire themselves; at mating time they will find her.	ur’ indogoba y’inyeshamba imenyereye ubugaragwa, ihemba umuyaga igihe igomba kwima; iyo irinze, ni nde yoyigarura? Be careful to obey all these regulations I am giving you, so that it may always go well with you and your children after you, because you will be doing what is good and right in the eyes of the Lord your God.
