“ ‘ “If, however, any nation or kingdom will not serve Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon or bow its neck under his yoke, I will punish that nation with the sword, famine and plague, declares the Lord , until I destroy it by his hand.	Maz’ ihanga ryose cank’ igihugu c’ umwami wese, ni habah’ abatemera gusaba Nebukadineza, uyo mwami w’i Babuloni, canke ngo bemere kugondera izosi ingōgo yiwe, iryo hanga nzorihana, ni k’ Uhoraho agize, ndarihanishe inkota n’inzara n’ikīza, gushitsa aho nzoba mperaheje kubaranduza ukuboko kwiwe.
Every tithe of the herd and flock—every tenth animal that passes under the shepherd’s rod—will be holy to the Lord .	Kandi mu masho no mu mikuku, uko zigenda ziharūzwa inkoni, ikigiracumi co mur’ izo zose kize kibe icera canje, jewe Uhoraho.
Once when they had finished eating and drinking in Shiloh, Hannah stood up. Now Eli the priest was sitting on his chair by the doorpost of the Lord ’s house.	Maze barangije kurya no kunywa aho bāri bari i Shilo, Hana ava hasi. Kandi Eli umuherezi yari yicaye ku ntebe yiwe ku gishimaryango mu rusengero rw’Uhoraho.
At that time this people and Jerusalem will be told, “A scorching wind from the barren heights in the desert blows toward my people, but not to winnow or cleanse;	Ico gihe hazobarirwa ubu bgoko n’i Yerusalemu, ng’ Umuyaga w’indugumba uturutse mu ruharabuga rwo ku mpinga z’imisozi yo mu bugaragwa uje utōmereye wa mukobga, ari bo bantu banje, kandi ntuzoba nk’uwo gutumura umuguruka cank’ uwo kugosora intete;
But his wife answered, “If the Lord had meant to kill us, he would not have accepted a burnt offering and grain offering from our hands, nor shown us all these things or now told us this.”	Arik’ umugore wiwe aramwishura, at’ Iyaba Uhoraho yagomba kutwica, ntaba yātwākīriye ikimazi cacu coshejwe bo n’ishikanwa ryacu ry’ifu, kandi ntaba yātweretse ivyo vyose, canke ngw atubarire amajambo ameze nk’ayo.
But the gift is not like the trespass. For if the many died by the trespass of the one man, how much more did God’s grace and the gift that came by the grace of the one man, Jesus Christ, overflow to the many!	Arikw ingabire y’Imana ntimera nka ca gicumuro. Kw igicumuro c’umwe catumye abenshi bapfa, ubuntu bg’Imana n’ingabire y’ubuntu bg’umuntu umwe Yesu Kristo vyarushirije gusāguka kuri benshi.
Then Jesus said to his host, “When you give a luncheon or dinner, do not invite your friends, your brothers or sisters, your relatives, or your rich neighbors; if you do, they may invite you back and so you will be repaid.	Kand’ abgira uwamutumiye, ati Ni wagira amazimano ku murango canke mw ijoro, ntuz’ utumire abagenzi bawe cank’ abo muvukana cank’ incuti zawe cank’ ababanyi bawe b’abatunzi; kuko kumbure na bo bogutumira, bakakwishura.
But he was pierced for our transgressions, he was crushed for our iniquities; the punishment that brought us peace was on him, and by his wounds we are healed.	Yamara yacumitiwe ivyacu bicumuro, yajanjaguriwe ivyacu bigabitanyo: igihano kituronkesha amahoro cabaye kuri we, kand’ imishishagu yiwe ni yo idukiza.
That same day he removed all the male goats that were streaked or spotted, and all the speckled or spotted female goats (all that had white on them) and all the dark-colored lambs, and he placed them in the care of his sons.	Ariko Labani ahenga uwo musi nyene, arobanura amapfizi y’impene y’ibibaba n’ay’ amabara y’ibigabo, n’izivyara zose z’imifumberi n’iz’ ibigabo, impene yose y’ibara ryera, n’intama zose z’ibiyumbu, aziragiza abahungu biwe.
As you know, we count as blessed those who have persevered. You have heard of Job’s perseverance and have seen what the Lord finally brought about. The Lord is full of compassion and mercy.	Eh’ abihanganye tubita abahirwe: mwarumvise ukwihangana kwa Yobu, mwabonye ivy’ Umwami Imana yaherutse kumugirira, ingene yuzuye imbabazi no kugira ikigongwe.
Terrors overwhelm me; my dignity is driven away as by the wind, my safety vanishes like a cloud.	Ibiteye ubgoba birampanze, Bakubeba icubahiro canje nk’ umuyaga; Amahirwe yanje akamanganye nk’igicu.
To my shame I admit that we were too weak for that! Whatever anyone else dares to boast about—I am speaking as a fool—I also dare to boast about.	Mbivuganye isoni: bisa n’aho tweho twabagizemw’ intege nke. Arikw ikintu cose gitera umuntu gushira amanga (mbivugishijwe n’ubupfu) nanje kirabintera.
Cry out and wail, son of man, for it is against my people; it is against all the princes of Israel. They are thrown to the sword along with my people. Therefore beat your breast.	Turikisha uboroge, mwana w’umuntu, kukw ibanguriwe abantu banje, ibanguriwe abaganwa bose b’Abisirayeli: bagerewe inkota hamwe n’abantu banje: shirako wishishitire.
You drive the women of my people from their pleasant homes. You take away my blessing from their children forever.	Abagore bo mu bantu banje mubirukana mu mazu yabo bakunda; abana babo bato icubahiro nabahaye mwakibakūyeko gushitsa ibihe bidashira.
Whoever conceals hatred with lying lips and spreads slander is a fool.	Ūpfukapfuka urwanko n’ umunyaminwa y’ibinyoma, Kand’ ūvuga ibirementanyo n’igipfu.
“Take a guard,” Pilate answered. “Go, make the tomb as secure as you know how.”	Pilato arababgira, at’ Abarinzi ngabo: ni mubajane; muyīrindishirize uko muzi.
Shubael, a descendant of Gershom son of Moses, was the official in charge of the treasuries.	Shebuweli wo mu ba Gerushomu mwene Mose ni we yabaye umukuru w’ububiko bgose.
“When an impure spirit comes out of a person, it goes through arid places seeking rest and does not find it.	Impwemu ihumanye iy’ ivuye mu muntu, ica ahatagira amazi, irondera uburuhukiro, ikabubura.
And the Lord did this. Dense swarms of flies poured into Pharaoh’s palace and into the houses of his officials; throughout Egypt the land was ruined by the flies.	Uhoraho abigira artyo: amasinzi y’ibibugu aza ar’ icago mu ngoro ya Farawo no mu nzu z’abanyarugo biwe; kand’ igihugu cose ca Egiputa cononekara kubg’ ayo masinzi y’ibibugu.
Jonathan, David’s uncle, was a counselor, a man of insight and a scribe. Jehiel son of Hakmoni took care of the king’s sons.	Yonatani se wabo wa Dawidi ni we yar’ umujanama, kandi yar’ umuntu w’umunyabgenge, yari n’umukarani; Yehiyeli mwene Hakimoni ni we yarera abana b’ umwami;
Seek the Lord and live, or he will sweep through the tribes of Joseph like a fire; it will devour them, and Bethel will have no one to quench it.	Jewe Uhoraho abe ari jewe musiguza, kugira ngo mubone kubaho; noye kuzosūmira inzu ya Yosefu nk’ umuriro, nkayitongora, i Beteli hataribuboneke uwo kuyizimya.
for Mount Zion, which lies desolate, with jackals prowling over it.	Bitewe n’uk’ umusozi Siyoni ucitse amatongo: Imbgebge zisigaye zihatambatamba.

Fallen is Babylon the Great,’ which made all the nations drink the maddening wine of her adulteries.”	Umumarayika wundi wa kabiri akurikirirako, ati Kirakomvomvotse, kirakomvomvotse, Babuloni, ca gisagara gihambaye, cateretse amahanga yose vino ni yo burake bg’ubushakanyi bgaco.
After the plague the Lord said to Moses and Eleazar son of Aaron, the priest,	Hanyuma y’ico kīza, Uhoraho abarira Mose na Eleyazari mwene Aroni umuherezi,
“This is what the Lord says: Stand in the courtyard of the Lord ’s house and speak to all the people of the towns of Judah who come to worship in the house of the Lord . Tell them everything I command you; do not omit a word.	rit’ Uku ni k’Uhoraho agize, ati Hagarara mu nyubakwa y’ingoro yanje Uhoraho, ubarire ab’ibisagara vyose vy’i Buyuda baza gusenga mu ngoro yanje, amajambo yose nkubarira yo kubabgira: ntusige na rimwe.
And you will do as I have done. You will not cover your mustache and beard or eat the customary food of mourners.	Namwe muzogira nk’ uko mmeze: ntimuzoruha mwipfuka ku munwa, canke ngo murye ibiryazagu.
“Therefore, son of man, say to your people, ‘If someone who is righteous disobeys, that person’s former righteousness will count for nothing. And if someone who is wicked repents, that person’s former wickedness will not bring condemnation. The righteous person who sins will not be allowed to live even though they were formerly righteous.’	Nuko rero, mwana w’umuntu, barira ab’ ubgoko bganyu, ut’ Ubugororotsi bg’umugororotsi ntibuzomukiza ku musi w’ibicumuro vyiwe, n’ivyaha vy’umunyavyaha ntibizomwicisha ku musi azohindukira akava mu vyaha vyiwe; yamar’ umugororotsi ntazoshobora kubeshwaho na bgo ku musi azocumurako.
The trouble they cause recoils on them; their violence comes down on their own heads.	Kugira nabi kwiwe kuzomugaruka ku mutwe, Umuryano wiwe uzogwa mu gahanga kiwe.
I thought, “These are only the poor; they are foolish, for they do not know the way of the Lord , the requirements of their God.	Maze ndavuga, nt’ Erega n’ukw ari ba nyarucari: n’ibijuju, kuko batazi inzira y’Uhoraho, ntibamenye n’ukuroranya kw’Imana yabo.
This is what the Lord says— he who made you, who formed you in the womb, and who will help you: Do not be afraid, Jacob, my servant, Jeshurun, whom I have chosen.	uku ni k’Uhoraho agize, uwakuremye akakubumba uhereye ukiri mu nda, kand’ ari we azogutabara: ati Ntutinye, yewe Yakobo musavyi wanje, yewe Yeshuruni uwo natoranije.

who did all those signs and wonders the Lord sent him to do in Egypt—to Pharaoh and to all his officials and to his whole land. “Why then,” they asked, “did Moses command that a man give his wife a certificate of divorce and send her away?”	Baramubaza, bati None se, n’iki catumye Mose agera ko bamuha icete co kuvāvānura, akamwirukana?
And you, son of man, do not be afraid of them or their words. Do not be afraid, though briers and thorns are all around you and you live among scorpions. Do not be afraid of what they say or be terrified by them, though they are a rebellious people. because the people of Beeroth fled to Gittaim and have resided there as foreigners to this day.	kand’ ab’ i Beroti bari barahungiye i Gitayimu, bagumayo kugeza na bugingo n’ubu.)

“ ‘This is what the Sovereign Lord says: On the day I cleanse you from all your sins, I will resettle your towns, and the ruins will be rebuilt.	Uku ni k’Umwami Uhoraho agize, at’ Umusi nzoboza ibigabitanyo vyanyu vyose nzotuma ibisagara bigerērwamwo, n’ amatongo yubakwe.
If a man has recently married, he must not be sent to war or have any other duty laid on him. For one year he is to be free to stay at home and bring happiness to the wife he has married.	Umuntu arongoye vuba ntakwiye kuja mu ntambara, canke ngw akoreshwe igikorwa ic’ ari co cose; ariko bamureke umwaka wose, anezereze umugore wiwe yarongoye.
Zephaniah the priest, however, read the letter to Jeremiah the prophet.	Maze Zefaniya umuherezi asoma ico cete ūvugishwa n’ Imana Yeremiya yumva.
Some were convinced by what he said, but others would not believe.	Maze bamwe bemera ivyo avuze, abandi ntibāvyemera.
Nebuzaradan commander of the imperial guard carried into exile to Babylon the people who remained in the city, along with those who had gone over to him, and the rest of the people.	Maze Nebuzaradani, umukuru w’abashibamyi, ajana i Babuloni amasigarira y’abantu bāri bagisigaye mu gisagara, n’abāri bāragiye kumwisaba, n’amasigarira y’abantu bāri bagisigaye, abajana ar’ inyagano.
Then Joseph could no longer control himself before all his attendants, and he cried out, “Have everyone leave my presence!” So there was no one with Joseph when he made himself known to his brothers.	Maze Yosefu ntiyaba agishobora kwiyumanganya imbere y’abo bahagararanye bose; aca avuga n’ijwi rirenga, ati Ni mutaramure abantu bose. But who are you, a human being, to talk back to God? “Shall what is formed say to the one who formed it, ‘Why did you make me like this?’ ”	Ariko ga wa muntu, uri nde, uhārīra n’Imana? Mbeg’ icābūmbge cobaza uwakibumvye, kiti N’iki catumye umbumba urtya?

Barakevya, bashika Eni‐mishipati (ari h’i Kadeshi), bazingazinga igihugu cose c’Abamaleki, bo n’ Abamori baba i Hasasoni‐tamari.

“However, in the first year of Cyrus king of Babylon, King Cyrus issued a decree to rebuild this house of God.	Bat’ Ariko mu mwaka wa mbere Kuro umwami w’i Babuloni ari ku ngoma, uwo mwami Kuro nyene yashinze ibgirizwa yukw iyi ngoro y’Imana yubakwa.

When the priest Pashhur son of Immer, the official in charge of the temple of the Lord , heard Jeremiah prophesying these things,	Nuko Pashuri mwene Imeri umuherezi, yar’ umubgiriza mukuru wo mu ngoro y’Uhoraho, yumvise Yeremiya avuze izo mbūri,
“I will bring such distress on all people that they will grope about like those who are blind, because they have sinned against the Lord . Their blood will be poured out like dust and their entrails like dung. But if you do marry, you have not sinned; and if a virgin marries, she has not sinned. But those who marry will face many troubles in this life, and I want to spare you this.	Arikw iy’ urongoye, nta caha uba ukoze. N’inkumi, iy’ irongowe nta caha iba ikoze. Mugabo, abameze bartyo bazogira amagorwa mu mubiri, ariko jewe nagomba kuyabakingira.
Cush and Egypt were her boundless strength; Put and Libya were among her allies.	Isinzi ry’Abanyetiyopiya n’ Abanyegiputa ni bo bār’ inkomezi zaho; Abaputi n’Abalubimu bār’ abatabazi baho.

and said, “Brothers and sisters, the Scripture had to be fulfilled in which the Holy Spirit spoke long ago through David concerning Judas, who served as guide for those who arrested Jesus.	ati Bagabo bene Data, ivyanditswe ntivyobuze gushika, ivyo Mpwemu Yera yari yaravugiye mu kanwa ka Dawidi kuri Yuda, yarōngōye abaja gufata Yesu,

The total wingspan of the cherubim was twenty cubits. One wing of the first cherub was five cubits long and touched the temple wall, while its other wing, also five cubits long, touched the wing of the other cherub. So the word of God spread. The number of disciples in Jerusalem increased rapidly, and a large number of priests became obedient to the faith.	Nukw ijambo ry’Imana riragwira; abigishwa barōndōka cane i Yerusalemu, abaherezi b’akavuvu bumvira ukwizera.
He listened to Paul as he was speaking. Paul looked directly at him, saw that he had faith to be healed	Uwo yumva Paulo avuga, na we amuhanze amaso abona kw afise ukwizera kwo gukizwa.
The next day Saul separated his men into three divisions; during the last watch of the night they broke into the camp of the Ammonites and slaughtered them until the heat of the day. Those who survived were scattered, so that no two of them were left together.	Bukeye Sauli agabanya abantu mw imice itatu, basēseka hagati mu nsago z’Abamoni mu gahuru, baririka Abamoni gushitsa ku musase munini; maz’ abācitse kw icumu aho bashwiragiriye nta na babiri wobonye bari hamwe.

When he opened the seventh seal, there was silence in heaven for about half an hour.	Kand’ amennye ikigira indwi kimatanije ico gitabo, haba agacerere mw ijuru nk’igihimba c’isaha.
After he became the father of Mahalalel, Kenan lived 840 years and had other sons and daughters.	Kenani amaze kuvyara Mahalaleli, amara iyindi myaka amajana munani na mirongwine, ayivyaramw’ abahungu n’abakobga.
He led you through the vast and dreadful wilderness, that thirsty and waterless land, with its venomous snakes and scorpions. “If a woman living with her husband makes a vow or obligates herself by a pledge under oath	Kand’ umugore ni yasezerana isezerano ari mu rugo, akībohesha ivyo araganye, akarahira,
I warn everyone who hears the words of the prophecy of this scroll: If anyone adds anything to them, God will add to that person the plagues described in this scroll. At that time gifts will be brought to the Lord Almighty from a people tall and smooth-skinned, from a people feared far and wide, an aggressive nation of strange speech, whose land is divided by rivers— the gifts will be brought to Mount Zion, the place of the Name of the Lord Almighty. A woman is bound to her husband as long as he lives. But if her husband dies, she is free to marry anyone she wishes, but he must belong to the Lord.	Umugore ahambīrirwa ku mugabo wiwe akiriho; arikw iy’ umugabo apfuye, nta kimubuza gucūrwa n’uw’ agomba, mugabo rero, ar’ ūri mu Mwami wacu.
Peter said to Jesus, “Rabbi, it is good for us to be here. Let us put up three shelters—one for you, one for Moses and one for Elijah.”	Petero abgira Yesu, ati Mwigisha, bitubereye vyiza ko turi hano, nuko duce insago zitatu, rumwe rwawe, urundi rwa Mose, urundi rwa Eliya.
When such a person hears the words of this oath and they invoke a blessing on themselves, thinking, “I will be safe, even though I persist in going my own way,” they will bring disaster on the watered land as well as the dry. “Consider this, you who forget God, or I will tear you to pieces, with no one to rescue you:	None rero yemwe abibagira Imana, ni mwiyumvire ibi, Noye kubashishimura, hakabura uwobakiza:
As silver, copper, iron, lead and tin are gathered into a furnace to be melted with a fiery blast, so will I gather you in my anger and my wrath and put you inside the city and melt you.	Nk’uko bakoraniriza ifeza n’imiringa n’ivyuma n’amasāsu n’amabati hagati mu ziko, bakabivugutira n’umuriro ngo bishonge, uko ni ko namwe nzobakoraniriza hamwe mfise uburake n’ubushangashirwe, mbarambikeho mbashongeshe.

Araunah said, “Why has my lord the king come to his servant?” “To buy your threshing floor,” David answered, “so I can build an altar to the Lord , that the plague on the people may be stopped.”	Arawuna aramubaza, ati Mwami wanje nyen’ ingoma, uzanywe n’iki i wanje jewe umusavyi wawe? Return home, my daughters; I am too old to have another husband. Even if I thought there was still hope for me—even if I had a husband tonight and then gave birth to sons—	Ni mwisubirire inyuma, bakobga banje, mwīgīre; kuko ndenze gucūrwa. Jesus knew their thoughts and said to them, “Every kingdom divided against itself will be ruined, and every city or household divided against itself will not stand.	Amenye ivyo biyumvira, arababgira, at’ Ubgami bgose iyo bgitandukanije ubgabgo burahona. Igisagara cose n’umuryango wose iyo vyitandukanije ntibirama.
If they are prophets and have the word of the Lord , let them plead with the Lord Almighty that the articles remaining in the house of the Lord and in the palace of the king of Judah and in Jerusalem not be taken to Babylon.	Namb’ ar’ abavugishwa n’Imana, kandi namb’ ijambo ry’Uhoraho riri muri bo, ni bashireko binginge Uhoraho Nyen’ ingabo ngw ibintu vy’imbombovu bisigaye mu ngoro y’Uhoraho no mu ngoro y’umwami w’i Buyuda, n’i Yerusalemu, bireke kujanwa i Babuloni.
He was doubly honored above the Three and became their commander, even though he was not included among them.	Yaravugangwa mur’ abo mirongwitatu nyene, bituma agirwa umukuru wabo. Ariko rero ntiyashikīra ba bandi batatu ba mbere.
Like a lion coming up from Jordan’s thickets to a rich pastureland, I will chase Babylon from its land in an instant. Who is the chosen one I will appoint for this? Who is like me and who can challenge me? And what shepherd can stand against me?”	Eh’ azodūga nk’intambge ivuye kuri Yorodani iyo rwigize akagabo, ngw atere ahantu h’itsitsi hakomeye: ariko nzotuma bahunga bahave giturumbuka, kand’ uwo nzotoranya ni we nzoshinga ngw ahaganze: none ni nde ahwanye nanje? Kandi ni nde azonshingira igihe? Kandi ni nde mwungere yohangara guhagarara imbere yanje?
So neither the one who plants nor the one who waters is anything, but only God, who makes things grow.	Nuk’ ūzitera nta co amaze, cank’ ūzivomera, atar’ Imana ikuza.
If you show special attention to the man wearing fine clothes and say, “Here’s a good seat for you,” but say to the poor man, “You stand there” or “Sit on the floor by my feet,”	namwe mukitegereza uwambaye impuzu zishajije, mukamubarira, muti Ni wicare hano heza; kandi mukabarira nya mworo, muti Weho hagarara hariya, cank’ icara hambavu y’ibirenge vyanje;
“ ‘The Lord said to my Lord: “Sit at my right hand until I put your enemies under your feet.” ’	at’ Uhoraho yabariye Umwami wanje, At’ Icara i buryo bganje, Ushitse aho nzoshirira abansi bawe musi y’ibirenge vyawe.
I know your deeds. See, I have placed before you an open door that no one can shut. I know that you have little strength, yet you have kept my word and have not denied my name.	ngo Ndazi ibikorwa vyawe (ehe nashize imbere yawe urugi rwuguruye, nta wushobora kurwugara) yuk’ ufise ubushobozi buke, witondeye ijambo ryanje, ntiwihakanye izina ryanje.
I will set my face against you so that you will be defeated by your enemies; those who hate you will rule over you, and you will flee even when no one is pursuing you.	Kandi nzohoza igitsūre canje kuri mwebge, muzoneshwa n’abansi banyu: ababanka ni bo bazobaganza; kandi muzohunga ata kibirukanye.
In everything I did, I showed you that by this kind of hard work we must help the weak, remembering the words the Lord Jesus himself said: ‘It is more blessed to give than to receive.’ ”	Nabahaye akarorero muri vyose, yuko mu butame nk’ubgo, ari ko mukwiye gufasha abadakomeye, no kwibuka amajambo y’Umwami Yesu, ingen’ ubgiwe yavuze, ati Gutanga kuzana umugisha, kuruta guhabga.
“Israel is a scattered flock that lions have chased away. The first to devour them was the king of Assyria; the last to crush their bones was Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon.”	Abisirayeli n’intama zisābagiye; intambge zarabasanzaje: umwami w’i Ashuri ni we yabanje kubarotsa, ubuheruka Nebukadineza uyo, umwami w’i Babuloni, yabajanjaguye amagufa.
“While I was thinking about the horns, there before me was another horn, a little one, which came up among them; and three of the first horns were uprooted before it. This horn had eyes like the eyes of a human being and a mouth that spoke boastfully.	Nitegereje ayo mahembe, mbona muri yo hameze akandi gahembe gatoya. Imbere yako hakūrwa amahembe atatu mu yar’ asanzwe. Maz’ ako gahembe nkabonakw amaso asa n’ay’ umuntu, n’akanwa kavuga ibihambaye.
I myself have seen a fool taking root, but suddenly his house was cursed.	Ubganje nabonye igipfu kiriko kirashōra imizi, Ubgo nyene mvuma ahantu kiba.
On the fifteenth day of the eighth month, a month of his own choosing, he offered sacrifices on the altar he had built at Bethel. So he instituted the festival for the Israelites and went up to the altar to make offerings.	Aradūga aja ku gicaniro yari yarubakishije i Beteli, hāri ku musi ugira icumi na gatanu w’ukwezi kw’umunani, ari kwo kwezi yitoranirije ubgiwe, agashinga uwo musi mukuru w’ Abisirayeli; nukw aradūga aja ku gicaniro, kugira ngw ahosereze imibavu.
I will boast about a man like that, but I will not boast about myself, except about my weaknesses.	Kubg’ umuntu ameze artyo ndirata, ariko kubganje sinokwirata, atar’ intege nke zanje.
then tell them, ‘It is the Passover sacrifice to the Lord , who passed over the houses of the Israelites in Egypt and spared our homes when he struck down the Egyptians.’ ” Then the people bowed down and worshiped.	muze mubishure, mut’ Iki ni co kimazi citwa Pasika y’Uhoraho, kuko yarenganye amazu yacu Abisirayeli, turi muri Egiputa, akayaziguriza, igihe yica Abanyegiputa. Abantu barunama, barasenga.
He replied, “You took the gods I made, and my priest, and went away. What else do I have? How can you ask, ‘What’s the matter with you?’ ”	Arabishura, ati Ko munsahuye imana zanje nironkeye, n’umuherezi wanje, mukīgīra mugasiga munyogeje, none murambaza, muti N’ibiki?

Isaac prayed to the Lord on behalf of his wife, because she was childless. The Lord answered his prayer, and his wife Rebekah became pregnant.	Isaka atakambira Uhoraho kubg’ umugore wiwe, kukw atāvyara: Uhoraho yumva gutakamba kwiwe, Rebeka umugore wiwe asama inda.

Early in the morning, all the chief priests and the elders of the people made their plans how to have Jesus executed.	Umutwenzi utambitse abaherezi bakuru bose n’abashingantahe b’ubgo bgoko bagīra inama Yesu ngo bamwice.
All the angels were standing around the throne and around the elders and the four living creatures. Here a great number of disabled people used to lie—the blind, the lame, the paralyzed.	Muri yo hari haryamye abantu benshi barwaye, n’impumyi, n’abacumbagira, n’abanyunyutse. [Bāri barorereye kw amazi azīkuruka.

but Esau I have hated, and I have turned his hill country into a wasteland and left his inheritance to the desert jackals.”	Esau na we naramwanse, mpindura imisozi yiwe amatongo, ishamvu yiwe ndayiha imbgebge zo mu bugaragwa.

“Never!” Jonathan said. “If I had the least inkling that my father was determined to harm you, wouldn’t I tell you?”	Yonatani aramwishura, ati Biragahera! None nomenya ko data afise inama yo kukugirira nabi, sinoca ndabikubgira?
It gave me great joy when some believers came and testified about your faithfulness to the truth, telling how you continue to walk in it.	Kuko nanezerewe cane hamwe bene Data baza bagashingira intahe ukuri kwawe, yuk’ ugendera mu kuri.
One thing I ask from the Lord , this only do I seek: that I may dwell in the house of the Lord all the days of my life, to gaze on the beauty of the Lord and to seek him in his temple.	Ico nsaba Uhoraho ni kimwe, ni co nzohora nitwaririka: N’ukuba mu ngoro y’Uhoraho imisi yose y’ubugingo bganje, Nkarāba ubgiza bg’Uhoraho, nkihweza urusengero rwiwe.
“Woe to you, teachers of the law and Pharisees, you hypocrites! You are like whitewashed tombs, which look beautiful on the outside but on the inside are full of the bones of the dead and everything unclean.	Muzobona ibara, mwebge abanyabgenge b’ivyanditswe n’Abafarisayo, mwa ndyarya mwe, kuko musa n’imva zihomeshejwe ingwa, ziboneka inyuma zīkuyengeje, arikw imbere zuzuye amagufa y’abapfuye n’ibihumanya vyose.
Carrying his own cross, he went out to the place of the Skull (which in Aramaic is called Golgotha).	Avayo, yiyikorereye umusaraba, ashika ahantu hitwa Nyagihanga, mu Giheburayo hitwa Gologota;
The Israelites went up and wept before the Lord until evening, and they inquired of the Lord . They said, “Shall we go up again to fight against the Benjamites, our fellow Israelites?” The Lord answered, “Go up against them.”	Maz’ Abisirayeli baradūga, baja kuririra imbere y’Uhoraho gushitsa ku mugorōba; babaza Uhoraho, bati Mbega dusubire kuja kurwana n’ab’ i wacu b’Ababenyamini? Uhoraho arabishura, at’ Ego me dūga mubatere.
For if those who depend on the law are heirs, faith means nothing and the promise is worthless,	Abizigira ivyagezwe iyo baba ari bo baragwa, ukwizera kuba kwarahindutse ubusa, ivyasezeranywe bikaba bititutse.

And these also stagger from wine and reel from beer: Priests and prophets stagger from beer and are befuddled with wine; they reel from beer, they stagger when seeing visions, they stumble when rendering decisions. You must always be careful to keep the decrees and regulations, the laws and commands he wrote for you. Do not worship other gods.	kand’ amateka n’imigenzo n’ivyagezwe n’amabgirizwa, ivyo nabandikiye, mube ari vyo mwitondera, mubikore gushitsa ibihe vyose; kandi ntimuze mugire izindi mana musaba.

By the first day of the first month of Noah’s six hundred and first year, the water had dried up from the earth. Noah then removed the covering from the ark and saw that the surface of the ground was dry.	Maze mu mwaka w’amajana atandatu na rimwe, mu kwezi kwa mbere, ku musi wakwo wa mbere, amazi akama kw isi. Now, Israel, hear the decrees and laws I am about to teach you. Follow them so that you may live and may go in and take possession of the land the Lord , the God of your ancestors, is giving you. Then they will say, “We have no king because we did not revere the Lord . But even if we had a king, what could he do for us?”	N’ukuri bazohava bavuga, bati Nta mwami tugira: kuko tutubashe Uhoraho; kare ho umwami yotumariye iki?

Joseph found favor in his eyes and became his attendant. Potiphar put him in charge of his household, and he entrusted to his care everything he owned.	Yosefu atona kuri we, aba ingendanyi yiwe; maz’ amuhindura umubgiriza wo mu rugo rwiwe, amuzeza ivy’ afise vyose.

In the thirty-ninth year of his reign Asa was afflicted with a disease in his feet. Lions have roared; they have growled at him. They have laid waste his land; his towns are burned and deserted.	Imigunza y’intambge yamwivugiyeko irenza amajwi, yahinduye igihugu ciwe imisaka; ibisagara vyiwe vyaturiwe, bisigaye ata wukihaba.

Look at the land of the Babylonians, this people that is now of no account! The Assyrians have made it a place for desert creatures; they raised up their siege towers, they stripped its fortresses bare and turned it into a ruin.	Ni murābe igihugu c’Abakaludaya: ubgo bgoko ntibukiriho; Abashuri bahahinduye ah’ ibikōko vyo mu bugaragwa. Bashinga ivyo būririrako, basambura ingoro zaho; bahaca amatongo.
The bases for the posts were bronze. The hooks and bands on the posts were silver, and their tops were overlaid with silver; so all the posts of the courtyard had silver bands. The Lord had made the Egyptians favorably disposed toward the people, and they gave them what they asked for; so they plundered the Egyptians.	Uhoraho aha abo bantu kurābga neza n’Abanyegiputa, babaha ivyo babasavye: uko ni ko bīnyagiye Abanyegiputa.
Such people we command and urge in the Lord Jesus Christ to settle down and earn the food they eat.	Arikw abameze bartyo turabagera tubahanūra kubg’ Umwami Yesu Kristo, gukora ibikorwa batekereje, babone kurya ivyo bīronkeye ubgabo.
Every living thing on the face of the earth was wiped out; people and animals and the creatures that move along the ground and the birds were wiped from the earth. Only Noah was left, and those with him in the ark. I went about mourning as though for my friend or brother. I bowed my head in grief as though weeping for my mother.	Nkamera nk’ah’ ar’ umukunzi wanje canke mwene mama arwaye, Nkicurikīra nk’ūgandaye, nk’ ūririra nyina.

But as for you, the Lord took you and brought you out of the iron-smelting furnace, out of Egypt, to be the people of his inheritance, as you now are.	Ariko mweho, Uhoraho yarabashīngūye, abakūra muri rya tanure rivugutira ivyuma, ari ryo Egiputa, kugira ngo mumubere abantu yiharije, nk’uko biri n’ ubu.
After these events, King Xerxes honored Haman son of Hammedatha, the Agagite, elevating him and giving him a seat of honor higher than that of all the other nobles. In the thirty-sixth year of Asa’s reign Baasha king of Israel went up against Judah and fortified Ramah to prevent anyone from leaving or entering the territory of Asa king of Judah. then the young woman’s father and mother shall bring to the town elders at the gate proof that she was a virgin.	Maze se na nyina b’uwo mukobga baze bābīre ibimenyetso vy’ ubgigeme bgiwe, babishīre abakuru b’igisagara cabo mw irembo ryaco.
The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.	Icatumye ngusiga i Kirete kwar’ ukugira ng’ utunganye ivyasigaye, kandi mu gisagara caho cose ng’ uhashinge abakuru b’ishengero, nk’uko nabikubariye:
“ ‘Because you harbored an ancient hostility and delivered the Israelites over to the sword at the time of their calamity, the time their punishment reached its climax,	Ko wāmanye inyankane idahangūra, ukagomorera inkota Abisirayeli ku musi baboneyekw ivyago, mu gihe giherahereza ibigabitanyo vyabo;
Then Judas Iscariot, one of the Twelve, went to the chief priests to betray Jesus to them.	Kandi Yuda Isikaryota, yar’ umwe muri bamwe cumi na babiri, aja ku baherezi bakuru, ngw az’ amubaronkere.
for the Israelites belong to me as servants. They are my servants, whom I brought out of Egypt. I am the Lord your God.	Kukw Abisirayeli ar’ abagurano banje niharije; n’abagurano banje nakūye mu gihugu ca Egiputa: ni jewe Uhoraho Imana yanyu.
The Levites: Jeshua son of Azaniah, Binnui of the sons of Henadad, Kadmiel,	Abalewi n’aba: Yosuwa mwene Azaniya, na Binuwi wo muri bene Henadadi, na Kadimiyeli,
The priest shall burn them on the altar as a food offering presented to the Lord . It is a guilt offering.	Umuherezi aheze avyosereze ku gicaniro, kibe ikimazi nshikaniwe gitōngōrwa n’ umuriro. Ico ni co kimazi c’ impongano.
We wait in hope for the Lord ; he is our help and our shield.	Imitima yacu yiteze Uhoraho; Ni we mutabazi wacu n’inkinzo yacu.
On the same day Moses commanded the people:	Maze Mose agera abantu kur’ uwo musi,
Include one male goat as a sin offering, in addition to the regular burnt offering with its grain offering and drink offering.	Mutange n’impfizi y’impene imwe kw ikimazi gitangirwa ivyaha; muze muvyongere kuri ca kimazi co kwoswa c’intasība, no kw ishikanwa ry’ifu n’iry’ ibiturire, uko bigendana na co.
“ ‘You are to give the city as its property an area 5,000 cubits wide and 25,000 cubits long, adjoining the sacred portion; it will belong to all Israel. “Lord,” he said, “if I have found favor in your eyes, then let the Lord go with us. Although this is a stiff-necked people, forgive our wickedness and our sin, and take us as your inheritance.”	Aravuga, ati Mwami, namba ngiriwe ubuntu imbere yawe, none ndakwinginze Mwami, n’ugendere hagati muri twebge, nah’ ar’ ihanga ritagonda izosi; uharire ibigabitanyo vyacu n’ibicumuro vyacu, wemere kuduhindura ishamvu yawe.
In that day people will ridicule you; they will taunt you with this mournful song: ‘We are utterly ruined; my people’s possession is divided up. He takes it from me! He assigns our fields to traitors.’ ”	Uwo musi muzoba iciro ry’imigani, mucure intimba, muti Biracitse! Turageseye! Umugabane w’ubgoko bgacu yawuhaye abandi, arawutunyaze! Amatongo yacu yayagabanganije abanyazi!
(Now Moses was a very humble man, more humble than anyone else on the face of the earth.)	Kand’ uwo mugabo Mose yar’ umugwaneza kurusha abantu bose bo mw isi.

In his time of trouble King Ahaz became even more unfaithful to the Lord .	Maz’ uwo mwami Ahazi nyene, igihe aburaniwe arushiriza kuja imbere gucumura k’ Uhoraho,

But only the high priest entered the inner room, and that only once a year, and never without blood, which he offered for himself and for the sins the people had committed in ignorance.	ariko mu rya kabiri hinjiramw’ umuherezi mukuru wenyene, rimwe gusa uk’ umwaka utashe, ariko ntiyinjiramwo atajanye amaraso yo kwitangirira no gutangirira ubuzimuzimu bg’abantu.
Then the elders of the town nearest the body shall take a heifer that has never been worked and has never worn a yoke	maz’ igisagara kizorusha ibindi kuba hafi yaho, abakuru bo mur’ ico gisagara baze bazane inka y’ishashi bakūye mu busho, itigeze gukoreshwa igikorwa, canke ngw isangire ingōgo n’iyindi, zikwega ikintu;
When the voice had spoken, they found that Jesus was alone. The disciples kept this to themselves and did not tell anyone at that time what they had seen.	Iryo jwi rishize, Yesu aboneka ar’ umwe. Barabihora, ntihāgira umuntu mur’ iyo misi babgira na kimwe mu vyo bābonye.
So he showed them, and they put the city to the sword but spared the man and his whole family.	Aca abereka aho baca ngo bagishikemwo; ni kwo kuranduza inkota ico gisagara, ariko wa mugabo n’abo mu rugo rwiwe bose barabareka.
Although the priests of the high places did not serve at the altar of the Lord in Jerusalem, they ate unleavened bread with their fellow priests.	Mugabo abo baherezi bo mur’ ivyo bitabo ntibādūga ngo bēgēre igicaniro c’Uhoraho i Yerusalemu, ariko bāsangira imitsima itambiwe n’ ab’i wabo.
When they had all had enough to eat, he said to his disciples, “Gather the pieces that are left over. Let nothing be wasted.”	Bamaze guhāga, abgira abigishwa biwe, ati Ni mutororokanye utumanyagu tw’ imisigazwa, hoye kugira igipfa ubusa.
Those who do not deny themselves on that day must be cut off from their people.	Kandi ni hagira umuntu atazokwibabaza kur’ uwo musi, az’ acibge mu bgoko bgabo.
if I have raised my hand against the fatherless, knowing that I had influence in court,	Kand’ asangwa narabanguriye ukuboko impfuvyi, Kubgo kugira aho mpininikiye mu rukinja;
The Lord said to Moses,	Uhoraho abarira Mose,
The Lord said to Moses, “Count all the firstborn Israelite males who are a month old or more and make a list of their names.	Uhoraho abarira Mose, ati Harūra izinamuhungu wese mu bana b’imfura b’Abisirayeli, uhereye ku bamaze ukwezi kumwe ukaja hejuru, ubaharūre nk’ukw amazina yabo ari.
and because he was a tentmaker as they were, he stayed and worked with them.	Kandi kuko bāri bahūje ubuhinga, abana na bo, barabungirana, kuk’ ubuhinga bgabo bgar’ ubgo kujisha amahema.
Then what was said through the prophet Jeremiah was fulfilled:	Ni ho ivyavuzwe na Yeremiya yavugishwa n’Imana vyashikiye,

His intent was that now, through the church, the manifold wisdom of God should be made known to the rulers and authorities in the heavenly realms,	kugira ngo noneh’ abakuru n’abafise ububasha b’ahantu ho mw ijuru bamenyere kw ishengero ubgenge bg’Imana bg’uburyo bginshi,

from the descendants of Heman, Jehiel and Shimei; from the descendants of Jeduthun, Shemaiah and Uzziel.	abo mu ba Hemani ni Yehuweli na Shimeyi; abo mu ba Yedutuni ni Shemaya na Uziyeli.
Brothers and sisters, let me take an example from everyday life. Just as no one can set aside or add to a human covenant that has been duly established, so it is in this case. So Saul went down to the Desert of Ziph, with his three thousand select Israelite troops, to search there for David.	Nuko Sauli arahaguruka, amanuka mu bugaragwa bg’i Zifu, ari kumwe n’ingabo ibihumbi bitatu zitoranijwe mu Bisirayeli, agiye kurondera Dawidi mur’ ubgo bugaragwa bg’i Zifu.

Jonah began by going a day’s journey into the city, proclaiming, “Forty more days and Nineveh will be overthrown.”	Yona atangura kuja mu gisagara agenda urugendo rw’umusi umwe; arasemerera, ati Hasigaye imisi mirongwine, Ninewe hagakomvomvorwa.

Then Moses climbed Mount Nebo from the plains of Moab to the top of Pisgah, across from Jericho. Maze Yehowasi umwami w’Abisirayeli afata mpiri Amaziya umwami w’i Buyuda, mwene Yowasi, Yowasi mwene Ahaziya, amufatira i Beti‐shemeshi nyene; aca aja i Yerusalemu, asangangura uruzitiro rwaho rw’amabuye, uhereye kw irembo ry’Abefurayimu ugashitsa kw irembo ryo ku mfuruka, hose har’ amatambge amajana ane y’ ukuboko uciriye mu nkokora.

“ ‘Therefore this is what the Sovereign Lord says: “ ‘Because you think you are wise, as wise as a god,	Nuko rero, uku ni k’Umwami Uhoraho agize, ati Ko wagereranije umutima wawe n’umutima w’Imana,

And wherever he went—into villages, towns or countryside—they placed the sick in the marketplaces. They begged him to let them touch even the edge of his cloak, and all who touched it were healed. The end has come! The end has come! It has roused itself against you. See, it comes!	Umuhero urashitse, umuhero urashitse, urakuvundurukiye: eh’ uraje!

“See, I am going to rouse them out of the places to which you sold them, and I will return on your own heads what you have done.	ehe nanje nzobavyutsa, mbakūre ahantu iyo mwābaguriye, kandi kwa kunyīhōra kwanyu nzokubasubiza ku mitwe.
Those who see you stare at you, they ponder your fate: “Is this the man who shook the earth and made kingdoms tremble,	Abazokubona bazoguhanga, bakwitegereze, bati Mbeg’ uyu ni we yahindisha isi agashitsi, agashira ubgami bginshi mu gatengo?
Abdon, Zikri, Hanan,	na Abudoni na Zikuri na Hanani,
Along with their fellowship offering of thanksgiving they are to present an offering with thick loaves of bread made with yeast.	Iryo shikanwa ryiwe, n’ico kimazi ciwe c’ishimwe yatanze kubgo gukenguruka, az’ abitangane n’utundi dutsima twambiwe.

So these administrators and satraps went as a group to the king and said: “May King Darius live forever!	Nukw abo bakuru n’ abaganwa bakondorera ku mwami Dariyo, baramubgira, bati Mwami nyaguhoraho;
One of them went out into the fields to gather herbs and found a wild vine and picked as many of its gourds as his garment could hold. When he returned, he cut them up into the pot of stew, though no one knew what they were.	Umwe muri bo arasohoka aja ku gahinga gusoroma imboga; ahasanga umutanga, yamurakw ibitangatanga atega impuzu yiwe; araza abikekagurira muri ya nkono batetsemw’ imboga, kuko batari bazi ivy’ ari vyo.

“It will be just like this on the day the Son of Man is revealed.	Ni ko bizoba, umusi Umwana w’umuntu azoserukirako.

now in the street, now in the squares, at every corner she lurks.)	Hamwe aba mu nzira, ahandi akaba ahiyaguye, Abunda ku mahwane yose y’ inzira.
“Then he will say to those on his left, ‘Depart from me, you who are cursed, into the eternal fire prepared for the devil and his angels.	Maz’ azobgira n’abar’ i bumoso, ati Mva i ruhande, mwa bivume mwe, muje mu muriro utazima wateguriwe wa Murwanizi n’abamarayika biwe.
John was a lamp that burned and gave light, and you chose for a time to enjoy his light.	Uwo yar’ itara ryaka rikabonesha, kandi namwe mwamaze igihe muhimbawe n’ukwaka kwiwe.
While Jezebel was killing off the Lord ’s prophets, Obadiah had taken a hundred prophets and hidden them in two caves, fifty in each, and had supplied them with food and water.)	ushime, aho Yezebeli yahonnya abavugishwa b’Uhoraho, Obadiya yahitanye abavugishwa ijana, arabanyegeza, mirongwitanu mw isenga rimwe, yindi mirongwitanu mu rindi, akabagaburira ivyo kurya n’amazi.
But if they do not cross over with you armed, they must accept their possession with you in Canaan.”	Ariko ni batajabukana namwe bitwaje ibirwanishwa, baze bahabge ishamvu muri mwebge mu gihugu c’i Kanani.
Now he who supplies seed to the sower and bread for food will also supply and increase your store of seed and will enlarge the harvest of your righteousness.	Kand’ Īha umubivyi imbuto n’imitsima yo kurya, ni yo izobaha, ibongeranirize imbuto zanyu zo kubiba, kand’ izogwiza imbuto z’ukugororoka kwanyu.
Do not testify against your neighbor without cause— would you use your lips to mislead?	Ntukāgirize mugenzawe ata nyanduruko, Kandi ntugahendanishe iminwa yawe.
Although they know God’s righteous decree that those who do such things deserve death, they not only continue to do these very things but also approve of those who practice them.	Abo, naho bāmenye urubanza Imana ica, yukw abakora ibisa birtyo bakwiye gupfa, ntibabikora gusa, ariko batako bagashima n’ababikora.
At the tent of meeting the Gershonites were responsible for the care of the tabernacle and tent, its coverings, the curtain at the entrance to the tent of meeting,	Ivy’ ihema ry’ibonaniro aba Gerushoni bāzēzwa vyar’ ihema ry’imbere, n’ihema ryo hejuru, n’ico kurenza hejuru yaryo, n’ igihuzu cakinga ku muryango w’iryo hema ry’ibonaniro nyene,
He then brought them out and asked, “Sirs, what must I do to be saved?”	arabasohokana, arababaza, ati Bagenzi, nkwiye gukora iki ngo nkire?
Then the survivors from all the nations that have attacked Jerusalem will go up year after year to worship the King, the Lord Almighty, and to celebrate the Festival of Tabernacles.	Maz’ umuntu wese wo mu masigarira yo mu mahanga yose yateye i Yerusalemu azodūga uk’ umwaka utashe gusenga Umwami Uhoraho Nyen’ ingabo no kumara imisi mikuru y’insago.
As my hand seized the kingdoms of the idols, kingdoms whose images excelled those of Jerusalem and Samaria—	Nk’ uk’ ukuboko kwanje kwashitse ku bihugu vy’ibigirwamana vyari bifise ibishushanyo bibājwe kurusha ivy’ i Yerusalemu n’i Samariya,
Because you did not serve the Lord your God joyfully and gladly in the time of prosperity,	Ko muzoba mwaranse gukoreranira Uhoraho Imana yanyu umunezero n’umutima ukunze, mugifise umurengera wa vyose,
Then they all came and urged David to eat something while it was still day; but David took an oath, saying, “May God deal with me, be it ever so severely, if I taste bread or anything else before the sun sets!”	Hanyuma abantu bose baza kwinginga Dawidi ngw afūngure hakiri ku murango; ariko Dawidi ararahira, aravuga, ati Ni nagira ico ntamira izuba ritararenga, Imana iz’ ibimpanire, mbere birushirije!
Who is going to harm you if you are eager to do good?	Kandi ni nde yobagirira nabi, ni mwagira ishaka ry’ivyiza?
Neither he nor his attendants nor the people of the land paid any attention to the words the Lord had spoken through Jeremiah the prophet.	Ariko ntiyumvira amajambo y’Uhoraho ayo yavugisha Yeremiya, ubgiwe cank’ abasavyi biwe cank’ abantu bo mu gihugu.
But the plans of the Lord stand firm forever, the purposes of his heart through all generations.	Imigabo y’Uhoraho ihora ihamye ibihe bidashira, N’ivyiyumviro vyo mu mutima wiwe ibihe vyose.

Then they cried out to the Lord , “Please, Lord , do not let us die for taking this man’s life. Do not hold us accountable for killing an innocent man, for you, Lord , have done as you pleased.”	Ni co catumye batakambira Uhoraho, bati Turakwinginze, ewe Uhoraho, twoye gupfa tuzira ubugingo bg’uyu muntu, kandi ntuduharūrekw amaraso y’ūdafise igicumuro, kuko wewe, Uhoraho, ukoze ico ugomvye.

Every morning and evening they present burnt offerings and fragrant incense to the Lord . They set out the bread on the ceremonially clean table and light the lamps on the gold lampstand every evening. We are observing the requirements of the Lord our God. But you have forsaken him.	Bama bosereza Uhoraho ibimazi uko bukeye uko bgije, bakamwosereza n’imibavu itāmirana, bagatondesha n’imitsima y’ ibiterekērwa ku meza yacuzwe mw izahabu iramuye, kand’ uko bgije bakadomeka n’amatara ari ku gitereko cayo c’izahabu; kuko tweho twitondera ivyagezwe vy’ Uhoraho Imana yacu, ariko mweho mwaramuvuyeko.

“You stretch out your right hand, and the earth swallows your enemies.	Waramvuye ukuboko kw’i buryo, Isi irabamira.
These are the sons of Ham by their clans and languages, in their territories and nations.	Urwo ni rwo ruvyaro rwa Hamu, nk’ukw imiryango yabo iri, nk’ukw indimi zabo ziri, nk’ukw ibihugu vyabo biri, nk’ ukw amahanga yabo ari.
When the richest provinces feel secure, he will invade them and will achieve what neither his fathers nor his forefathers did. He will distribute plunder, loot and wealth among his followers. The Lord will open the heavens, the storehouse of his bounty, to send rain on your land in season and to bless all the work of your hands. You will lend to many nations but will borrow from none. The fields are ruined, the ground is dried up; the grain is destroyed, the new wine is dried up, the olive oil fails.	Imirima irononekaye, n’igihugu kiraganya; kukw amasaka yononekaye, na vino z’umubira zikamye akagīrīre, kand’ amavuta ya elayo na yo aherengeteye.

for receiving instruction in prudent behavior, doing what is right and just and fair;	Kwigishwa gukora ibiroranye mu bgenge, Mu kugororoka, mu kwitegereza neza no mu gutunganya;

So Jehu son of Jehoshaphat, the son of Nimshi, conspired against Joram. “ ‘Anyone who eats a sacred offering by mistake must make restitution to the priest for the offering and add a fifth of the value to it.	Umuntu ni yaramuka ariye ku kintu cejejwe atabizi, az’ akirihe, asubize umuherezi ikingana n’ico kintu cejejwe yariye, akigerekeko n’ikingana n’ikigira gatanu caco.
They lift it to their shoulders and carry it; they set it up in its place, and there it stands. From that spot it cannot move. Even though someone cries out to it, it cannot answer; it cannot save them from their troubles.	Maze bakayishira ku bitugu bakayirerura, bakayishinga mu kibanza cayo, igahagararaho ntisegenye; mbere nah’ umuntu yoyitakambira, ntiyoshobora kumwishura, canke ngw imukize amagorwa yiwe.
yes, this is what the Lord Almighty, the God of Israel, says about the things that are left in the house of the Lord and in the palace of the king of Judah and in Jerusalem:	n’ukuri uku ni k’Uhoraho Nyen’ ingabo agize, ni we Mana ya Isirayeli, ku vy’ibintu vy’imbombovu bisigaye mu ngoro y’Uhoraho no mu ngoro y’umwami w’i Buyuda, n’i Yerusalemu:
the tent pegs for the tabernacle and for the courtyard, and their ropes;	n’imambo z’iryo hema, n’iz’ urugo, n’imigozi yazo;
All those who were skilled among the workers made the tabernacle with ten curtains of finely twisted linen and blue, purple and scarlet yarn, with cherubim woven into them by expert hands.	Umuntu wese w’umuhinga mu bakora ico gikorwa, akora iryo hema ry’imbere, barisakaza impuzu cumi; izo mpuzu zajishwe mu nyuzi zera derere nziza zihinzwe neza, no mu nyuzi z’amasufe no mu z’amashigisha no mu zisa n’ agahama; kandi zari zijishwekw ibishushanyo vy’abakerubi, bijishwe n’abahinga bavyo.
Jesus looked at them and said, “With man this is impossible, but with God all things are possible.”	Yesu arabītegereza, arababgira, ati Kubg’ abantu ico ntigishoboka, ariko ku Mana vyose birashoboka.
At the entrance to the tent of meeting, Aaron and his sons are to eat the meat of the ram and the bread that is in the basket.	Aroni n’abana biwe bazirishe ya mitsima yo mu ndumane, babirīre ku muryango w’ ihema ry’ibonaniro.

For when I brought your ancestors out of Egypt and spoke to them, I did not just give them commands about burnt offerings and sacrifices,	Kukw ata co nabariye ba sogokuruza banyu, canke ngo ngire ico mbabgira ku musi nabakūriye mu gihugu ca Egiputa, ku vyo kwosa ibimazi canke kubikerera:
Then we cried out to the Lord , the God of our ancestors, and the Lord heard our voice and saw our misery, toil and oppression.	Maze dutakambira Uhoraho Imana ya ba sogokuruza, Uhoraho yumva ugutakamba kwacu, abona amarushwa yacu, n’ ubucumukure bgacu, n’agahahazo turimwo.
So I poured out my wrath on them because they had shed blood in the land and because they had defiled it with their idols.	Ni co catumye mbasendanishak’ uburake bganje mbahōye amaraso bāsendanishije mu gihugu, n’uko bācononesheje ibigirwamana vyabo;

Then the Lord said to Moses, “I will rain down bread from heaven for you. The people are to go out each day and gather enough for that day. In this way I will test them and see whether they will follow my instructions.	Maz’ Uhoraho abarira Mose, ati Rāba, ngira ngo ndabacuncuburire umutsima uvuye mw ijuru: uko bukeye abantu baze bame baja kwegeranya ivy’ uwo musi, kugira ngo mbagerageze ndābe yuko bitondera ivyagezwe vyanje, canke ko batavyitondera.
They are to stay in that city until they have stood trial before the assembly and until the death of the high priest who is serving at that time. Then they may go back to their own home in the town from which they fled.”	Nukw az’ agume mur’ ico gisagara gushitsa ah’ azogīra mw ikombe agacirwa urubanza, aheze arorēre igihe umuherezi mukuru azoba ariho mur’ ico gihe azopfira; ni ho uwo mukoracumu azobona gusubira i wabo mu rugo rwiwe, mu gisagara yavuyemw’ ahunga.

Uburebure bgayo bgar’ amatambge mirongwitandatu y’ ukuboko uciriye mu nkokora, utambitse mu buryo bga kera, ubgaguke bgayo bgar’ amatambge mirongwibiri.

Now, therefore, the sword will never depart from your house, because you despised me and took the wife of Uriah the Hittite to be your own.’	None rero, inkota nta ho izova mu rugo rwawe, kuko wankēngereye, ugacūra muka Uriya Umuheti, ukamugira umugore wawe.

The king’s edict granted the Jews in every city the right to assemble and protect themselves; to destroy, kill and annihilate the armed men of any nationality or province who might attack them and their women and children, and to plunder the property of their enemies. who had come to hear him and to be healed of their diseases. Those troubled by impure spirits were cured,	Kandi n’abababazwa n’impwemu zihumanye barakizwa.

After the servant had lifted him up and carried him to his mother, the boy sat on her lap until noon, and then he died.	Nukw aramujana amushikiriza nyina; nyina amushira ku bibero; hageze mu mashōka aracīkāna.
When he came near the den, he called to Daniel in an anguished voice, “Daniel, servant of the living God, has your God, whom you serve continually, been able to rescue you from the lions?”	Ashitse hafi ya rwa rwobo Daniyeli yarimwo, ahamagara n’ijwi ry’umubabaro, abaza Daniyeli, ati Yewe Daniyeli musavyi w’Imana nzima, mbeg’ Imana yawe ukorera na ntaryo yashoboye kugukiza izo ntambge?
“As for any fabric that is spoiled with a defiling mold—any woolen or linen clothing,	Kandi ni hagira umwambaro urikw indwara yo mu buryo bg’ imibembe, n’iyo woba wajishwe mu bgoya bg’intama, canke mu nyuzi zera derere;
But if out in the country a man happens to meet a young woman pledged to be married and rapes her, only the man who has done this shall die.	Arik’ umuntu ni yasanga umukobga mu gahinga, kand’ ar’ uwasabge, akamugōbēra, agasambana na we; uwo mugabo yasambanye na we az’ abe ari we apfa wenyene:
Where then are the gods you made for yourselves? Let them come if they can save you when you are in trouble! For you, Judah, have as many gods as you have towns.	None se za mana zawe wironkeye ziri hehe? Ni zihaguruke, namba zishobora kugukiza mu gihe c’ivyago vyawe: kuk’ ukw ibisagara vyawe bingana, ewe Buyuda, ari kw imana zawe zingana.
These were the descendants of Gilead: through Iezer, the Iezerite clan; through Helek, the Helekite clan;	Aba Gileyadi n’aba: Yezeri, ni we gishitsi c’inzu y’Abayezeri; na Heleki, ni we gishitsi c’inzu y’Abaheleki;
but his mother spoke up and said, “No! He is to be called John.”	Nyina arababgira, at’ Oya, ni yitwe Yohana.
Peter, however, got up and ran to the tomb. Bending over, he saw the strips of linen lying by themselves, and he went away, wondering to himself what had happened.	Ariko Petero ava hasi, yirukira ku mva, arunama, arungurukamwo, abona impuzu zera ziri zonyene: asubira i we, atangajwe n’ibibaye.
Then he returned to his disciples and found them sleeping. “Simon,” he said to Peter, “are you asleep? Couldn’t you keep watch for one hour?	Aragaruka, asanga basinziriye, abaza Petero, ati Simoni, urasinziriye? Nturushe uba maso n’isaha n’imwe?
When they heard him speak to them in Aramaic, they became very quiet. Then Paul said:	Bumvise ababariye mu Giheburayo, barushiriza gucereza. Aravuga,
You are under a curse—your whole nation—because you are robbing me.	Wa muvumo murawuvumwe: kukw ihanga ryose uko mungana mwangunze.
So they took him and killed him, and threw him out of the vineyard.	Baramufata, baramwica, bamukwegera inyuma y’uruzabibu.
But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, forbearance, kindness, goodness, faithfulness,	Arikw ivyo Mpwemu yama n’urukundo, umunezero, amahoro, ukwihangana, kugira neza, ingeso nziza, kuba umwizigirwa,
And this is how she would go to the king: Anything she wanted was given her to take with her from the harem to the king’s palace.	Uko ni k’umwigeme wese yabona kuja ku mwami; kand’ iy’ agira aje mu ngoro y’umwami, ico yagomba cose co mu nzu y’abigeme yaragihabga.
He scooped out the honey with his hands and ate as he went along. When he rejoined his parents, he gave them some, and they too ate it. But he did not tell them that he had taken the honey from the lion’s carcass.	Arabuhakura, abushira mu minwe, agenda araburya; ashikiriye se na nyina, abubahako, na bo baraburya; ariko ntiyababgira kw abukūye mu kirangara c’intambge.
Give ear, our God, and hear; open your eyes and see the desolation of the city that bears your Name. We do not make requests of you because we are righteous, but because of your great mercy.	Ewe Mana yanje, banga ugutwi kwawe wumve, ni wihwezeshe inyonga zawe witegereze ubugesera bgaduteye, n’umurwa witirirwa izina ryawe, kukw ivyo tugutakambiye, tutabigushize imbere twishingikirije ku bugororotsi bgacu, ariko ni kubg’ imbabazi zawe nyinshi.
Then Solomon went to Jerusalem from the high place at Gibeon, from before the tent of meeting. And he reigned over Israel.	Nuko Salomo ava imbere y’ ihema ry’ibonaniro, ku mpinga y’umusozi Gibeyoni, asubira i Yerusalemu; akomeza kuganza Abisirayeli.
The hooves of his horses will trample all your streets; he will kill your people with the sword, and your strong pillars will fall to the ground.	Azotakangisha inzira zawe zose inzāra z’amafarasi yiwe: abantu bawe azobaririkisha inkota, kand’ inkingi zanditswekw ivy’ ubutōre bgawe zizotsindwa hasi.
The sound of the wings of the cherubim could be heard as far away as the outer court, like the voice of God Almighty when he speaks.	Kand’ uguhinda kw’amababa y’abakerubi kwarumvikana kugashika no mu ntangaro, kumeze nk’ijwi ry’ Īshobora vyose iy’ ivuze.
Eat it as something most holy; every male shall eat it. You must regard it as holy.	Uz’ ubirīre ahantu hēra cane; izinamuhungu wese wo mu bawe yemererwa kubiryako: bize bikubere ivyera.
but Paul did not think it wise to take him, because he had deserted them in Pamphylia and had not continued with them in the work.	Ariko Paulo ntivyamubera vyiza kujana uwabataye i Pamfiliya, ntajane na bo mur’ ico gikorwa.
The other events of Uzziah’s reign, from beginning to end, are recorded by the prophet Isaiah son of Amoz.	Nukw ibindi vyose vyadonzwe kuri Uziya, uhereye ku ca mbere ugashitsa ku c’imperēra, vyanditswe n’uwavugishwa n’Imana Yesaya mwene Amosi.
I write to you, dear children, because you know the Father. I write to you, fathers, because you know him who is from the beginning. I write to you, young men, because you are strong, and the word of God lives in you, and you have overcome the evil one.	Narabandikiye ba se, kuko muzi uwahereye ubga mbere na mbere. Narabandikiye misore, kuko mufise inkomezi, kand’ ijambo ry’Imana rikaguma muri mwebge, kandi mwanesheje wa Mubi.
“ ‘Come now, make a bargain with my master, the king of Assyria: I will give you two thousand horses—if you can put riders on them!	Muti None rero, enda shinga na shebuja umwami w’i Ashuri; muti Na we Rabushake araguha amafarasi ibihumbi bibiri, namba nawe ubgawe woshobora kuronka abo uyūriza.
Lord , be gracious to us; we long for you. Be our strength every morning, our salvation in time of distress.	Ewe Uhoraho, utugirire imbabazi; ni wewe twiteze; utubere amaboko uko bukeye, mber’ utubere agakiza mu gihe c’amagorwa.
The Israelites moved on and camped at Oboth.	Abisirayeli barahaguruka, basagaza ahitwa Oboti.
Lacking clothes, they go about naked; they carry the sheaves, but still go hungry.	Bigatuma bagenda gusa, ata co bambaye, Kandi baremēkwa ibinyankinda n’inzara mu nda;
When all the work King Solomon had done for the temple of the Lord was finished, he brought in the things his father David had dedicated—the silver and gold and the furnishings—and he placed them in the treasuries of the Lord ’s temple.	Uko ni kw igikorwa cose umwami Salomo yakoreye ingoro y’Uhoraho carangiye. Maze yinjiza ivyo se Dawidi yari yaragize inyegu y’Uhoraho vyose, amafeza n’amazahabu, n’ibintu vy’ibikoreshwa, abishira mu bubīko bg’ ingoro y’Uhoraho.
The sons of Reuben the firstborn of Israel (he was the firstborn, but when he defiled his father’s marriage bed, his rights as firstborn were given to the sons of Joseph son of Israel; so he could not be listed in the genealogical record in accordance with his birthright,	Aba ni bo bākomōtse kuri Reyubeni, imfura ya Isirayeli; ariko naho yar’ imfura, ubukuru bgiwe arabgākwa, kuko yūriye uburiri bga se, akabuhumanya, ubgo bukuru buhabga bene Yosefu, umwana wa Isirayeli nyene; yamara Yosefu ntiyatangurirwako nk’uw’ imfura, iyo bādōnda amazina yabo;
Now, Your Majesty, issue the decree and put it in writing so that it cannot be altered—in accordance with the law of the Medes and Persians, which cannot be repealed.”	Nuko rero, mugenzi, shinga ico cihanikirizo, wisinye ku candiko caco, kugira ngo coye kuzohindurwa, nk’ukw ivyagezwe vy’Abamedi n’Abaperesi bidahinduka.
So he died, according to the word of the Lord that Elijah had spoken. Because Ahaziah had no son, Joram succeeded him as king in the second year of Jehoram son of Jehoshaphat king of Judah.	Nuko Ahaziya aratanga, nk’ ukw ijambo Uhoraho yavugishije Eliya ryavuze. Maze kukw ata mwana w’umuhungu yagira, murumuna we Yehoramu asubira ku ngoma yiwe; hari mu mwaka ugira kabiri Yehoramu mwene Yehoshafati umwami w’Abayuda ari ku ngoma.
Though you do not know him, I know him. If I said I did not, I would be a liar like you, but I do know him and obey his word.	yamara ntimumuzi, ariko jewe ndamuzi. Kandi ni navuga ngo sindamuzi, nzoba mbaye umunyabinyoma nkamwe: ariko ndamuzi, kandi nitondera ijambo ryiwe.
A happy heart makes the face cheerful, but heartache crushes the spirit.	Umutima unezerewe ukesha mu maso, Arik’ umubabaro wo mu mutima usāvya umushaha.

Even on my servants, both men and women, I will pour out my Spirit in those days.	Kandi n’abagurano banje b’abahungu n’abakobga mur’ iyo misi nzobasukako Mpwemu wanje.
All eleven curtains were the same size—thirty cubits long and four cubits wide.	Uburebure bg’impuzu yose bgar’ amatambge mirongwitatu y’ukuboko uciriye mu nkokora; ubgaguke bgayo bgar’ amatambge ane; izo mpuzu ukw ari cumi n’imwe zari cabugerwe.

This is what the Lord says, he who appoints the sun to shine by day, who decrees the moon and stars to shine by night, who stirs up the sea so that its waves roar— the Lord Almighty is his name:	Uku ni k’Uhoraho agize, uwatanze izuba ngo ribe umuco w’ umurango, akagera ukwezi n’ inyenyeri ngo vyake mw ijoro, ni we azīkurura ikiyaga ngw imipfunda yaco ibomborane: Uhoraho Nyen’ ingabo ni ryo zina ryiwe:
“I am not possessed by a demon,” said Jesus, “but I honor my Father and you dishonor me.	Yesu arabishura, ati Jewe sindimwo dayimoni, ariko nubaha Data, namwe ntimunyubaha.
All who cross over, those twenty years old or more, are to give an offering to the Lord .	Umuntu wese arēngāna agashirwa mu gitigiri c’abaharūwe, amaze imyaka mirongwibiri cank’ isāga, az’ anshikanire iryo shikanwa.
In any case, I must press on today and tomorrow and the next day—for surely no prophet can die outside Jerusalem!	Ariko nkwiye kugenda uyu musi n’ejo na hirya y’ejo, kuko bidashoboka k’ūvugishwa n’Imana yicwa, atar’ i Yerusalemu.
Samuel did what the Lord said. When he arrived at Bethlehem, the elders of the town trembled when they met him. They asked, “Do you come in peace?”	Nuko Samweli agenza nk’uk’ Uhoraho yamubgiye, aja i Betelehemu. Ashitseyo, abakuru b’igisagara baza kumusanganira, bahinda agashitsi. Baramubaza, bati Mbeg’ ugenzwa n’amahoro?
Now Deborah, a prophet, the wife of Lappidoth, was leading Israel at that time.	Ico gihe Debora, uwavugishwa n’Imana, muka Lapidoti, ni we yar’ umucamanza w’Abisirayeli.
They read from the Book of the Law of God, making it clear and giving the meaning so that the people understood what was being read.	babasomera mu gitabo c’ ivyagezwe vy’Imana mu buryo bgumvikana, barabibasobanurira kugira ngo batahure ivyo basomewe.

Peace to you. The friends here send their greetings. Greet the friends there by name.	Amahoro abane nawe. Abakunzi barakuganutsa. Untahirize abakunzi, ukw amazina yabo angana.

Immediately his mouth was opened and his tongue set free, and he began to speak, praising God.	Bose baratangara. Uwo mwanya akanwa kiwe karazibūka, n’ururimi rwiwe ruragobodoka, aravuga, ashima Imana.
David said to Saul, “Let no one lose heart on account of this Philistine; your servant will go and fight him.”	Dawidi ashitse, abarira Sauli, ati Ntihagire uwo arandura umutima; jewe umusavyi wawe ndagiye kurwana n’uwo Mufilisitiya.
“Go, assemble the elders of Israel and say to them, ‘The Lord , the God of your fathers—the God of Abraham, Isaac and Jacob—appeared to me and said: I have watched over you and have seen what has been done to you in Egypt.	Genda, uz’ ukoranye abashingantahe b’Abisirayeli, ubabgire, ut’ Uhoraho, Imana ya ba sogokuruza, yaranyiyeretse, ari yo Mana ya Aburahamu, Imana ya Isaka, Imana ya Yakobo, irambarira, iti N’ukuri nabagendeye, mbona ivyo babagirira muri Egiputa:
After affliction and harsh labor, Judah has gone into exile. She dwells among the nations; she finds no resting place. All who pursue her have overtaken her in the midst of her distress.	Abayuda bajanywe ar’ inyagano, bitewe n’agahahazo no kuja mu buja bukomeye; Baba mu banyamahanga, ntibahabona uburuhukiro: Ababadendereza bose bābahambirije ahantu h’inkōnywa.
What I tell you in the dark, speak in the daylight; what is whispered in your ear, proclaim from the roofs.	Ico mbabaririra mu mwiza muze mukivugire mu muco, kand’ ico mwongorewe mu gutwi muze mukivugire ku mazu hejuru.
When Samuel reached him, Saul said, “The Lord bless you! I have carried out the Lord ’s instructions.”	Maze Samweli ashikīra Sauli; Sauli aramubarira, at’ Uragahezagirwa n’Uhoraho! Ico Uhoraho yambariye nāgishikije.
I know all about Ephraim; Israel is not hidden from me. Ephraim, you have now turned to prostitution; Israel is corrupt.	Efurayimu ndamuzi, kandi Isirayeli na we ntanyihishije: erega wakoze ivy’ ubusambanyi, ewe Efurayimu, Isirayeli na we yarihumanije.
This is the passage of Scripture the eunuch was reading: “He was led like a sheep to the slaughter, and as a lamb before its shearer is silent, so he did not open his mouth.	Igihimba co mu vyanditswe yasoma cār’ iki, ngo Yajanywe nk’intama bajana mw ibāgiro, Nk’uk’ umwagazi w’intama utekerereza imbere y’uwukemura Ni kw atākūyek’ umunwa.
The prince is to enter from the outside through the portico of the gateway and stand by the gatepost. The priests are to sacrifice his burnt offering and his fellowship offerings. He is to bow down in worship at the threshold of the gateway and then go out, but the gate will not be shut until evening.	Segaba az’ ashikeyo aciye mu rubaraza rw’ikirimba ruhera inyuma, maz’ ahagarare i ruhande y’ igikingi c’ikirimba; abaherezi baze bamutangire ikimazi ciwe co kwoswa n’ibimazi vyiwe vy’ishimwe, maz’ asengere mw ishikiro ry’ico kirimba, aheze aveyo; arikw ico kirimba ntikize kijishwe gushitsa ku mugoroba.
“Both high and low will die in this land. They will not be buried or mourned, and no one will cut themselves or shave their head for the dead.	Abakuru n’abato bazopfira mur’ iki gihugu: ntibazohambga, kand’ abantu ntibazobaborogera, canke ngo bikebagure, canke ngo babīmwēre ibimwerere:
and who have fallen away, to be brought back to repentance. To their loss they are crucifying the Son of God all over again and subjecting him to public disgrace.	maze bakagwa bakabivamwo, ntibishoboka gusubira kubahindura basha ngo bihane: kuko bongera kwibambira Umwana w’Imana, bakamutēterereza ahibonekeza.
On the eighth day they held an assembly, for they had celebrated the dedication of the altar for seven days and the festival for seven days more.	Ku musi ugira umunani bagira ikoraniro ry’agahebuza, kuko bari bamaze imisi ndwi mu vyo gushikiriza Imana igicaniro, baraheza basubira kugira iyindi misi mikuru ndwi.
‘Every seventh year each of you must free any fellow Hebrews who have sold themselves to you. After they have served you six years, you must let them go free.’ Your ancestors, however, did not listen to me or pay attention to me.	nt’ Ukw imyaka ndwi igiye gushira, umuntu wese az’ arekure mugenzi we w’Umuheburayo, uwo yaguze akamukorera imyaka ndwi, amurekure amuveko, abe uwidegemvya: yamara ba sogokuruza ntibānyumvira, canke ngo bantege ugutwi.
All wrongdoing is sin, and there is sin that does not lead to death.	Kugabitanya kwose n’icaha, kandi har’ icaha kitar’ ico kwicisha.
For I am the Lord your God, the Holy One of Israel, your Savior; I give Egypt for your ransom, Cush and Seba in your stead.	Kuko jewe nd’ Uhoraho Imana yawe, Uwera wa Isirayeli, Umukiza wawe. Nagutangiriye Egiputa kw incungu, Etiyopiya na Seba nahahevye kubgawe.
“Aaron must burn fragrant incense on the altar every morning when he tends the lamps.	Aroni az’ ahore acoserezakw imibavu y’ibintu bimoga: az’ ayose uko bukeye mu gitondo, agiye gutunganya ya matara.
The Lord has rewarded me according to my righteousness, according to the cleanness of my hands in his sight.	Ni co catumye Uhoraho anyishura ibikwiranye n’ukugororoka kwanje, Ibikwiranye n’ukutandura kw’ amaboko yanje mu nyonga ziwe.
‘This is what the Lord says: Do not go up to fight against your brothers, the Israelites. Go home, every one of you, for this is my doing.’ ” So they obeyed the word of the Lord and went home again, as the Lord had ordered.	ut’ Uku ni k’Uhoraho agize, ngo Ntimuze mudūge kurwanya ab’ i wanyu b’Abisirayeli; ngo Ni mwitahire, umuntu wese asubire i we; ngo Kukw ivyabaye vyavuye kuri we. Nuko bumvira ijambo ry’Uhoraho, baritahira, nk’uk’ Uhoraho yavuze.
Nadab son of Jeroboam became king of Israel in the second year of Asa king of Judah, and he reigned over Israel two years.	Mu mwaka ugira kabiri Asa umwami w’i Buyuda ari ku ngoma, ni ho Nadabu mwene Yerobowamu yima mu Bgisirayeli; amara imyaka ibiri aganza Abisirayeli.
Gera, Shephuphan and Huram.	na Gera na Shefufani na Huramu.
Listen! The report is coming— a great commotion from the land of the north! It will make the towns of Judah desolate, a haunt of jackals.	Umve ijwi ry’impuha, ngw imivurungano ikomeye iraje, ivuye mu gihugu c’i burārūko, kugira ngw ibisagara vy’i Buyuda bigirwe imisaka, habe i wabo w’imbgebge.
We will certainly do everything we said we would: We will burn incense to the Queen of Heaven and will pour out drink offerings to her just as we and our ancestors, our kings and our officials did in the towns of Judah and in the streets of Jerusalem. At that time we had plenty of food and were well off and suffered no harm.	Ariko ntituzobura gushitsa ijambo ryose rivuye mu kanwa kacu, ngo twosereze imibavu umwamikazi wo mw ijuru, tumusukire n’ibiturire, nk’uko twahora dukora, twe na ba sogokuruza n’abami bacu n’abaganwa bacu, mu bisagara vy’i Buyuda no mu nzira z’i Yerusalemu: kukw ico gihe twagira indya nyinshi, tukibera amahoro, nta vyago twabona.
On the evening of the fourteenth day of the month, while camped at Gilgal on the plains of Jericho, the Israelites celebrated the Passover.	Nukw Abisirayeli bagishagaje i Gilugali barya ivya Pasika ku musi ugira icumi na kane w’ukwo kwezi, ku mugoroba, bari mu kiyaya c’i Yeriko.

Then Abraham breathed his last and died at a good old age, an old man and full of years; and he was gathered to his people.	Aburahamu aracīkāna, atāmbūra ageze mu zabukuru, apfa yisāziye neza; ahamvya ababo.
“Enough!” Samuel said to Saul. “Let me tell you what the Lord said to me last night.” “Tell me,” Saul replied.	Maze Samweli yishura Sauli, ati Hagarara! Hinge nkubarire nanje ivyo Uhoraho yarāye ambariye iri joro. Aramwishura, at’ Ego, vuga.
As the Lord had declared, Nebuchadnezzar removed the treasures from the temple of the Lord and from the royal palace, and cut up the gold articles that Solomon king of Israel had made for the temple of the Lord .	Asahura ibitunzwe vyose mu ngoro y’Uhoraho, bo n’ivyo mu ngoro y’umwami, amenagura n’ ibintu vyose vy’imbombovu vy’ izahabu vyari mu rusengero rw’ Uhoraho, ivyo Salomo umwami w’Abisirayeli yari yaracurishije, nk’uk’ Uhoraho yavuze.
Zipporah gave birth to a son, and Moses named him Gershom, saying, “I have become a foreigner in a foreign land.”	Avyara umuhungu, se amwita Gerushomu, ati Nabaye inyambukīra mu gihugu kitar’ icacu.
The priest is to put some of the oil remaining in his palm on the lobe of the right ear of the one to be cleansed, on the thumb of their right hand and on the big toe of their right foot, on top of the blood of the guilt offering.	amavuta asigaye ku rushi rwiwe, uwo muherezi ayakoze ku gutwi kw’i buryo kw’uyo arikw arahumanurwa, ahahera hejuru, no ku rukumu rwiwe rw’i buryo, no kw ino ryiwe rinini ry’i buryo, aharoye ya maraso y’ikimazi c’impongano.
I will thrust you from my presence, just as I did all your fellow Israelites, the people of Ephraim.’	Kandi nzobahinda mbirukane mu nyonga zanje, nk’uko nahinze bene wanyu bose, ni bo ruvyaro rwose rwa Efurayimu.
“Right then three men who had been sent to me from Caesarea stopped at the house where I was staying.	Uwo mwanya abagabo batatu bavuye i Kayisariya, bantumweko, bahagarara imbere y’inzu turimwo.
Hezekiah and all the people rejoiced at what God had brought about for his people, because it was done so quickly.	Nuko Hezekiya agira akanyamuneza, bo n’abantu bose, kubg’ ivyo Imana yateguriye abantu, kuko vyakozwe giturumbuka.
“Yet you ask, ‘Why does the son not share the guilt of his father?’ Since the son has done what is just and right and has been careful to keep all my decrees, he will surely live.	Yamara muravuga ng’ Umwana n’iki kimubujije kuzira ibigabitanyo vya se? Ereg’ umwana ni yakora ibitunganye n’ibikwiye, akitondera ivyagezwe vyanje vyose, akabishitsa, ntazobura kubaho.
Then compare our appearance with that of the young men who eat the royal food, and treat your servants in accordance with what you see.”	uheze uze witegereze mu maso hacu no mu maso h’abasore barya ku vyo kurya vy’umwami; maz’ uk’ uzobona bimeze, abe ari k’uzotugenza, twebge abasavyi bawe.
Listen, my son, accept what I say, and the years of your life will be many.	Mwana wanje, ni wumve, wemere amajambo yanje, Ni ho imyaka y’ukubaho kwawe izoba myinshi.
“Go and inquire of the Lord for me and for the remnant in Israel and Judah about what is written in this book that has been found. Great is the Lord ’s anger that is poured out on us because those who have gone before us have not kept the word of the Lord ; they have not acted in accordance with all that is written in this book.”	ati Ni mugende munsigurize Uhoraho, twe n’amasigarira yo mu Bisirayeli no mu Bayuda, ivy’ amajambo yo mur’ ico gitabo batoye; kuk’ uburake bg’Uhoraho budusutsweko ari bginshi, kubga ba sogokuruza batumviye ijambo ry’Uhoraho, ngo bakore ivyanditswe mur’ iki gitabo vyose.
How skilled you are at pursuing love! Even the worst of women can learn from your ways.	Ewe kuntu ugira amīsīgiranzira kugira ngo bakugomwe! Bitayeko wahavuye wigisha n’abagore b’abanyavyaha ingeso zawe!
From you, Nineveh, has one come forth who plots evil against the Lord and devises wicked plans.	Muri wewe haturutse uwagiye imigabo mibi k’Uhoraho, aja inama y’ibibi.
The vision concerning Judah and Jerusalem that Isaiah son of Amoz saw during the reigns of Uzziah, Jotham, Ahaz and Hezekiah, kings of Judah.	Ivyo Yesaya mwene Amosi yeretswe, ivyo yabonye ku b’i Buyuda n’i Yerusalemu, ku ngoma ya Uziya no ku ya Yotamu no ku ya Ahazi no ku ya Hezekiya, abami b’i Buyuda.
Be merciful to those who doubt;	Ababahāririza mubahanūre:
Jesus returned to Galilee in the power of the Spirit, and news about him spread through the whole countryside.	Maze Yesu asubira i Galilaya, ari n’ubushobozi bga Mpwemu, inkuru yiwe ikwira mu gihugu cose kihakikije.
Better to live on a corner of the roof than share a house with a quarrelsome wife.	Wopfuma wībēra hanze, Hak’ ubana n’umugore w’ ingāre mu nzu.
As soon as all the people saw Jesus, they were overwhelmed with wonder and ran to greet him.	Uwo mwanya ishengero ryose rimurabutswe riratangara rwose, barirukanga baramusanganira, baramuramutsa.
Will they not instruct you and tell you? Will they not bring forth words from their understanding?	Mbeg’ abo ntibokwigisha, bakakwīgānira, Bakavuga amajambo bakūye mu mitima yabo?
My brothers and sisters, if one of you should wander from the truth and someone should bring that person back,	Bene Data, ni hagira umuntu muri mwebge azimira, akava ku vy’ ukuri, uwundi akamuzimurura,
Even in the case of lifeless things that make sounds, such as the pipe or harp, how will anyone know what tune is being played unless there is a distinction in the notes?	Kandi n’ibidafise ubugingo biri n’amajwi: umwironge iy’ udatandukanije ijwi, cank’ inanga, bomenya bate irivuzwa cank’ iricurarangwa?
Elijah took twelve stones, one for each of the tribes descended from Jacob, to whom the word of the Lord had come, saying, “Your name shall be Israel.”	Araheza yābīra amabuye cumi n’abiri, nk’ukw igitigiri c’imiryango ya bene Yakobo kingana, ari we nyene ijambo ry’Uhoraho ryajeko, riti Isirayeli ni ryo ribaye izina ryawe.
Let us behave decently, as in the daytime, not in carousing and drunkenness, not in sexual immorality and debauchery, not in dissension and jealousy.	Tugendane ingeso nziza, nk’abagenda ku murango, tutadandahirwa, tutaborerwa, tudasambana, tudakora ivy’ isoni nke, tudatongana, tutagira ishari.
All the peoples of the earth are regarded as nothing. He does as he pleases with the powers of heaven and the peoples of the earth. No one can hold back his hand or say to him: “What have you done?”	Kand’ ababa kw isi bose ibagereranya n’ubusa, kand’ ikora ukw igomba mu ngabo zo mw ijuru, no mu baba kw isi; kandi nta wushobora kubuza ukuboko kwayo, canke kuyibaza, at’ Ukora iki?
In the thirty-eighth year of Azariah king of Judah, Zechariah son of Jeroboam became king of Israel in Samaria, and he reigned six months.	Mu mwaka ugira mirongwitatu n’umunani Uziya umwami w’i Buyuda ari ku ngoma, ni ho Zekariya mwene Yerobowamu yima i Samariya mu Bisirayeli; amara amezi atandatu ari ku ngoma.
David took the gold shields carried by the officers of Hadadezer and brought them to Jerusalem.	Kandi Dawidi yari yaranyaze abantu ba Hadadezeri inkinzo z’izahabu bari bafise, azijana i Yerusalemu.
It happened as the man of God had said to the king: “About this time tomorrow, a seah of the finest flour will sell for a shekel and two seahs of barley for a shekel at the gate of Samaria.”	Birashika nk’uk’ uwo muntu w’Imana yabariye umwami, at’ Ejo nk’aya mango, kw irembo ry’i Samariya, ingero y’ifu igogōretse izogurwa shekeli imwe, kandi n’ingero zibiri za sayiri zizogurwa shekeli imwe nyene;
“ ‘This is what the Sovereign Lord says: You have gone far enough, princes of Israel! Give up your violence and oppression and do what is just and right. Stop dispossessing my people, declares the Sovereign Lord .	Uku ni k’Umwami Uhoraho agize, ati Birahāgije, yemwe ba segaba b’Abisirayeli: ni mureke umuryano no kunyaga, ni muce imanza zibereye n’iziroranye; mukūre ku bantu banje akadenderezo mubadendereza, ni k’Umwami Uhoraho agize.
On my account you will be brought before governors and kings as witnesses to them and to the Gentiles.	Bazobajana imbere y’abaganza n’abami babampōra, muzoba ikimenyetso kibabere icabona, bo n’abanyamahanga.
The Israelites and Absalom camped in the land of Gilead.	Maze Abusalomu n’Abisirayeli basagaza mu gihugu c’i Gileyadi.
and that in this matter no one should wrong or take advantage of a brother or sister. Then Ehud went out to the porch ; he shut the doors of the upper room behind him and locked them.	Maze Ehudi arasohoka, ashitse ku rubaraza aramwugarana, yugaza inzugi z’ico cumba urupfunguzo.
The alcoves and the projecting walls inside the gateway were surmounted by narrow parapet openings all around, as was the portico; the openings all around faced inward. The faces of the projecting walls were decorated with palm trees. For Samaria’s plague is incurable; it has spread to Judah. It has reached the very gate of my people, even to Jerusalem itself.	Kuk’ uruguma rwaho rutazovūrika: mbere rwashitse n’i Buyuda; rushika kw irembo ry’ abantu banje, mbere rurinda rushika n’i Yerusalemu.

Since you are precious and honored in my sight, and because I love you, I will give people in exchange for you, nations in exchange for your life.	Kuko wabaye uw’ igiciro kinini mu nyonga zanje, n’umwubahwa, nanje nkagukunda, ni co gitumye nzoheba abantu kubgawe, n’amahanga kubg’ ubugingo bgawe.
Now, brothers and sisters, if I come to you and speak in tongues, what good will I be to you, unless I bring you some revelation or knowledge or prophecy or word of instruction? Whoever does not obey the law of your God and the law of the king must surely be punished by death, banishment, confiscation of property, or imprisonment.
