I asked the angel who was speaking to me, “What are these?” He answered me, “These are the horns that scattered Judah, Israel and Jerusalem.”	Mbaza umumarayika twavugana, nt’ Ivyo n’ibiki? Aranyishura, at’ Ayo ni yo mahembe yasābagije Abayuda n’Abisirayeli n’ab’i Yerusalemu.
Then the angel said to me, “The waters you saw, where the prostitute sits, are peoples, multitudes, nations and languages.	Arambgira, ati Ya mazi wabonye, maraya yicarako, ni yo moko n’amakungu y’abantu n’amahanga n’indimi.
But someone will say, “You have faith; I have deeds.” Show me your faith without deeds, and I will show you my faith by my deeds.	Nk’umuntu yovuga, ati Weho ufise ukwizera, jeho mfise ibikorwa: nyereka ukwizera kwawe kutagira ibikorwa, nanje ndakwereka ukwizera kwanje guserurwa n’ibikorwa vyanje.
By the blast of your nostrils the waters piled up. The surging waters stood up like a wall; the deep waters congealed in the heart of the sea.	Gufuha kwo mu mazuru yawe kwarundanije amazi, Imipfunda yema nk’ikirundo; I bgina muri nyina w’ikiyaga haravura.
“And remember, you have with you Shimei son of Gera, the Benjamite from Bahurim, who called down bitter curses on me the day I went to Mahanaim. When the angel of the Lord had spoken these things to all the Israelites, the people wept aloud,	Maz’ umumarayika w’Uhoraho amaze kubgira Abisirayeli bose ayo majambo, abantu baraturikisha bararira.

Then Jesus told him, “Because you have seen me, you have believed; blessed are those who have not seen and yet have believed.”	Yesu aramubgira, ati Wijejwe n’uk’ umbonye. Hahirwa abatarinze kubona, yamara bakizera.
For the Spirit God gave us does not make us timid, but gives us power, love and self-discipline.	Kukw Imana itaduhaye umutima w’ubujora: ariko yaduhaye uw’ ubushobozi n’urukundo n’ukwirinda.

Jehoiada the priest sent out the commanders of units of a hundred, who were in charge of the troops, and said to them: “Bring her out between the ranks and put to the sword anyone who follows her.” For the priest had said, “Do not put her to death at the temple of the Lord .”	Maz’ umuherezi Yehoyada abarira abagabisha bagaba amajana, bashiriweho kugaba ingabo zose, ati Ni mumusohore, mumucishe hagati y’imirongo y’ingabo, kandi ni hagira ūmukurikira ni yicishwe inkota; kuk’ uwo muherezi yar’ avuze, ngo Ntimumutsinde mu ngoro y’Uhoraho.
When her master got up in the morning and opened the door of the house and stepped out to continue on his way, there lay his concubine, fallen in the doorway of the house, with her hands on the threshold.	Maz’ umugabo wiwe mu gatondo aravyuka, yugurura urugi rw’inzu, arasohoka agira ngw agende. Asanga uwo mugore wiwe arambaraye imbere y’umuryango w’inzu, ibiganza vyiwe biri mu rwinjiriro.

Then they will have towns to live in and pasturelands for the cattle they own and all their other animals.	Ivyo bisagara bize bibe ivyabo vyo kubamwo, amaragiro na yo az’ abe ay’amasho yabo n’ibitungwa vyabo n’ibindi baragiye vyose.

In the tent of meeting, outside the curtain that shields the ark of the covenant law, Aaron and his sons are to keep the lamps burning before the Lord from evening till morning. because you carefully follow all these laws I command you today—to love the Lord your God and to walk always in obedience to him—then you are to set aside three more cities.	ni mwitondera ibi vyagezwe vyose mbagera uyu musi, mukabishitsa, mugakunda Uhoraho Imana yanyu, mukāma mugendera mu nzira ziwe, azokibaha; maze muze muheze mwironderere ibindi bisagara bitatu, mubigereke kuri vya bindi bitatu vyari bisanzwe;

and the idols will totally disappear.	Ibigirwamana bizoherengetera rwose.
To the person who pleases him, God gives wisdom, knowledge and happiness, but to the sinner he gives the task of gathering and storing up wealth to hand it over to the one who pleases God. So then, about eating food sacrificed to idols: We know that “An idol is nothing at all in the world” and that “There is no God but one.”	Nuko, ku vyo kurya ivyaterekerejwe ibigirwamana, turazi yukw igishushanyo atar’ ikintu mw isi, kandi yukw ata mana yindi iriho, atar’ Imwe.

The eyes of the Lord are everywhere, keeping watch on the wicked and the good.	Inyonga z’Uhoraho zir’ ahantu hose, Zītegereza ababi n’abeza.
This is the account of the heavens and the earth when they were created, when the Lord God made the earth and the heavens.	Aya ni yo mamo y’ijuru n’isi igihe vyaremwa, umusi Uhoraho Imana yaremeyekw isi n’ijuru.
Listen to what the Lord says: “Stand up, plead my case before the mountains; let the hills hear what you have to say.	Enda ni mwumve ico Uhoraho avuga, ati Va hasi, ubūranire imbere y’imisozi, uturambi ni twumve ijwi ryawe.
When the Egyptians see you, they will say, ‘This is his wife.’ Then they will kill me but will let you live.	nukw Abanyegiputa ni bakubona, bazovuga, bat’ Uyo n’umugore wiwe, baheze banyice, nawe bakureke.
Do not let them think, “Aha, just what we wanted!” or say, “We have swallowed him up.”	Ntibibgire mu mitima yabo, bati Ha ha! Ico ni co twagomba. Ntibavuge, bati Turamuyongobeje.
Paltiel son of Azzan, the leader from the tribe of Issachar;	mu muryango w’ Abisakari umukuru az’ abe Palutiyeli mwene Azani;
Consequently, you are no longer foreigners and strangers, but fellow citizens with God’s people and also members of his household,	Nuko ntimukir’ abashitsi n’akavantara, ariko musangiye ubgoko n’abera, mur’ abo mu ngoro y’Imana;
When he finished speaking, he threw away the jawbone; and the place was called Ramath Lehi.	Ahejeje kuvuga artyo, ashibura rwa rwāsaya yar’ afise mu minwe; aho hantu haca hitwa Ramati‐lehi.
And the Levites carried the ark of God with the poles on their shoulders, as Moses had commanded in accordance with the word of the Lord .	Bashitseyo, Abalewi barerura iyo sandugu y’ Imana, bashira iminiho yayo ku bitugu, nk’uko Mose yageze, bivuye kw ijambo ry’Uhoraho.
These are the provincial leaders who settled in Jerusalem (now some Israelites, priests, Levites, temple servants and descendants of Solomon’s servants lived in the towns of Judah, each on their own property in the various towns,	Aba ni bo bāgaba intāra bāba i Yerusalemu; ariko mu bisagara vy’i Buyuda umuntu wese yaba kw itongo ryiwe mu gisagara c’i wabo, Abisirayeli bose n’abaherezi, n’Abalewi n’abahawe ibango ry’ibikorwa vy’urusengero, bo n’ abākomotse ku basavyi ba Salomo.
Its back has rows of shields tightly sealed together;	Ibigaragamba vyayo vy’inkomezi ni vyo igenda yishinzako; Bigerekeranye hamwe nk’ ivyamatanijwe rwose.
After he said this, he was taken up before their very eyes, and a cloud hid him from their sight.	Amaze kuvuga artyo, adūzwa babona, igicu kimukūra mu maso yabo.
What you heard from me, keep as the pattern of sound teaching, with faith and love in Christ Jesus.	Gumya icitegererezo c’amajambo mazima wanyumvanye, ukigumishe ukwizera n’urukundo rubonerwa muri Kristo Yesu.
Leaning back against Jesus, he asked him, “Lord, who is it?”	Uyo rero ahengamira inyuma, uko yari hano nyene mu gikiriza ca Yesu, aramubaza, ati Ni nde ga Mugenzi?
when the keepers of the house tremble, and the strong men stoop, when the grinders cease because they are few, and those looking through the windows grow dim;	ku musi abazigamyi b’inzu bazotetemera, kand’ abanyenkomezi bakabunda, abasya bagasigaho kuko babaye bake, kand’ abarungurukira mu madirisha bagahuma;
Then Jesus said to the crowds and to his disciples:	Maze Yesu abarira ishengero n’abigishwa biwe,
The voice of the Lord is over the waters; the God of glory thunders, the Lord thunders over the mighty waters.	Ijwi ry’Uhoraho rihindira hejuru y’amazi: Imana y’icubahiro ihindisha inkuba, Ni we Uhoraho ahindishiriza inkuba hejuru y’amazi menshi.
Allammelek, Amad and Mishal. On the west the boundary touched Carmel and Shihor Libnath.	n’i Alameleki n’i Amadi n’i Mishali, nuko rugashika i Karumeli ahahera i burengerazuba, rugashika n’i Shihori‐libunati;
If, however, the woman has not made herself impure, but is clean, she will be cleared of guilt and will be able to have children.	Arik’ uwo mugore ni yaba atāhumanye, ntiyandure, azoba yēze, ntibizomubuza gusama inda.
The Egyptians will lose heart, and I will bring their plans to nothing; they will consult the idols and the spirits of the dead, the mediums and the spiritists.	Umutima wa Egiputa uzokamangana, nanje nzokwica imigabo yaho; bazoja gusiguza ibigirwamana n’abavovota n’abahamagara imizimu bo n’abamenyi.
Anyone who rejected the law of Moses died without mercy on the testimony of two or three witnesses.	Ūkēngereye ivyagezwe vya Mose, ivyabona bibiri canke bitatu biramwicisha, ata kagongwe.
How long, Lord ? Will you forget me forever? How long will you hide your face from me?	Uhoraho, uzogeza hehe kwama unyibagira imisi yose? Uzogeza hehe kumpisha mu nyonga hawe?
So from now on we regard no one from a worldly point of view. Though we once regarded Christ in this way, we do so no longer.	Ni co gituma uhereye none tutakigira uwo tumenya ku vyo ku rukoba; naho twari tuzi Kristo mu vy’ umubiri, ariko none ntitukimumenya durtyo.
I was eyes to the blind and feet to the lame.	Nar’ amaso y’impumyi, Nar’ ibirenge vy’ūcumbagira.
He brought us to this place and gave us this land, a land flowing with milk and honey;	Araheza atuzana ino, aduha iki gihugu, ar’ igihugu gitemba amata n’ubūki.
when he appointed his own priests for the high places and for the goat and calf idols he had made.	Yerobowamu akīshirirah’ abandi baherezi bo mu bitabo vyo ku mpinga z’imisozi, ngo bahēreze ibisigo vy’amapfizi y’impene n’ibishushanyo vy’ amamasa yacurishije.
“ ‘But if you will not listen to me and carry out all these commands,	Ariko ni mutanyumvira, ntimwitondere ivyo vyagezwe vyose,
There they are to present their offerings to the Lord : a year-old male lamb without defect for a burnt offering, a year-old ewe lamb without defect for a sin offering, a ram without defect for a fellowship offering,	anzanire ishikanwa ryiwe, jewe Uhoraho: azane isuguru imwe y’intama itarengeje umwaka, itagira agasembga, kw ikimazi co kwoswa, bo n’ishashi imwe y’ intama itarengeje umwaka nyene, itagira agasembga, kw ikimazi co gutangirwa ivyaha, n’impfizi y’intama imwe itagira agasembga kw ikimazi c’ishimwe,

On the eighth day she must take two doves or two young pigeons and bring them to the priest at the entrance to the tent of meeting.	Ku musi ugira umunani, yijanire intunguru zibiri cank’ ivyana vy’inuma bibiri, abishīre umuherezi ku muryango w’ihema ry’ibonaniro;
A glorious throne, exalted from the beginning, is the place of our sanctuary.	Ahantu h’ahēra hacu ni ho ntebe y’icubahiro, ishizwe hejuru uhereye mbere na mbere.
Who is blind but my servant, and deaf like the messenger I send? Who is blind like the one in covenant with me, blind like the servant of the Lord ?	Ni nde mpumyi atar’ umushumba wanje, canke gipfamatwi nk’intumwa yanje ntuma? Ni nde mpumyi nk’ umugendanyi wanje, kand’ ahumye nk’umushumba wanje, jewe Uhoraho?
“A horrible and shocking thing has happened in the land:	Habonetse ikintu c’akumiza giteye ubgoba mu gihugu:
In fact, when we were with you, we kept telling you that we would be persecuted. And it turned out that way, as you well know.	Kandi hamwe twari kumwe namwe, twababūriye yuko tutazobura kubabazwa; kandi ni ko vyābaye, murabizi.
Your servant Joab did this to change the present situation. My lord has wisdom like that of an angel of God—he knows everything that happens in the land.”	icamuteye kugenza artyo kwar’ ukugira ngw ivyabaye abihindure ukundi. Kandi ga mugenzi, ufise ubgenge nk’ubg’ umumarayika w’ Imana, umenya ibiri mw isi vyose.
There he met a Jew named Aquila, a native of Pontus, who had recently come from Italy with his wife Priscilla, because Claudius had ordered all Jews to leave Rome. Paul went to see them,	Abonye Umuyuda yitwa Akwila, amamo yiwe n’i Ponto, yar’ avuye muri Italiya mur’ iyo misi, bo n’umugore wiwe Purisikila, kuko Kilawudiyo yari yageze kw Abayuda bose bava i Roma, aja aho bari.
“Son of man, prophesy against Gog and say: ‘This is what the Sovereign Lord says: I am against you, Gog, chief prince of Meshek and Tubal.	Nuko rero, mwana w’umuntu, ubūrire Gogi, ut’ Uku ni k’Umwami Uhoraho agize, at’ Ehe nzohigūra nawe, ewe Gogi, wa mwami w’i Roshi n’i Mesheki n’i Tubali:
Then the word of the Lord came to me:	Ijambo ry’Uhoraho rinzako,
Mary Magdalene and the other Mary were sitting there opposite the tomb.	Mariya Magadalene na Mariya wundi ni ho bāri bari, bicaye berekeye ku mva.
These were the men counted by Moses and Aaron and the twelve leaders of Israel, each one representing his family.	Abo ni bo bāharūwe na Mose na Aroni bafatanije na ba bakuru b’Abisirayeli ukw ar’ icumi na babiri, umwe‐umwe wo mu nzu ya ba sekuruza.
The next day we set sail from there and arrived off Chios. The day after that we crossed over to Samos, and on the following day arrived at Miletus.	Tuvuyeyo, bukeye bg’aho dushika imbere y’i Kiyo, ku musi ugira gatatu dufata i Samo, bukeye dufata i Mileto.
And I, when I am lifted up from the earth, will draw all people to myself.”	Nanje ni namanikwa hejuru y’isi, nzokwikwegerako bose.
He said to them: “It is not for you to know the times or dates the Father has set by his own authority.	Arabishura, ati S’ivyanyu kumenya imisi cank’ ibihe Data yashinze n’ububasha bgiwe wenyene;
Two of every kind of bird, of every kind of animal and of every kind of creature that moves along the ground will come to you to be kept alive.	Mu biguruka, nk’ukw amoko yavyo ari, no mu bitungano, nk’ ukw amoko yavyo ari, no mu vyikwega hasi vyose, nk’ukw amoko yavyo ari, bibiri‐bibiri vy’amoko yose bizoza ah’ uri, ngo birokoke.
But I took your father Abraham from the land beyond the Euphrates and led him throughout Canaan and gave him many descendants. I gave him Isaac,	Bukeye njana sogokuruza wanyu Aburahamu, ndamukūra hakurya y’urwo ruzi, mmugēndūza igihugu cose c’i Kanani, mmuha kurondoka; mmuha Isaka,
When she poured this perfume on my body, she did it to prepare me for burial.	Igitumye ansuka ayo mavuta ku mubiri n’ukuntegurira guhambga.
I have made you known to them, and will continue to make you known in order that the love you have for me may be in them and that I myself may be in them.”	Nabamenyesheje izina ryawe, kandi nzoribamenyesha, ng’ urukundo wankunze rube muri bo, nanje mbe muri bo.
Therefore, my dear friends, as you have always obeyed—not only in my presence, but now much more in my absence—continue to work out your salvation with fear and trembling,	Nuko rer’ abo nkunda, nk’uko mwamye muganduka abe ari ko mushitsa agakiza kanyu, mutinya muhinda agashitsi, yamara s’iyo ndiho gusa, ariko n’ubu nyene naho ntar’ iyo ni murushirize.
then hear from heaven and forgive the sin of your people Israel and bring them back to the land you gave to their ancestors.	nuk’ uz’ uvyumve uri mw ijuru, uharire icaha c’abantu bawe b’Abisirayeli, ubagarukane mu gihugu wahaye ba sekuruza.
A horse is a vain hope for deliverance; despite all its great strength it cannot save.	Ifarasi nta kimazi igira co gukiza, Ntizorokoresha umuntu inkomezi zayo nyinshi.
Yet Jeroboam son of Nebat, an official of Solomon son of David, rebelled against his master.	Ariko Yerobowamu mwene Nebati, umushumba wa Salomo mwene Dawidi, yarahagurutse agarariza shebuja.
“Far be it from me!” Joab replied, “Far be it from me to swallow up or destroy!	Yowabu aramwishura, ati Biragahera! Biragahera ko hogira ico noyongobeza canke nogeseza!
The angel of the Lord came back a second time and touched him and said, “Get up and eat, for the journey is too much for you.”	Umumarayika w’Uhoraho agaruka ubugira kabiri, aramukoma, aramubarira, ati Vyuka urye, urugendo ntirukunanire kukw ari rurerure.
This righteousness is given through faith in Jesus Christ to all who believe. There is no difference between Jew and Gentile,	n’ukugororoka kuva ku Mana, kuzanwa no kwizera Yesu Kristo, kugira ngw abizeye bose baguhabge. Kukw ata tandukaniro;

Now the Festival of Unleavened Bread, called the Passover, was approaching,	Imisi mikuru y’imitsima itambiwe, yitwa Pasika, yagira ishike.
Again, take a few of these and throw them into the fire and burn them up. A fire will spread from there to all Israel.	Kandi kur’ uwo nyene uwukūrekw akandi gakeya, ugaterere mu muriro, ugaturire; aho ni ho hazova umuriro uzoshika ku nzu yose ya Isirayeli.
At the sound of horsemen and archers every town takes to flight. Some go into the thickets; some climb up among the rocks. All the towns are deserted; no one lives in them.	Abo mu bisagara vyose bahungishijwe n’urwamo rw’abagendera ku mafarasi n’urw’ abanyamiheto; banyegera mu bisaka, būrira ku bitandara hejuru: igisagara cose gisigara ar’ umurara ata n’umwe akihaba.
So about three thousand went up; but they were routed by the men of Ai,	Nuko mu bantu havamwo nk’ibihumbi bitatu, badūgayo: arikw abantu b’i Hayi barabirukana.
Just as there were many who were appalled at him — his appearance was so disfigured beyond that of any human being and his form marred beyond human likeness—	Nk’uko benshi yababereye akumiza — kuko mu maso hiwe hononekaye ntihase n’ah’ umuntu, n’ishusho yiwe yononekaye ntise n’iy’ abana b’abantu —
There will always be poor people in the land. Therefore I command you to be openhanded toward your fellow Israelites who are poor and needy in your land.	Kukw abakene ata ho bazobura kubaho mu gihugu; ni co gitumye mbabarira, nti Ntimuze mubure kuramvurira ukuboko umukene w’ umworo wo mu b’i wanyu muri mu gihugu canyu.
One who is slack in his work is brother to one who destroys.	Kand’ ūdeha mu gikorwa ciwe Aba ar’ incuti y’ūtikiza.
All flying insects are unclean to you; do not eat them.	Kand’ udukōko twose tw’amababa tunyonyera, na two n’umuziro kuri mwebge: ntimuze muturye.
So the cloud of the Lord was over the tabernacle by day, and fire was in the cloud by night, in the sight of all the Israelites during all their travels.	Kukw ico gicu c’Uhoraho ku murango caba kur’ iryo hema, mw ijoro kikākamw’ umuriro, imbere y’ab’ inzu ya Isirayeli bose, mu rugendo rwabo rwose.
and in one body to reconcile both of them to God through the cross, by which he put to death their hostility.	kandi ngw ayo macakubiri, amaze kuyagira umubiri umwe, ayuzurishe n’Imana umusaraba, awicishije bga bgansi.
I will deliver into the hands of their enemies who want to kill them. Their dead bodies will become food for the birds and the wild animals.	nzobatanga mu maboko y’abansi babo, no mu maboko y’ababahiga ngo babice, kand’ imivyimba yabo izoba inyama z’ibisīga vyo mu kirēre n’iz’ ibikōko vyo kw isi.

“And they will go out and look on the dead bodies of those who rebelled against me; the worms that eat them will not die, the fire that burns them will not be quenched, and they will be loathsome to all mankind.”	Nuko bazosohoka baje kwitegereza imivyimba y’abangararije; kukw inyo zabo zitazopfa, kandi n’umuriro wabo ntuzime; kandi bazotera abantu bose ishishi.

From the musicians: Eliashib. From the gatekeepers: Shallum, Telem and Uri.	Mu baririmvyi, ni Eliyashibu; mu bashibamyi, ni Shalumu na Telemu na Uri.
The people of Jerusalem made Ahaziah, Jehoram’s youngest son, king in his place, since the raiders, who came with the Arabs into the camp, had killed all the older sons. So Ahaziah son of Jehoram king of Judah began to reign.	Maz’ ababa i Yerusalemu bimika Ahaziya umuhererezi wiwe ngw asubire ku ngoma yiwe, kuko ca gitero cari kizananye n’ Abarabo mu rugamba cari cishe bakuru biwe bose. Nuko Ahaziya mwene Yehoramu umwami w’ Abayuda aba ari we yima.
When Bathsheba went to King Solomon to speak to him for Adonijah, the king stood up to meet her, bowed down to her and sat down on his throne. But don’t stop; pursue your enemies! Attack them from the rear and don’t let them reach their cities, for the Lord your God has given them into your hand.”	At’ Ariko mwebge ntimuhatebe: mukurikire abansi banyu, mugende murica ab’ indongorongo bo muri bo; ntimubakundire gusubira mu bisagara vyabo, kuk’ Uhoraho Imana yanyu abagabuye mu maboko yanyu.
the whole assembly made a covenant with the king at the temple of God. Jehoiada said to them, “The king’s son shall reign, as the Lord promised concerning the descendants of David. Also, Jeroboam son of Nebat rebelled against the king. He was one of Solomon’s officials, an Ephraimite from Zeredah, and his mother was a widow named Zeruah.	Maze Yerobowamu mwene Nebati, Umwefurayimu w’i Sereda, umusavyi w’umwami Salomo, na we aramugarariza; nyina yar’ umupfakazi yitwa Zeruwa.

Then Joseph said to his brothers, “I am about to die. But God will surely come to your aid and take you up out of this land to the land he promised on oath to Abraham, Isaac and Jacob.”	Yosefu abarira ab’i wabo, ati Ndi hafi gupfa; arikw Imana ntizobura kubagendera, ikabakūra mur’ iki gihugu, ikabajana mu gihugu yarahiye Aburahamu na Isaka na Yakobo kw izobaha.

“Anyone who beats their male or female slave with a rod must be punished if the slave dies as a direct result,	Umuntu ni yakubita inkoni umugurano wiwe, cank’ umuguranokazi, akamugwa mu maboko, ntaz’ abure guhanwa;
because the law brings wrath. And where there is no law there is no transgression.	Kukw ivyagezwe bizana uburake, arikw ah’ ivyagezwe bitari, nta gicumuro kiba kiriho.

This is a trustworthy saying. And I want you to stress these things, so that those who have trusted in God may be careful to devote themselves to doing what is good. Then Simon Peter, who had a sword, drew it and struck the high priest’s servant, cutting off his right ear. (The servant’s name was Malchus.)	Simoni Petero yari n’inkota, arayisokōra, aca ugutwi kw’i buryo kw’umuntu w’umuherezi mukuru: uwo muntu yitwa Malikusi.
He too followed the ways of the house of Ahab, for his mother encouraged him to act wickedly.	Na we yagendera mu ngeso z’ab’ inzu ya Ahabu, kuko nyina yamugīra inama zo gukora ivyaha.
and they schemed to arrest Jesus secretly and kill him.	baja inama yo gusuka Yesu ngo bamufate, bamwice.
The Israelites went out to fight the Benjamites and took up battle positions against them at Gibeah.	Ingabo zabo zitera Ababenyamini, zitonda urugamba i Gibeya ngo zibarwanye.
“The word of the Lord you have spoken is good,” Hezekiah replied. For he thought, “Will there not be peace and security in my lifetime?”	Maze Hezekiya yishura Yesaya, at’ Ijambo ry’Uhoraho uvuze ni ryiza. Yongera kuvuga, ati None si ko biri? Kazima hagiye kuba amahoro n’umutekano nkiriho.
But I am a worm and not a man, scorned by everyone, despised by the people.	Ariko jeho nd’umusiba, sind’ umuntu: Ndi ruvumwa mu bantu, nkēngērwa na bose.
After the prophet Hananiah had broken the yoke off the neck of the prophet Jeremiah, the word of the Lord came to Jeremiah:	Maz’ ijambo ry’ Uhoraho riza kur’ uwo muvugishwa Yeremiya, Hananiya kamenyi amaze kuvuna iyo ngōgo yari kw izosi ryiwe,
Lord my God, if I have done this and there is guilt on my hands—	Uhoraho, Mana yanje, namba naragenjeje ntyo, Namba har’ ukugabitanya mu maboko yanje,
From the fruit of their mouth a person’s stomach is filled; with the harvest of their lips they are satisfied.	Inda y’umuntu ihāzwa n’ibivuye mu kanwa kiwe, Kand’ azohāga ukugwira kwo mu minwa yiwe.
Therefore the law is paralyzed, and justice never prevails. The wicked hem in the righteous, so that justice is perverted.	Ni co gituma amabgirizwa asigaye yāfōrorotse, akaba ata manza ziroranye zikiboneka na mba: kuk’ umunyakibi atangatanze umugororotsi irya n’ino, bigatuma imanza ziboneka zigoramye.
I will be his father, and he will be my son. I will never take my love away from him, as I took it away from your predecessor.	Ut’ Azomubera se, na we amubere umwana; ut’ Ariko ntazomukūrakw imbabazi ziwe nk’uko yazikūye ku wagutanguriye;
But I said, “I have labored in vain; I have spent my strength for nothing at all. Yet what is due me is in the Lord ’s hand, and my reward is with my God.”	Ariko ndavuga, nti Naruhijwe n’ubusa, inkomezi zanje zapfuye ubusa, nazikoresheje ibitagira ikimazi: yamara rer’ urubanza rwanje ruseguwe n’Uhoraho, kand’ Imana yanje ni yo izompēra.
And we answered, ‘We have an aged father, and there is a young son born to him in his old age. His brother is dead, and he is the only one of his mother’s sons left, and his father loves him.’	Natwe turakwishura, mugenzi, tuti Dufise data w’umutāma, hariho n’ uwundi muhungu yavyaye ashaje; na we mukuru we yarapfuye, none ni we asigaye ar’ikinege mu nda ya nyina, kandi se amukunda cane.
For Jesus had said to him, “Come out of this man, you impure spirit!”	Kuko yar’ amubariye, ati Va mu muntu, wa mpwemu ihumanye.
Otherwise Christ would have had to suffer many times since the creation of the world. But he has appeared once for all at the culmination of the ages to do away with sin by the sacrifice of himself.	kukw iyo biba birtyo, aba yar’ akwiye kubabazwa kenshi uhereye ku kuremwa kw’ isi. Yamar’ ubu yabonetse rimwe kw iherezo ry’ibihe, kugira ngw akūzeh’ icaha ukwitanga.
As soon as you hear the sound of marching in the tops of the poplar trees, move quickly, because that will mean the Lord has gone out in front of you to strike the Philistine army.”	Maze ni wumva imirindi y’ingabo ihindira hejuru kur’ iyo mibaka, uce uhaguruka vuba, kuko jewe Uhoraho nzoba nkwitangiye imbere gutera izo ngabo z’Abafilisitiya.
At this, they picked up stones to stone him, but Jesus hid himself, slipping away from the temple grounds.	Baca batora amabuye yo kumutera, maze Yesu arihisha, ava mu rusengero.
“There will be signs in the sun, moon and stars. On the earth, nations will be in anguish and perplexity at the roaring and tossing of the sea.	Kandi hazoba ibimenyetso ku zuba no ku kwezi no ku nyenyeri, kandi no mw isi hazoba imibabaro mu mahanga, bazotegekanishwa n’ukubomborana kw’ikiyaga n’imipfunda;
“I will bring them down like lambs to the slaughter, like rams and goats.	Nzobamanukana nk’ imyagazi y’intama ija kubāgwa, nk’amapfizi y’intama n’ay’ impene.
At that time many will turn away from the faith and will betray and hate each other,	Ni ho benshi bizobatsitaza, bazoryarukana, bazokwankana.
When David was told what Aiah’s daughter Rizpah, Saul’s concubine, had done,	Maze babarira Dawidi ivyo Risipa yakoze, umukobga wa Aya, incoreke Sauli yari yaragize umugore.
a time to search and a time to give up, a time to keep and a time to throw away,	igihe co kurondera n’igihe co gutakaza; igihe co kubungabunga n’igihe co guta;
All the people that came out had been circumcised, but all the people born in the wilderness during the journey from Egypt had not.	kukw abantu bose bavuyeyo bari barakebge, arikw abāvukiye mu nzira bose mu bugaragwa, bamaze kuva muri Egiputa, bo ntibaribgakebge;
And at that time I told you everything you were to do.	Nukw ico gihe nabageze ivyo mukwiye gukora vyose.
Now Zebah and Zalmunna were in Karkor with a force of about fifteen thousand men, all that were left of the armies of the eastern peoples; a hundred and twenty thousand swordsmen had fallen.	Kandi Zeba na Salumuna bar’ i Karikori, hamwe n’ingabo zabo zishika nko ku bihumbi cumi na bitanu, ari zo zari zisigaye gusa mu ngabo zose z’ab’i burasirazuba, kuko mu rugamba hāri hāgūye ingabo ibihumbi ijana na mirongwibiri zizi kurwanisha inkota.
If I give all I possess to the poor and give over my body to hardship that I may boast, but do not have love, I gain nothing.	Kandi naho notanga ivyanje vyose, ngo ngaburire aboro, kandi naho notanga umubiri wanje ngo nturirwe, ariko ntagira urukundo, nta co vyommarira.
Can an Ethiopian change his skin or a leopard its spots? Neither can you do good who are accustomed to doing evil.	Mbeg’ Umunyetiyopiya yoshobora guhindura urukoba rw’umubiri wiwe, cank’ ingwe yokwihindura amabara yayo? Ivyo bishobotse, namwe mwoshobora gukora ivyiza, mwebge abāmogoreye gukora ibibi.
So the king commanded that this be done. An edict was issued in Susa, and they impaled the ten sons of Haman.	Nuk’ umwami agera ko biba birtyo; iteka ryamamara i Shushani; bamanika na ya mivyimba ya bene Hamani ukw ar’ icumi.
I weep for you, as Jazer weeps, you vines of Sibmah. Your branches spread as far as the sea ; they reached as far as Jazer. The destroyer has fallen on your ripened fruit and grapes.	Ewe ruzabibu rw’ i Sibuma, nzokuririra kurusha kurira kw’i Yazeri; amashami yawe aca hejuru y’ikiyaga, agashika no ku kiyaga c’i Yazeri: umunyazi afashe ku vyo weze no ku vyo wimbuweko vya vino.
and her father hears about her vow or pledge but says nothing to her, then all her vows and every pledge by which she obligated herself will stand.	se akumva ivyo asezeranye, n’ingene yibohesheje ivyo araganye, agapfa kwihorera akamureka, ayo masezerano yiwe yose azohama, bo n’ivyo yaraganye vyose yibohesheje.
These are the names of the men Moses sent to explore the land. (Moses gave Hoshea son of Nun the name Joshua.)	Ayo ni yo mazina y’abantu Mose yatumye gutata ico gihugu; kandi yita Hoseya mwene Nuni, Yosuwa.
The descendants of Asher by their clans were: through Imnah, the Imnite clan; through Ishvi, the Ishvite clan; through Beriah, the Beriite clan;	Bene Asheri, nk’ukw amazu yabo ari, n’aba: Imuna, ni we gishitsi c’inzu y’Abimuna; na Ishivi, ni we gishitsi c’inzu y’Abishivi; na Beriya, ni we gishitsi c’inzu y’Ababeriya.
from the descendants of Elizaphan, Shemaiah the leader and 200 relatives;	mu ba Elisafani, Shemaya ni we yar’ umukuru, bagenzi be bār’ amajana abiri;
“Which ones?” he inquired. Jesus replied, “ ‘You shall not murder, you shall not commit adultery, you shall not steal, you shall not give false testimony,	Aramubaza, ati N’ibihe? Yesu aramwishura, ati Ntukice, ntugasambane, ntukibe, ntukāgirize abandi ibinyoma,
But David said to Saul, “Who am I, and what is my family or my clan in Israel, that I should become the king’s son-in-law?”	Ariko Dawidi abarira Sauli, ati Mbega jewe, n’inda n’ indēsho, n’umuryango wacu, n’ inzu ya data ukw iri mu Bisirayeli, noba umukwe w’umwami?
It may be that the Lord will look upon my misery and restore to me his covenant blessing instead of his curse today.”	Kumbure Uhoraho azorāba ayo mbonye, ampe ivyiza mu gishingo c’iyo mivumo mvumwe uyu musi.

but this is what the Lord says about the king who sits on David’s throne and all the people who remain in this city, your fellow citizens who did not go with you into exile—	Uku ni k’ Uhoraho agize ku vy’umwami ari ku ngoma ya Dawidi, no ku vy’ abantu bose baba mur’ iki gisagara, ni bo bene wanyu mutājanye igihe mwambukanwa;
Then Jesus went through the towns and villages, teaching as he made his way to Jerusalem.	Ari mu nzira, ahita mu bisagara no mu mihana, yigisha, ari ku rugendo aja i Yerusalemu.
Cut the ram into pieces and wash the internal organs and the legs, putting them with the head and the other pieces.	Uyijanjagure, uyishire mu bikenye vyayo, uronge amara yayo bo n’ ibikenye vyayo vy’amaguru, ubirunde hamwe n’ibindi bikenye vyayo n’umutwe wayo.
The Edomites had again come and attacked Judah and carried away prisoners,	kukw Abanyedomu bāri bongeye gutera i Buyuda, bakahanesha, bakajana abaho ar’ inyagano.
The Lord your God will circumcise your hearts and the hearts of your descendants, so that you may love him with all your heart and with all your soul, and live.	Kand’ Uhoraho Imana yanyu azokūrah’ ukudakebga kwo mu mitima yanyu, n’ukwo mu mitima y’uruvyaro rwanyu, kugira ngo mumukundishe imitima yanyu yose, n’ubugingo bganyu bgose, mubone kubaho.
I will strike down those who live in this city—both man and beast—and they will die of a terrible plague.	Kandi nzokubita ababa mur’ iki gisagara, abantu n’ibitungwa: bazokwicwa n’ikīza gikomeye.
Instead of carrying out your duty in regard to my holy things, you put others in charge of my sanctuary.	Kandi ntimwarinze ivyera vyanje mwajejwe, arikw ahēra hanje mwahajeje abandi mu gishingo canyu.
who sets me free from my enemies. You exalted me above my foes; from a violent man you rescued me.	Inkūra mu babisha banje: Mber’ unshira hejuru y’abampagurukira, Unkiza n’umuntu w’ikirara.

Now there was a Pharisee, a man named Nicodemus who was a member of the Jewish ruling council.	Hār’ umuntu mu Bafarisayo, yitwa Nikodemo, yar’ umukuru wo mu Bayuda;
He stood beside me and said, ‘Brother Saul, receive your sight!’ And at that very moment I was able to see him.	aza aho ndi, ampagarara hejuru, arambarira, ati Sauli, mwene Data, humūka. Ako kanya ndahumūka, ndamurāba.
eye for eye, tooth for tooth, hand for hand, foot for foot,	ijisho rihōrwe irindi, iryinyo rihōrwe irindi, igikonjo gihōrwe ikindi, ikirenge gihōrwe ikindi,
The king also wrote letters ridiculing the Lord , the God of Israel, and saying this against him: “Just as the gods of the peoples of the other lands did not rescue their people from my hand, so the god of Hezekiah will not rescue his people from my hand.”	Kandi Senakeribu yandika icete co kurogota k’Uhoraho Imana y’Abisirayeli no kumuvuga nabi, ngo Nk’ukw imana z’amahanga yo mu bihugu zitākijije abantu bazo, ngo ntibakorokere mu maboko yiwe, ngo Ni ko n’Imana ya Hezekiya itazokiza abantu bayo ngo ntibamukorokere mu maboko.
And to whom did God swear that they would never enter his rest if not to those who disobeyed?	Ni ba nde yarahiye ko batazoshika mu buruhukiro bgayo? S’abatāyumviye?
And he said: “Truly I tell you, unless you change and become like little children, you will never enter the kingdom of heaven.	arababgira, ati Ndababgire ukuri: Ni mutirimbura ngo mucike nk’abana bato, ntimuzoruha mwinjira mu bgami bgo mw ijuru.
The elders of Moab and Midian left, taking with them the fee for divination. When they came to Balaam, they told him what Balak had said.	Abakuru b’i Mowabu n’ab’i Midiyani bakora ingemu baragenda, baja kwa Balamu, bamubarira amajambo ya Balaki.
Then Joab went into the house to the king and said, “Today you have humiliated all your men, who have just saved your life and the lives of your sons and daughters and the lives of your wives and concubines.	Maze Yowabu yinjira mu nzu ah’ umwami ari, aramubarira, at’ Uyu musi utētereje abantu bawe bose, kand’ ari bo bakijije amagara yawe uyu musi nyene, n’ay’ abahungu bawe n’abakobga bawe, n’ay’ abamikazi bawe n’abagore bawe b’incoreke,
Therefore, take care to follow the commands, decrees and laws I give you today.	Nuko rero muze mwitondere ivyo vyagezwe n’amabgirizwa n’ amatēka ashinzwe mbageze uyu musi, mubishitse.
“ ‘When you allot the land as an inheritance, you are to present to the Lord a portion of the land as a sacred district, 25,000 cubits long and 20,000 cubits wide; the entire area will be holy.	Maze, igihe muzogaburisha igihugu ubupfindo, ngo kibabere ishamvu, muze mukūrire Uhoraho umugabane kw ishikanwa, ube umugabane wera ukūwe ku gihugu; uburebure bgawo buze bube irenga ingero ibihumbi mirongwibiri na bitanu, n’amakika yawo abe ibihumbi cumi; uzoba uwera no gushitsa ku mbibe zawo impande zose.
“The Lord has kept the promise he made: I have succeeded David my father and now I sit on the throne of Israel, just as the Lord promised, and I have built the temple for the Name of the Lord , the God of Israel.	Non’ Uhoraho ashikije iryo jambo ryiwe yavuze, kuko nsubiye mu gishingo ca data Dawidi, kandi nkaba ndi ku ngoma y’i Bgisirayeli nk’uko yasezeranye, kandi nkaba nujuje iyi ngoro nubakiye izina ry’Uhoraho Imana y’Abisirayeli.
When he heard this, Jesus said, “This sickness will not end in death. No, it is for God’s glory so that God’s Son may be glorified through it.”	Yesu avyumvise aravuga, at’ Iyo ndwara s’iyo kumwica, ariko n’iyo gushimagirisha Imana, kugira ngo n’Umwana w’Imana imushimagirishe.
So is he who sleeps with another man’s wife; no one who touches her will go unpunished.	Ni ko bimerera uwinjirana umugore wa mugenzi we; Ūmukorako wese ntazobura guhanwa.
That same day the man of God gave a sign: “This is the sign the Lord has declared: The altar will be split apart and the ashes on it will be poured out.”	Kandi kur’ uwo musi nyene abaha ikimenyamenya, at’ Iki ni co kimenyamenya Uhoraho atanze: iki gicaniro kigira gisaduke, umunyota wo kuri co usēseke.
“Because of your great compassion you did not abandon them in the wilderness. By day the pillar of cloud did not fail to guide them on their path, nor the pillar of fire by night to shine on the way they were to take.	ariko na ho nyene kubg’ imbabazi zawe nyinshi ntiwabataye mu bugaragwa; inkingi y’igicu ntiyabavuye imbere ku murango ibarōngōra mu nzira, cank’ inkingi y’umuriro mw ijoro yo kubamurikira, ngw ibereke inzira bacamwo.
After Saul stopped prophesying, he went to the high place.	Maz’ arangije kuvugishwa aja ha hantu hēra ku mpinga y’umusozi.
When a land falls into the hands of the wicked, he blindfolds its judges. If it is not he, then who is it?	Isi itanzwe mu maboko y’ inkozi z’ibibi; Ikinga mu maso h’abacamanza b’isi; Namb’ atari yo, none yoba nde se?
Clearly no one who relies on the law is justified before God, because “the righteous will live by faith.”	Biraseruka yukw ata muntu atsindanishirizwa n’ivyagezwe imbere y’Imana, kuko handitswe ng’ Umugororotsi azobeshwaho n’ukwizera.
This is how we know that we love the children of God: by loving God and carrying out his commands.	Iki ni co kitumenyesha yuko dukunda abana b’Imana, ni twakunda Imana tugakora ivyagezwe vyayo.
“How long will this wicked community grumble against me? I have heard the complaints of these grumbling Israelites.	ati Nzogeza hehe kwihanganira iri shengero rimeze nabi, rihora riranyidodombera? Numvise imyidodombo y’Abisirayeli banyidodombera.
These searched for their family records, but they could not find them and so were excluded from the priesthood as unclean.	abo bārondeye amazina yabo mu gitabo kidondora ba sekuruza, ntibayabona, ni co gituma biyumviriwe nk’abahumanye, bagakūrwa mu buherezi.
Then at Belshazzar’s command, Daniel was clothed in purple, a gold chain was placed around his neck, and he was proclaimed the third highest ruler in the kingdom.	Maze Belushaza agera ko bambika Daniyeli impuzu z’inyambarabami, n’umugufu w’izahabu mw izosi, kandi ko bamamaza kw azoba uwa gatatu mu bakuru baganza igihugu.
So I spoke to the people in the morning, and in the evening my wife died. The next morning I did as I had been commanded.	Nuko mu gitondo mbibarira abantu, maze ku mugoroba umugore wanje arapfa; bukeye ngenza nk’uko nabariwe.
Some people who passed by saw the body lying there, with the lion standing beside the body, and they went and reported it in the city where the old prophet lived.	Maz’ abantu bahaciye, babona uwo muvyimba urambaraye mu nzira, n’intambge iwuhagaze i ruhande; baragenda babivuga mu gisagara ah’ uwo muvugishwa w’umutāma yaba.
Assemble the people—men, women and children, and the foreigners residing in your towns—so they can listen and learn to fear the Lord your God and follow carefully all the words of this law.	Muze mukoranye abantu, abagabo n’abagore n’abana, n’abanyamahanga baba muri mwebge, kugira ngo bavyumve, bavyige, bubahe Uhoraho Imana yanyu, bitondere amajambo yose y’ibi vyagezwe, babishitse;
“Go,” the Lord said to me, “and lead the people on their way, so that they may enter and possess the land I swore to their ancestors to give them.”	Maz’ Uhoraho arambarira, ati Va hasi, ufate urugendo, uje aba bantu imbere, kugira ngo binjire igihugu narahiye ba sekuruza ko nzokibaha, bacegukire.
“Then I asked my master, ‘What if the woman will not come back with me?’	Maze nishura databuja, nti Kumbure uwo mwigeme ntazokunda ko tuzanana.
Jesus’ brothers said to him, “Leave Galilee and go to Judea, so that your disciples there may see the works you do.	Nuko bene nyina baramubgira, bati N’uve ino, uje i Yudaya, abigishwa bawe na bo barābe ibikorwa ukora;
This was after he had defeated Sihon king of the Amorites, who reigned in Heshbon, and at Edrei had defeated Og king of Bashan, who reigned in Ashtaroth.	amaze gutsinda Sihoni umwami w’Abamori yaba i Heshiboni, na Ogi umwami w’i Bashani yaba ahitwa Ashitaroti n’ahitwa Edireyi.
The Amalekites came and attacked the Israelites at Rephidim.	Maze haza Abamaleki, baterera Abisirayeli i Refidimu.
In the fourteenth year of King Hezekiah’s reign, Sennacherib king of Assyria attacked all the fortified cities of Judah and captured them.	Mu mwaka ugira icumi na kane umwami Hezekiya ari ku ngoma, Senakeribu umwami w’i Ashuri yaradūze, atera ibisagara vyose vyubakiwe inzitiro vy’i Buyuda, arabitsinda.
I told you that you would die in your sins; if you do not believe that I am he, you will indeed die in your sins.”	Ico ni co gitumye mbabgira ko muzopfira mu vyaha vyanyu; kuko ni mutizera ko ndi We, muzopfira mu vyaha vyanyu.
Do not bring a detestable thing into your house or you, like it, will be set apart for destruction. Regard it as vile and utterly detest it, for it is set apart for destruction.	ntimuze mujane ico kintu c’ubuyobe mu ngo zanyu, mwoye kuzohava muhinduka umuvumo nka co; muze mucanke urunuka, mukizinukwe rwose, kukw ar’ ikintu cāvumwe.
I rebuked the nobles of Judah and said to them, “What is this wicked thing you are doing—desecrating the Sabbath day?	Ndaheza ntātira abakuru bo mu Bayuda, nti N’iki gituma mukora ibibi bisa birtyo mugahumanya isabato?
When he heard the crowd going by, he asked what was happening.	Yumvise ishengero rihita, ibaza ivy’ ari vyo.
together with their grain offerings and drink offerings, and a basket of bread made with the finest flour and without yeast—thick loaves with olive oil mixed in, and thin loaves brushed with olive oil.	n’indumane irimw’ imitsima itambiwe; udutsima twacumbge mw ifu igogōretse, twacumbanywe n’amavuta ya elayo, n’utundi dutsima tutambiwe nyene, tubēhūye, twasutswekw amavuta, bo n’amashikanwa bigendanye, iry’ ifu n’iry’ ibiturire.
he predestined us for adoption to sonship through Jesus Christ, in accordance with his pleasure and will—	Kuko yagabiye kera ko duheshwa na Yesu Kristo gucika abana bayo kubgayo, nk’uko yabigomvye bikayihimbara:
If she has made herself impure and been unfaithful to her husband, this will be the result: When she is made to drink the water that brings a curse and causes bitter suffering, it will enter her, her abdomen will swell and her womb will miscarry, and she will become a curse.	Ni yamara kuyamunywesha, bizomera birtya: ni yaba yarahumanye, akaba yacumuye ku mugabo wiwe, ayo mazi atera umuvumo amushitsemwo azomuhindukira umururazi, agaragambe inda, anyunyuke ikibero, ahinduke ikivume mu bgoko bgabo.
Eat nothing made with yeast. Wherever you live, you must eat unleavened bread.”	Ntimuze mugire icambiwe na kimwe murya: muze murye imitsima itambiwe mu ngo zanyu zose.
In your marketplace they traded with you beautiful garments, blue fabric, embroidered work and multicolored rugs with cords twisted and tightly knotted.	Abo ni bo badandaji bawe bāshōra ibintu vy’ intōrwa, imitamana y’amasufe ijererenze amabara, n’amasandugu yabājwe mu masederi arimw’ imyambaro y’igiciro kinini, atekejwe ibitsibo vy’imigozi; ivyo vyari mu bidandazwa vyawe.
The earth reels like a drunkard, it sways like a hut in the wind; so heavy upon it is the guilt of its rebellion that it falls—never to rise again.	Isi izodandabagirana nk’imborerwa, izonyiganyizwa irya n’ino nk’umutara; igicumuro cayo kizoyiremēra, kand’ izotemba, ntiyongere kuvyuka ukundi.
The more the words, the less the meaning, and how does that profit anyone?	Ko har’ ibintu vyinshi bigwiza ibitagira ikimazi, none vyungura umuntu iki?
There is nothing Egypt can do— head or tail, palm branch or reed.	Kandi muri Egiputa nta gikorwa kizohashoboka, ar’ icokorwa n’umutwe cank’ umurizo, ishami ry’ikigazi cank’ umubere.
My roots will reach to the water, and the dew will lie all night on my branches.	Nt’ Imizi yanje ishōreye mu mazi, N’ikime gitonda kw ishami ryanje bukarinda buca:
Take the anointing oil and anoint him by pouring it on his head.	Maze wābīre amavuta yo kurobanuza abahabga ibango, uyamusuke mu mutwe, uyamurobanuze.
As you know, it was because of an illness that I first preached the gospel to you,	ariko murazi yukw amagara make y’umubiri ari yo yatumye mbabarira ubutumwa bgiza ubga mbere:
the twentieth to Eliathah, his sons and relatives 12	ubga mirongwibiri bgerekana Eliyata n’abigishwa biwe na bagenzi biwe, bose na bose bār’ icumi na babiri;
During the night I had a vision, and there before me was a man mounted on a red horse. He was standing among the myrtle trees in a ravine. Behind him were red, brown and white horses. You, Lord , are God! You have promised these good things to your servant.	Kandi none, Uhoraho, ni wewe Mana, kand’ unsezeraniye iryo jambo ryiza, jewe umusavyi wawe.
Half of their children spoke the language of Ashdod or the language of one of the other peoples, and did not know how to speak the language of Judah.	kandi ko benshi bo mu bana babo bavuga ikinyashidodi cank’ urundi rurimi rw’ayandi mahanga gusa, ntibashobore kuvuga ikiyuda.
“Take up your positions around Babylon, all you who draw the bow. Shoot at her! Spare no arrows, for she has sinned against the Lord .	Mwebge mwese abarashi, mutondere urugamba Babuloni irya n’ino; muharase, ntimuzigurize imyampi: kuko hācumuye k’Uhoraho.
If anyone forces you to go one mile, go with them two miles.	ūgufata ng’ umurenze umusozi umwe, umurenze n’uwa kabiri.
He also tore down the quarters of the male shrine prostitutes that were in the temple of the Lord , the quarters where women did weaving for Asherah.	Asangangura ivyumba vy’ abagabo bendana vyari mu ngoro y’Uhoraho, ah’ abagore bājishira Ashera impuzu.
I will surely raise my hand against them so that their slaves will plunder them. Then you will know that the Lord Almighty has sent me.	Ehe nzoyabangurirak’ ukuboko kwanje, kand’ azohinduka inyagano z’abāyashumbiye: ni ho muzomenya yuk’ Uhoraho Nyen’ ingabo ari we yantumye.
But someone will ask, “How are the dead raised? With what kind of body will they come?”	Arik’ umuntu yobaza, at’ Abapfuye bazurwa bate, kandi baza bafise umubiri ki?
The command to leave the stump of the tree with its roots means that your kingdom will be restored to you when you acknowledge that Heaven rules.	Kandi nk’uko bāgeze kw igishitsi n’imizi vy’ico giti birekerwaho, ni k’ubgami bgawe buzogumaho ar’ ubgawe, gushitsa umaze kumenya kw ijuru ari ryo riganza.
but first I will tell you what is written in the Book of Truth. (No one supports me against them except Michael, your prince.	Ariko ndakubarira ivyanditswe mu gitabo c’ivy’ ukuri: kandi nta wuriho wo kuntabara kubarwanya atari Mikayeli umugabisha wanyu.
My breath is offensive to my wife; I am loathsome to my own family.	Umugore wanje azinutswe ubgaku bganje, Nteye ishishi bene mama.
“I have heard you,” replied Jeremiah the prophet. “I will certainly pray to the Lord your God as you have requested; I will tell you everything the Lord says and will keep nothing back from you.”	Nuk’ uwavugishwa n’Imana Yeremiya arabishura, at’ Ego ndumvise; ngiye kubasengera k’Uhoraho Imana yanyu nk’uko muvuze: maz’ ico Uhoraho azonyishura cose nzokibabarira; sinzogira ico mbahisha.
They discussed it among themselves and said, “If we say, ‘From heaven,’ he will ask, ‘Then why didn’t you believe him?’	Bībūranya muri bo, bati Ni twavuga tuti Ni mw ijuru; ahava atubaza, ati N’iki cababujije kumwemera?
Then Levi held a great banquet for Jesus at his house, and a large crowd of tax collectors and others were eating with them.	Lewi amurondereza izimano ryinshi mu nzu yiwe: kandi hār’ abantu benshi b’abatozakori n’abandi bicaranye na bo basangira.
In the thirty-ninth year of Azariah king of Judah, Menahem son of Gadi became king of Israel, and he reigned in Samaria ten years.	Mu mwaka ugira mirongwitatu n’icenda Uziya umwami w’ Abayuda ari ku ngoma, ni ho Menahemu mwene Gadi yima mu Bisirayeli; amara imyaka cumi i Samariya ari ku ngoma.
Woe to those who are wise in their own eyes and clever in their own sight.	Bazobona ibara, abīyita abanyabgenge ubgabo, bakībgira kw ar’ abahanga!
A little sleep, a little slumber, a little folding of the hands to rest—	Guca agatiro gakeya, kuba urisinziriye gatoya, Kwisegura ukuboko gatoya wiboterere:
They are called rejected silver, because the Lord has rejected them.”	Abantu bazobīta ifeza z’ibihonwa, kuk’ Uhoraho abashibuye.
The Levites were Jeshua, Binnui, Kadmiel, Sherebiah, Judah, and also Mattaniah, who, together with his associates, was in charge of the songs of thanksgiving.	Kand’ Abalewi ni Yosuwa na Binuwi na Kadimiyeli na Sherebiya na Yuda na Mataniya; Mataniya uwo, bo na bagenzi biwe, ni bo baterera abandi indirimbo z’ ishimwe;
They found the stone rolled away from the tomb,	Basanga ikibuye gitembagajwe kivuye ku mva;
When the apostles in Jerusalem heard that Samaria had accepted the word of God, they sent Peter and John to Samaria.	Maz’ intumwa zir’i Yerusalemu zumvise yukw Abasamariya bemeye ijambo ry’Imana, zirungikayo Petero na Yohana,
The Lord said through his servants the prophets:	Bukeye Uhoraho avugira mu basavyi biwe yavugisha,
Or if anyone is holding a stone and strikes someone a fatal blow with it, that person is a murderer; the murderer is to be put to death.	Canke ni yaba yamuhondesheje ibuye afise mu ntoke, ryoshobora kwica umuntu, akagwaho, azoba ar’ umwicanyi: kand’ umwicanyi ntaz’ abure kwicwa.
So he went to him and found him standing beside his offering, with the Moabite officials. Balak asked him, “What did the Lord say?”	Nukw asubira kuri we, asanga agihagaze hambavu ya vya bimazi vyiwe vyoshejwe, ari kumwe na ba bamenyekana b’i Mowabu. Balaki aramubaza, at’ Uhoraho yavuze iki?
Send lambs as tribute to the ruler of the land, from Sela, across the desert, to the mount of Daughter Zion.	Abaganza igihugu, ni murungike ingorore z’imyagazi y’intama muzikūye i Sela, muzicishe mu bugaragwa, muzirungike ku musozi w’umukobga w’i Siyoni.
The lowest floor was five cubits wide, the middle floor six cubits and the third floor seven. He made offset ledges around the outside of the temple so that nothing would be inserted into the temple walls.	Utwumba two hasi, ubgaguke bgatwo bgar’ amatambge atanu; utwo hagati ubgaguke bgatwo bgar’ atandatu; utwa gatatu, ubgaguke bgatwo bgar’ indwi; ku gisika c’iyo ngoro ahahera inyuma, yagenda asiga ahaniguye impande zose, kugira ngw imbaho z’utwo twumba ntizinjire mu gisika c’iyo ngoro.

The words of Nehemiah son of Hakaliah: In the month of Kislev in the twentieth year, while I was in the citadel of Susa,	Amajambo ya Nehemiya mwene Hakaliya. Mu kwezi kwa Kisilevu, mu mwaka ugira mirongwibiri, nari nsanzwe ndi ku murwa i Shushani.
Nathan reported to David all the words of this entire revelation.	Maz’ ayo majambo yose n’ ukwo kwerekwa kwose, Natani abidondera Dawidi.
When the Ammonites realized that the Arameans were fleeing, they fled before Abishai and went inside the city. So Joab returned from fighting the Ammonites and came to Jerusalem.	Maz’ Abamoni babonye Abasiriya bahunze, na bo bahunga Abishayi, bīsuka mu gisagara. Nuko Yowabu araheza areka Abamoni, asubira i Yerusalemu.
All her people groan as they search for bread; they barter their treasures for food to keep themselves alive. “Look, Lord , and consider, for I am despised.”	Abantu baho bose baraniha, bayerera utwo kurya; Ibintu vyabo vyābahimbara bābitanze ku two kurya ngo basame amagara yabo: Uhoraho we, rāba witegereze: nahindutse ikigawa.
and sang the song of God’s servant Moses and of the Lamb: “Great and marvelous are your deeds, Lord God Almighty. Just and true are your ways, King of the nations. But some scoundrels said, “How can this fellow save us?” They despised him and brought him no gifts. But Saul kept silent.	Arikw abantu b’abagesera bamwe baravuga, bati Mbeg’ uwo muntu yodutabara ate? Baramukēngēra, ntibāruha bamuzanira n’ imishikīro. Arikw apfa kwinumira.

A hot-tempered person must pay the penalty; rescue them, and you will have to do it again.	Umuntu w’ishavu ryinshi azorihōrwa, Kandi naho womutabara uzoba ukwiye gusubīra.
He led Israel twenty-three years; then he died, and was buried in Shamir.	Amara imyaka mirongwibiri n’itatu ar’ umucamanza mu Bisirayeli; apfuye, bamuhamba i Shamiri nyene.
The Lord does not let the righteous go hungry, but he thwarts the craving of the wicked.	Uhoraho ntazokundira umushaha w’umugororotsi k’ ugira inzara, Arikw akaruru k’abanyavyaha azogasunikira hirya.
For even his own brothers did not believe in him.	Kuko na bene nyina na bo batāmwizera.

In the seventh month, however, Ishmael son of Nethaniah, the son of Elishama, who was of royal blood, came with ten men and assassinated Gedaliah and also the men of Judah and the Babylonians who were with him at Mizpah.	Ariko mu kwezi kw’indwi, Ishimayeli mwene Netaniya, Netaniya wa Elishama, wo mu nda y’ingoma, azanana n’abantu cumi, baraza, bagurukira kuri Gedaliya baramwica, bica n’Abayuda n’Abakaludaya bāri kumwe na we i Misipa.
Is it not wheat harvest now? I will call on the Lord to send thunder and rain. And you will realize what an evil thing you did in the eyes of the Lord when you asked for a king.”	Mbeg’ ubu si mw igenya ry’ingano? None ngira nsabe Uhoraho arungike imvura irimw’ imituragaro; muca mumenya kandi mubone kw ibigabitanyo vyanyu ari vyinshi, ivyo mwagabitanije imbere y’Uhoraho, ko mwisabiye umwami.
When the officials of Judah heard about these things, they went up from the royal palace to the house of the Lord and took their places at the entrance of the New Gate of the Lord ’s house. Whatever house you enter, stay there until you leave that town.	Kand’ inzu yose muzokwinjiramwo, abe ari yo mugumamwo, kugeza aho muzovira aho hantu.

He placed five of the stands on the south side of the temple and five on the north. He placed the Sea on the south side, at the southeast corner of the temple. “ ‘If the man with the discharge spits on anyone who is clean, they must wash their clothes and bathe with water, and they will be unclean till evening. He will take a tenth of your grain and of your vintage and give it to his officials and attendants.	Kand’ azobatoza ibigiracumi vy’impeke zanyu n’inzabibu kw amarari, abihe abīshikira biwe n’abantu biwe.
Roast it and eat it at the place the Lord your God will choose. Then in the morning return to your tents.	Aho hantu nyene Uhoraho Imana yanyu azoba yātoranije az’ abe ari ho mutara inyama zaco, muhazirīre; mu gitondo muheze muhindukire, musubire mu mahema yanyu.

They are now in front of the Lord ’s altar.”	Kandi n’ibintu vyose umwami Ahazi yataye mu gucumura kwiwe igihe yari ku ngoma, twabitunganije, turavyeza; none bir’ imbere y’igicaniro c’Uhoraho.
Josiah celebrated the Passover to the Lord in Jerusalem, and the Passover lamb was slaughtered on the fourteenth day of the first month.	Bukeye Yosiya agira umusi mukuru wa Pasika y’Uhoraho i Yerusalemu. Babāga imyagazi ya Pasika ku musi ugira icumi na kane wo mu kwezi kwa mbere.

So I said, “Wisdom is better than strength.” But the poor man’s wisdom is despised, and his words are no longer heeded.	Maze ndavuga, nt’ Ubgenge buruta inkomezi: yamara rero, ubgenge bga wa mworo bgarakēngerewe, n’ amajambo yiwe ntibaba bakiyemera.
They sacrificed to false gods, which are not God— gods they had not known, gods that recently appeared, gods your ancestors did not fear.	Bahaye ibimazi abadayimoni batar’ Imana, Bahaye ibimazi imana batigeze kumenya, Imana nsha z’inzaduka, Izo ba sogokuruza batātinya.
Just as people are destined to die once, and after that to face judgment,	Kandi nk’ukw abantu bābīkiwe gupfa rimwe, hanyuma yaho hakaza amateka,

to turn them back from the pit, that the light of life may shine on them.	Kugira ngw igarukane umutima wiwe ngo ntuje muri rwa rwobo, Abone kumurikirwa n’umuco w’ubugingo.
He said to another man, “Follow me.” But he replied, “Lord, first let me go and bury my father.”	Maz’ abarira uwundi muntu, ati Nkurikira. Na we, ati Mugenzi, banza undekure ngende mpambe data.
Israel was a spreading vine; he brought forth fruit for himself. As his fruit increased, he built more altars; as his land prospered, he adorned his sacred stones. And the Lord was angry enough with Aaron to destroy him, but at that time I prayed for Aaron too.	Kand’ Uhoraho arakira Aroni cane, bituma agomba kumwica; ariko na we n’uko nca ndamusabira mur’ ico gihe nyene.
“They are your servants and your people, whom you redeemed by your great strength and your mighty hand.	None rero, abo ni bo basavyi bawe, kandi n’abantu bawe wacunguje ububasha bgawe bginshi bo n’ukuboko kwawe kw’ inkomezi.
Then I commanded the Levites to purify themselves and go and guard the gates in order to keep the Sabbath day holy. Remember me for this also, my God, and show mercy to me according to your great love.	Ndaheza mbgira Abalewi ngo biyeze, babone kuza gushibama ku marembo, kugira ngo batume umusi w’isabato uziririzwa. Ndaheza ndasaba, nti Mana yanje, n’ibi na vyo uz’ ubinzirikaneko, umpangaze nk’ukw imbabazi zawe nyinshi zingana.
For I myself am a man under authority, with soldiers under me. I tell this one, ‘Go,’ and he goes; and that one, ‘Come,’ and he comes. I say to my servant, ‘Do this,’ and he does it.”	Kuko nanje nd’umuntu agendera musi y’abanganza, mfise abasoda ntwara: iyo mbariye umwe, nti Genda, aragenda; n’uwundi nti Ngwino, akaza; nabarira umushumba wanje, nti Kora iki, akagikora.
The quiver rattles against its side, along with the flashing spear and lance.	Umutana ugenda ujegera kuri yo, Bo n’icumu ry’intēga rikayangana n’agakōbero.
So you are no longer a slave, but God’s child; and since you are his child, God has made you also an heir.	Ni co gituma utakir’ umugurano, arik’ ur’ umwana wayo; kandi k’ur’ umwana wayo, ur’ umuragwa, ubihawe n’Imana.
So Elijah went to present himself to Ahab. Now the famine was severe in Samaria,	Nuko Eliya aragenda, ngw aje kwiyereka Ahabu. Ico gihe kigoyi cari cinshi cane i Samariya,
Philip went down to a city in Samaria and proclaimed the Messiah there.	Na Filipo aramanuka, aja mu gisagara c’i Samariya, abamenyesha ivya Kristo.
The Lord said to Moses,	Uhoraho abarira Mose,
He shall sprinkle some of the blood on it with his finger seven times to cleanse it and to consecrate it from the uncleanness of the Israelites.	Aheze agicucagirekw ayo maraso n’urutoke rwiwe ibihetangabo ndwi, agihumanure, aceze kugira ngo kivek’ ubuhumane bg’Abisirayeli.
“I will stretch out my hand against Judah and against all who live in Jerusalem. I will destroy every remnant of Baal worship in this place, the very names of the idolatrous priests—	Nzobangurira ukuboko kwanje Abayuda n’ababa i Yerusalemu bose; nzorandura amasigarira ya Bayali aho hantu, n’izina ry’ibishegu hamwe n’abaherezi;
Then Peter came to Jesus and asked, “Lord, how many times shall I forgive my brother or sister who sins against me? Up to seven times?”	Maze Petero aza kuri we, aramubgira, ati Mushingantahe, incuti yanje ni yangirira nabi, nzomuharira ngeze kangahe? Ngeze indwi?
They devoted the city to the Lord and destroyed with the sword every living thing in it—men and women, young and old, cattle, sheep and donkeys.	Bageseza ivyari mur’ ico gisagara vyose, bicisha inkota abagabo n’abagore, abato n’abashaje, n’inka n’intama n’indogoba.
The Lord gave Lachish into Israel’s hands, and Joshua took it on the second day. The city and everyone in it he put to the sword, just as he had done to Libnah.	maz’ Uhoraho ahagabura mu maboko y’Abisirayeli, Yosuwa ahanesha ku musi ugira kabiri, atōngōza inkota abahaba bose, ahagirira nk’ivyo yagiriye i Libuna vyose.
Then the king sent for the priest Ahimelek son of Ahitub and all the men of his family, who were the priests at Nob, and they all came to the king.	Umwami avyumvise, atuma guhamagaza Ahimeleki umuherezi, mwene Ahitubu, n’ab’ inzu ya se bose, ari bo baherezi b’i Nobu; bose bītaba umwami.
And should I not have concern for the great city of Nineveh, in which there are more than a hundred and twenty thousand people who cannot tell their right hand from their left—and also many animals?”	none jewe sinari nkwiye kugirira ikibabarwe Ninewe, ico gisagara kinini, kirimw’ abantu ibihumbi ijana na mirongwibiri basāga, batazi gutandukanya ukuryo n’ukumoso; hakabamwo n’ibitunzwe vyinshi?
the hero and the warrior, the judge and the prophet, the diviner and the elder,	hamwe n’umuhizi n’intōre, n’umucamanza n’ūvugishwa n’Imana, n’umupfumu n’umushingantahe,
Do not rejoice, Israel; do not be jubilant like the other nations. For you have been unfaithful to your God; you love the wages of a prostitute at every threshing floor.	Sigaho kunezerwa, ewe Isirayeli, nk’ukw abanyamahanga bīnezererewe; kuko wīgize maraya, ukava ku Mana yawe, wakunze impēra z’ubumaraya ku mbuga zose zanikira impeke.
Again I declare to every man who lets himself be circumcised that he is obligated to obey the whole law.	Kandi ndabarira umuntu wese akebga, mbishingiye intahe, yukw ari n’umwenda wo kwitondera ivyagezwe vyose.
from the tribe of Simeon 12,000, from the tribe of Levi 12,000, from the tribe of Issachar 12,000,	Abo mu muryango wa Simeyoni n’ibihumbi cumi na bibiri: Abo mu muryango wa Lewi n’ibihumbi cumi na bibiri: Abo mu muryango wa Isakari n’ibihumbi cumi na bibiri:

The people of Israel, including the Levites, are to bring their contributions of grain, new wine and olive oil to the storerooms, where the articles for the sanctuary and for the ministering priests, the gatekeepers and the musicians are also kept. “We will not neglect the house of our God.”	Abisirayeli n’Abalewi bazokwama bazana amashikanwa azunguzwa y’ impeke n’aya vino n’ay’ amavuta, bayashingure mu vyumba ah’ imbombovu z’Ahēra zibīkwa, ari ho nyene abaherezi n’abashibamyi n’abaririmvyi barāra. Iyo misi ukw ar’ indwi muze muyigire mikuru yo kuninahaza Uhoraho Imana yanyu muri ha hantu azoba yātoranije; kuk’ Uhoraho Imana yanyu azoba yabahaye umugisha mu myimbu yanyu yose, no mu bikorwa vyose mwakoze, kandi muzoba munezerewe rwose.

If the ax is dull and its edge unsharpened, more strength is needed, but skill will bring success.	Incabiti iy’ ipfushe, umuntu ntayikarishe, azoba akwiye kwongerakw inkomezi zo gushimika; arik’ ubgenge bugira ikimazi mu kurōngōra umuntu.

Some Hebrews even crossed the Jordan to the land of Gad and Gilead. Saul remained at Gilgal, and all the troops with him were quaking with fear. “How beautiful are your tents, Jacob, your dwelling places, Israel!	At’ Ewe kuntu amahema yanyu ari meza, yemwe aba Yakobo, Ukuntu imihana yanyu ari myiza, yemwe Abisirayeli!
For I do not do the good I want to do, but the evil I do not want to do—this I keep on doing.	Kukw iciza ngomba atari co nkora, arikw ikibi ntagomba akaba ari co nkora.
Therefore the Pharisees also asked him how he had received his sight. “He put mud on my eyes,” the man replied, “and I washed, and now I see.”	Abafarisayo basubira kumubaza ingene yahumūtse, na we arababgira, ati Yansīze utwondo ku maso, ndiyuhagira, ndahumūka.
The blind and the lame came to him at the temple, and he healed them.	Maz’ impumyi n’abacumbagira baza kuri we mu rusengero, arabakiza.

Nuko ndabaza: Mbega bātsitariye kugwa mahera? Eka na mba! Yamar’ ukugwa kwabo kwāzaniye abanyamahanga agakiza, ngo bitere Abisirayeli ishari.

Then the exiles who had returned from captivity sacrificed burnt offerings to the God of Israel: twelve bulls for all Israel, ninety-six rams, seventy-seven male lambs and, as a sin offering, twelve male goats. All this was a burnt offering to the Lord . Then the iron, the clay, the bronze, the silver and the gold were all broken to pieces and became like chaff on a threshing floor in the summer. The wind swept them away without leaving a trace. Above all, you must understand that no prophecy of Scripture came about by the prophet’s own interpretation of things.	irya mbere mukwiye kumenya, n’ukw ata jambo ry’abāvugishwa n’Imana ryo mu vyanditswe rishobora gusobanurwa nk’uk’ umuntu avyigombera,
May your eyes be open toward this temple day and night, this place of which you said you would put your Name there. The tent curtains will be a cubit longer on both sides; what is left will hang over the sides of the tabernacle so as to cover it.	Ku mpuzu z’ihema ryo hejuru, ibihimba bizorenga vy’itambge rimwe‐rimwe ku mpande zompi, bize vyēnēnere mu mbavu z’iryo hema ry’imbere, biritwikire.
This is what the Lord, the Lord Almighty, says: “Go, say to this steward, to Shebna the palace administrator:	Uku ni k’Umwami Uhoraho Nyen’ ingabo agize: ati Genda kuri wa mubgiriza Shebuna, ari we muzezwarugo, umubaze,
For if you are careful to carry out these commands, then kings who sit on David’s throne will come through the gates of this palace, riding in chariots and on horses, accompanied by their officials and their people.	Kuko ni mwagenza murtyo koko, ni ho mu birimba vy’iki gisagara hazoca abami uko bakūranwa ku ngoma ya Dawidi, bagendera mu mikogote no ku mafarasi, umwami wese n’ abasavyi biwe n’abantu biwe.
You also must be ready, because the Son of Man will come at an hour when you do not expect him.”	Namwe mwame mwiteguye, kuk’ Umwana w’umuntu azoza mu gihe mutiyumviriye.

Mose ahamagara Abisirayeli bose, arababarira, ati Yemwe Bisirayeli, ni mwumve amabgirizwa n’ivyagezwe mvugira mu matwi yanyu uyu musi, kugira ngo muvyige, muvyitondere, mubishitse.
King David rose to his feet and said: “Listen to me, my fellow Israelites, my people. I had it in my heart to build a house as a place of rest for the ark of the covenant of the Lord , for the footstool of our God, and I made plans to build it.	Maz’ umwami Dawidi arahaguruka, aravuga, ati Ni muntege amatwi, bagenzi banje kandi bantu banje; nari mbisanganywe mu mutima kuzokwubakira isandugu y’isezerano ry’Uhoraho ingoro y’uburuhukiro, ngw iz’ ibēre Imana yacu indava y’ah’ ishira ibirenge; kandi nari niteguye kwubaka.
He replied, “Because the knowledge of the secrets of the kingdom of heaven has been given to you, but not to them.	Arabishura, ati Mwebge mwahawe kumenya amabanga y’ubgami bgo mw ijuru, ariko bo ntibābihawe.
His left arm is under my head, and his right arm embraces me.	Ukuboko kwiwe kw’ukubamfu kuranseguye, Ukuboko kwiwe kw’ukuryo kurampfumbatiye.
So he built the temple and completed it, roofing it with beams and cedar planks.	Uko ni ko yubatse iyo ngoro, arayuzuza; ayimanikisha ibishōro n’imbaho vy’amasederi.
So the elders of the Jews continued to build and prosper under the preaching of Haggai the prophet and Zechariah, a descendant of Iddo. They finished building the temple according to the command of the God of Israel and the decrees of Cyrus, Darius and Artaxerxes, kings of Persia.	Nukw abakuru b’Abayuda bagira ikiganza ciza mu kwubaka, bafashijwe n’ukuvugishwa kwa Hagayi uwavugishwa n’Imana na Zekariya mwene Ido. Barayubaka iruzura, nk’ukw ibgirizwa ry’Imana y’ Abisirayeli ryashinze, kandi no kubg’ icagezwe ca Kuro na Dariyo, na Aritazeruzi umwami w’i Buperesi.
For it is with your heart that you believe and are justified, and it is with your mouth that you profess your faith and are saved.	Kuk’ umutima ari wo umuntu yizeresha, akaronka ukugororoka: kand’ akanwa akaba ari ko yāturisha, akaronka agakiza.
Then Jesus said to his disciples, “Truly I tell you, it is hard for someone who is rich to enter the kingdom of heaven.	Yesu abgira abigishwa biwe, ati Ndababgire ukuri: Biragoye k’umutunzi yinjira mu bgami bgo mw ijuru.

Do not eat it with bread made with yeast, but for seven days eat unleavened bread, the bread of affliction, because you left Egypt in haste—so that all the days of your life you may remember the time of your departure from Egypt. the water from upstream stopped flowing. They did this regularly and collected a great amount of money. For a person may labor with wisdom, knowledge and skill, and then they must leave all they own to another who has not toiled for it. This too is meaningless and a great misfortune. Hoshea, Hananiah, Hasshub,	na Hosheya na Hananiya na Hashubu,
These wicked people, who refuse to listen to my words, who follow the stubbornness of their hearts and go after other gods to serve and worship them, will be like this belt—completely useless!	Aba bantu b’abanyakibi, uko bākanse kwumva amajambo yanje, bakagendera mu budadarare bg’imitima yabo, bagakurikira izindi mana ngw abe ari zo basaba, bazisenge, bazomera nk’uyu mukanda utakigira ico umaze.
The end is now upon you, and I will unleash my anger against you. I will judge you according to your conduct and repay you for all your detestable practices.	Noneh’ umuhero ugushitseko, ngira nguteze uburake bganje, ngucire urubanza ruhwanye n’ ingeso zawe; kand’ ibizira vyawe vyose nzobigusubiza ku mutwe.
The path of the righteous is level; you, the Upright One, make the way of the righteous smooth.	Inzira y’umugororotsi iratunganye: ni wewe usena inzira y’umugororotsi.
I foretold the former things long ago, my mouth announced them and I made them known; then suddenly I acted, and they came to pass.	Kera navuze ibizoba bitaraza; ni koko vyavuye mu kanwa kanje, ndavyerekana: kandi nabikoze giturumbuka, birashika.
Now Ben-Hadad king of Aram mustered his entire army. Accompanied by thirty-two kings with their horses and chariots, he went up and besieged Samaria and attacked it.	Bukeye Beni‐hadadi umwami w’i Siriya akoranya ingabo ziwe zose, aradūga aja gutera i Samariya, ahugariza impande zose; abami mirongwitatu na babiri bafatanya na we, bari n’amafarasi n’imikogote y’intambara.
The first centers of his kingdom were Babylon, Uruk, Akkad and Kalneh, in Shinar.	Ubgami bgiwe bga mbere bgagarukira i Babeli no muri Ereki no muri Akadi n’i Kalune, mu gihugu c’i Shinari.

They looked for a way to arrest him, but they were afraid of the crowd because the people held that he was a prophet.	Barondeye ingene bomufata, batinya abantu, kuko bamwiyumvira kw ar’ ūvugishwa n’Imana.
Among all these soldiers there were seven hundred select troops who were left-handed, each of whom could sling a stone at a hair and not miss.	Kandi mur’ izo ngabo zose hārimw’ abantu b’intorwa amajana ndwi b’amabamfu, kand’ umwe‐umwe muri bo yashobora guteresha ibuye umugozi ntāhushe, n’iyo koba agashatsi kamwe.
When I please, I will punish them; nations will be gathered against them to put them in bonds for their double sin.	Nzobahana uko ngomba: kand’ amahanga azokoranira kubarwanya, igihe bazoba baboshwe kubg’ ibicumuro vyabo vyompi.
The disciples came to him and asked, “Why do you speak to the people in parables?”	Abigishwa baramwēgēra, baramubaza, bati Mbeg’ ikigutera kubigishiriza mu migani n’iki?
As for the priests, the descendants of Aaron, who lived on the farm lands around their towns or in any other towns, men were designated by name to distribute portions to every male among them and to all who were recorded in the genealogies of the Levites.	Kandi kubg’ abaherezi bo mu ba Aroni bāba mu matongo aho bafise amaragiro inyuma y’ibisagara vyabo, mu gisagara cose hār’ abantu bazwi amazina bāshiriweho guha umugabane umuntu wese w’izinamuhungu mur’ abo baherezi n’ abanditswe bose mu Balewi mu gitabo kidondora amavuka yabo.
And I will live among the Israelites and will not abandon my people Israel.”	Kandi nzoba mu Bisirayeli, sinzoheba abantu banje.
And the Lord said to Moses: “You are going to rest with your ancestors, and these people will soon prostitute themselves to the foreign gods of the land they are entering. They will forsake me and break the covenant I made with them.	Uhoraho abarira Mose, ati Rāba, ugiye guhamvya ba sogokuruza bawe; kand’ iri hanga rizohaguruka, bahurumbire izindi mana nk’ibimaka, ari vyo bigirwamana vy’ico gihugu, aho bagiye kuja kuba muri bene co, bamveko, bice isezerano ryanje nasezeranye na bo.
and he reigned in Jerusalem three years. His mother’s name was Maakah daughter of Abishalom.	Amara imyaka itatu i Yerusalemu ari ku ngoma, kandi nyina yitwa Mayaka umukobga wa Abishalomu.
In the thirty-seventh year of the exile of Jehoiachin king of Judah, in the year Awel-Marduk became king of Babylon, on the twenty-fifth day of the twelfth month, he released Jehoiachin king of Judah and freed him from prison.	Maze mu mwaka ugira mirongwitatu n’indwi Yehoyakina umwami w’i Buyuda ari mu mugozi, mu kwezi kw’icumi na kabiri, ku musi wakwo wa mirongwibiri na gatanu, Evili‐merodaki umwami w’i Babuloni abohora Yehoyakina umwami w’i Buyuda, amukūra mw ibohero: hāri mu mwaka yimyemwo.
Did not he who made me in the womb make them? Did not the same one form us both within our mothers?	Mbeg’ iyandemeye mu nda ya mama si yo yamuremye na we? Iyatubumbiye mu nda s’ imwe?
You shall consecrate them so they will be most holy, and whatever touches them will be holy.	Ubirobanure, kugira ngo bize bibe ivyera cane: ikizobikorako cose kizoba kibaye icera, kibe inyegu yavyo.
After he is cleansed, he must wait seven days.	Maze ni yamara guhumanurwa bamuharūrire imisi ndwi.
For the creation was subjected to frustration, not by its own choice, but by the will of the one who subjected it, in hope	Kukw ivyaremwe vyagezwe kuganzwa n’ibitagira ikimazi, kandi si vyo vyavyigombeye, ariko vyagizwe n’Iyageze ko biganzwa birtyo,
For the inner sanctuary he made a pair of cherubim out of olive wood, each ten cubits high.	Abāza mu biti vy’imyelayo ibishushanyo vy’abakerubi bibiri vyo gushira Ahēra Cane, uburebure bgavyo bgar’ amatambge cumi y’ukuboko uciriye mu nkokora.
Your words have supported those who stumbled; you have strengthened faltering knees.	Amajambo yawe yaramira uwarikw aratemba, Kandi wagumisha amavi aregarega.
Send the people away so that they can go to the surrounding countryside and villages and buy themselves something to eat.”	basezere, baje mu misozi no mu mihana impande zose, kwirondereray’ ivyo kurya.
Paul answered, “I am a Jew, from Tarsus in Cilicia, a citizen of no ordinary city. Please let me speak to the people.”	Paulo aramwishura, ati Nd’ Umuyuda, umuntu w’i Taruso, igisagara c’i Kilikiya kitayoberanye: none ndakwinginze unkundire ico mbarira abantu.
In addition to those slain in battle, the Israelites had put to the sword Balaam son of Beor, who practiced divination.	Kandi na Balamu mwene Beyori w’umumenyi, Abisirayeli bāmwicishije inkota hamwe n’abandi bishe.
Saul answered, “But am I not a Benjamite, from the smallest tribe of Israel, and is not my clan the least of all the clans of the tribe of Benjamin? Why do you say such a thing to me?”	Maze Sauli aramwishura, ati Mbega sind’ Umubenyamini, ari wo muryango mutoya hanyuma y’iyindi yo mu Bisirayeli? Kand’ inzu yacu si yo ntoya hanyuma y’ayandi mazu yose yo mu Babenyamini? None n’iki gitumye umbarira ben’ ivyo?
On that day David had said, “Anyone who conquers the Jebusites will have to use the water shaft to reach those ‘lame and blind’ who are David’s enemies. ” That is why they say, “The ‘blind and lame’ will not enter the palace.”	Uwo musi Dawidi aravuga, at’ Ūgomba gutera Abayebusi, n’ adūgane umugende w’amazi, abone gutera ivyo bimuga n’impumyi umutima wanje wanka. Ni co catumye bavuga, ngo Nta mpumyi cank’ ibimuga bizoshobora kwinjira mu ngoro.
These are the regulations for anyone who has a defiling skin disease and who cannot afford the regular offerings for their cleansing.	Ico ni co cagezwe c’uwafashwe n’ indwara y’imibembe, ntashobore kuronka ivyo kumuhumanura.
They will shave their heads because of you and will put on sackcloth. They will weep over you with anguish of soul and with bitter mourning.	kandi bazokwimosha inkomvorera kubgawe, bakenyere amagunira, bakuririre batuntuye mu mitima baboroga cane.
“The multitude of your sacrifices— what are they to me?” says the Lord . “I have more than enough of burnt offerings, of rams and the fat of fattened animals; I have no pleasure in the blood of bulls and lambs and goats.	Ibimazi vyanyu vy’isinzi bimmariye iki? ni k’Uhoraho abaza. Ati Mpāze ivyo bimazi vyoshejwe vy’amasuguru y’intama, n’ibinure vy’ibitungwa bivyibushe; kandi simpimbarwa n’amaraso y’amashūri n’ay’ imyagazi y’intama n’ay’ amasuguru y’impene.
Evildoers will bow down in the presence of the good, and the wicked at the gates of the righteous.	Ababi bacira bugufi abeza, N’abanyavyaha bicisha bugufi ku marembo y’abagororotsi.
All who have this hope in him purify themselves, just as he is pure.	Kand’ umuntu wese amuzigakw ivyo, ariyeza, nk’uk’ uwo ar’ uwera.

Their relatives, by families, were: Michael, Meshullam, Sheba, Jorai, Jakan, Zia and Eber—seven in all.	n’abandi b’i wabo bo mu mazu ya ba sekuruza, ni bo aba: Mikayeli na Meshulamu na Sheba na Yorayi na Yakani na Ziya na Eberi, ukw ar’ indwi;

Then Moses summoned Bezalel and Oholiab and every skilled person to whom the Lord had given ability and who was willing to come and do the work. David was told, “Uriah did not go home.” So he asked Uriah, “Haven’t you just come from a military campaign? Why didn’t you go home?”	Maze babariye Dawidi, bat’ Erega Uriya ntiyatashe i muhira; Dawidi aca abaza Uriya, ati Mbega ntiwar’ uvuye ku rugendo? None k’utāgiye kurāra i wawe?
They were piled into heaps, and the land reeked of them.	Babirunda ibirundo, igihugu kiranuka.
He read it aloud from daybreak till noon as he faced the square before the Water Gate in the presence of the men, women and others who could understand. And all the people listened attentively to the Book of the Law. I have spoken to you of earthly things and you do not believe; how then will you believe if I speak of heavenly things?	Ko nababgiye ivy’ isi ntimwemere, none muzokwemera mute ni nababgira ivy’ ijuru?
But when the Moabites came to the camp of Israel, the Israelites rose up and fought them until they fled. And the Israelites invaded the land and slaughtered the Moabites. Acquitting the guilty and condemning the innocent— the Lord detests them both.	Ūtsindanishiriza umunyakibi, bo n’ūtsindisha umugororotsi Bompi nyene n’igisesema k’ Uhoraho.

Then young women will dance and be glad, young men and old as well. I will turn their mourning into gladness; I will give them comfort and joy instead of sorrow. It is the Sovereign Lord who helps me. Who will condemn me? They will all wear out like a garment; the moths will eat them up.	Rāba Umwami Uhoraho ni we azompagarikira; non’ uwontsindisha ni nde? Ereg’ abo bose bazosāza nk’impuzu; inyenzi zizobarya zibamare.

Ephraim has surrounded me with lies, Israel with deceit. And Judah is unruly against God, even against the faithful Holy One.	Efurayimu ankikije ibinyoma, n’ab’ inzu ya Isirayeli bankikije ubugunge; ariko Yuda we aracatwarira Imana, aracar’ umwizigirwa k’Uwera.
A king delights in a wise servant, but a shameful servant arouses his fury.	Umwami atonesha umusavyi w’ubgenge, Arik’ uburake bgiwe buba ku muntu akora ibiterasoni.

When Athaliah the mother of Ahaziah saw that her son was dead, she proceeded to destroy the whole royal family.	Maze Ataliya nyina wa Ahaziya abonye k’umwana wiwe Ahaziya apfuye, arahaguruka ageseza abo mu nda y’ingoma bose.

and said to him: “Run, tell that young man, ‘Jerusalem will be a city without walls because of the great number of people and animals in it.	aramubarira, at’ Irukanga, ubgire uwo musore, ut’ I Yerusalemu hazosubira gusagaza abantu nk’ibisagara bitazitiriwe, kukw abantu n’amasho bizohaba ari vyinshi.
They were all trying to frighten us, thinking, “Their hands will get too weak for the work, and it will not be completed.” But I prayed, “Now strengthen my hands.”	Kuko bose bāgomba kudutera ubgoba, bati Bazohava bacika intege, igikorwa gihere aho. Ariko none Mana, undemeshe.
