For your hands are stained with blood, your fingers with guilt. Your lips have spoken falsely, and your tongue mutters wicked things.	Kukw amaboko yanyu yandujwe n’amaraso, n’intoke zanyu zandujwe n’ibigabitanyo; iminwa yanyu yama ivuga ibinyoma, n’ururimi rwanyu ruvugira ibibi mu ntamatama.
Now the coastlands tremble on the day of your fall; the islands in the sea are terrified at your collapse.’	Noneh’ ababa kuri co bazohinda agashitsi ku musi w’ugusenyerana kwawe; mber’ ibizinga vyo mu kiyaga bizohagarikwa umutima n’uk’ uherengeteye.
In my vision I saw myself in the citadel of Susa in the province of Elam; in the vision I was beside the Ulai Canal.	Mbona ivyo neretswe nko mu nzozi, maze mvyitegereje mbona ndi ku murwa i Shushani, mu ntāra yo muri Elamu; ndāvye ivyo neretswe mbona ndi ku ruzi Ulayi.
Let me get you something to eat, so you can be refreshed and then go on your way—now that you have come to your servant.” “Very well,” they answered, “do as you say.”	nanje nzane utwo kurya, mwihēmbūre, muheze mubone kugenda, ko mugendeye umusavyi wanyu. Bati Kora uko uvuze.
No temptation has overtaken you except what is common to mankind. And God is faithful; he will not let you be tempted beyond what you can bear. But when you are tempted, he will also provide a way out so that you can endure it.	Nta cabagerageje kitar’ ic’ umuntu yoshobora kwihanganira: arikw Imana n’iyo kwizigirwa ntizobakundira ko mugeragezwa n’ibiruta ivyo mushobora, ariko hamwe n’ikibagerageza izobacira icanzo, kugira ngo mubone ingene mushobora kucihanganira.
“ ‘Meat that touches anything ceremonially unclean must not be eaten; it must be burned up. As for other meat, anyone ceremonially clean may eat it.	Ni hagira inyama zikora ku kintu gihumanya ntizize ziribge, ariko ziturirwe. Umuntu wese adahumanye ni we yemererwa kurya ku nyama z’ico kimazi.
The rest of the grain offering belongs to Aaron and his sons; it is a most holy part of the food offerings presented to the Lord . Yet I will not tear the whole kingdom from him, but will give him one tribe for the sake of David my servant and for the sake of Jerusalem, which I have chosen.”	Na we nyene sinzomushikura ubgami bgose, ariko nzomusigariza umuryango umwe kubga Dawidi umusavyi wanje, no kubga Yerusalemu natoranije.
and the people went out to see what had happened. Then their father Israel said to them, “If it must be, then do this: Put some of the best products of the land in your bags and take them down to the man as a gift—a little balm and a little honey, some spices and myrrh, some pistachio nuts and almonds.	Se Isirayeli arababgira, at’ Enda ko bimeze birtyo, ni mugenze murtya: mujane mu magunira yanyu ibiba mur’ iki gihugu birusha ibindi kuba vyiza, mubishīre uwo mugabo kw ingemurano: umuti wo gusomōra ugeze, n’ ubūki bugeze, n’imibavu, n’isenga, n’ibiyoba, na shakedi;
Then he turned to his disciples and said privately, “Blessed are the eyes that see what you see.	Ahindukirira abigishwa, ababgira biherereye, ati Hahirwa amaso abona ivyo mubona.
But be sure to fear the Lord and serve him faithfully with all your heart; consider what great things he has done for you.	Ariko gusa, ni mwubahe Uhoraho, mumukorere mushize igikonyo, bivuye mu mutima; murābe ivyo yabakoreye ingen’ ar’ ibihambaye.
Then another sign appeared in heaven: an enormous red dragon with seven heads and ten horns and seven crowns on its heads.	Mw ijuru haboneka ikindi kimenyetso, igisato c’amahēro gisa n’ikibengebenge, gifise imitwe ndwi n’amahembe cumi, no mu mitwe yaco cambaye imigāra ndwi.
For in that day every one of you will reject the idols of silver and gold your sinful hands have made.	Maze kur’ uwo musi umuntu wese azoshibura ibigirwamana vyiwe vy’ifeza, n’ibigirwamana vyiwe vy’izahabu, ivyo mwacurishije intoke zanyu kubabera icaha.
When tempted, no one should say, “God is tempting me.” For God cannot be tempted by evil, nor does he tempt anyone;	Umuntu ni yageragezwa gukora ibibi, yoye kuvuga ngw Imana ni yo ingerageje. Kukw Imana itageragezwa n’ibibi, kandi na yo nta we ibigerageresha.
God gives some people wealth, possessions and honor, so that they lack nothing their hearts desire, but God does not grant them the ability to enjoy them, and strangers enjoy them instead. This is meaningless, a grievous evil.	n’ umuntu Imana yahaye itunga n’ ibintu n’icubahiro, bituma atabura ikintu na kimwe mu vyo umutima wiwe wokwifuje, maz’ Imana ntimuhe kubumbga na vyo, ariko bikazoribga na murundi; ivyo n’ ubusa, kandi n’ibara ribi.
He then went in search of Ahaziah, and his men captured him while he was hiding in Samaria. He was brought to Jehu and put to death. They buried him, for they said, “He was a son of Jehoshaphat, who sought the Lord with all his heart.” So there was no one in the house of Ahaziah powerful enough to retain the kingdom.	Maz’ arondera Ahaziya, bamufatira aho yari yinyegeje i Samariya, bamushīra Yehu, baramwica; baraheza baramuhamba, kuko bāvuga, bati N’ umwuzukuru wa Yehoshafati yarondeza Uhoraho umutima wiwe wose. Maze mu nzu ya Ahaziya ntihāsigaramwo ūshoboye kuganza.
I make known the end from the beginning, from ancient times, what is still to come. I say, ‘My purpose will stand, and I will do all that I please.’	Mpēra kw itanguriro nkavuga ivy’ iherezo, ngahēra no mu bihe vya kera nkavuga ibitaraba; nkavuga nt’ Imigabo yanje izohama, kand’ ivyo nzogomba vyose nzobishitsa.
Where is your king, that he may save you? Where are your rulers in all your towns, of whom you said, ‘Give me a king and princes’?	Mbeg’ umwami wawe ari hehe, ngw agukize mu bisagara vyawe vyose? N’abashingantahe bawe bari hehe, abo wasavye ngo baguhe umwami n’abaganwa?
At once they left their nets and followed him.	Baca bareka insenga, baramukurikira.
“The fall of Moab is at hand; her calamity will come quickly.	Ukugesezwa kw’i Mowabu kuri hafi gushika, ivyago vyaho bije akabushungwe.
Like one who takes away a garment on a cold day, or like vinegar poured on a wound, is one who sings songs to a heavy heart.	Kuvugiriza impundu umuntu atuntuye mu mutima Ni nk’umuntu kwiyambura impuzu mu gihe c’imbeho, n’inkarisha isutswe ku munyu witwa amagadi.
Anyone who touches something unclean—whether human uncleanness or an unclean animal or any unclean creature that moves along the ground —and then eats any of the meat of the fellowship offering belonging to the Lord must be cut off from their people.’ ”	Kand’ umuntu wese azokora ku kintu gihumanya ic’ ari co cose, ar’ igiherereye ku muntu, cank’ ar’ igitunzwe gihumanya, cank’ ar’ ikindi cose c’ikizira gihumanya, agaheza akarya ku nyama z’ikimazi c’ishimwe, kand’ ar’ icanje jewe Uhoraho, uwo muntu az’ acibge mu bgoko bgabo.
Do this for each one, for as many as you prepare.	Ukw ibimazi muzotanga bingana, az’ abe ari ko muzogenza kuri kimwe‐kimwe, uko bizoba bingana kwose.
The ruthless will vanish, the mockers will disappear, and all who have an eye for evil will be cut down—	Kuk’ umuntu w’agaterabgoba atituwe, n’umucokoranyi aheze, kand’ abatambira kugabitanya bose barahonnye,

Philip went to tell Andrew; Andrew and Philip in turn told Jesus.	Filipo araza abibarira Andereya; Andereya na Filipo baraza babibarira Yesu.
For twelve years they had been subject to Kedorlaomer, but in the thirteenth year they rebelled.	Bari bamaze imyaka cumi n’ibiri baganzwa na Kedolawoma, maze mu mwaka ugira icumi na gatatu baragarariza.
While David was at Horesh in the Desert of Ziph, he learned that Saul had come out to take his life.	Maze Dawidi abonye ko Sauli amurondera ngw amwice, yigumira i Horeshi mu bugaragwa bg’i Zifu.
I looked, and I saw a figure like that of a man. From what appeared to be his waist down he was like fire, and from there up his appearance was as bright as glowing metal.	Ngize ntya, mbona nk’ūfise ishusho isa n’umuriro; kand’ uhereye ahobaye mu rukenyerero rwiwe ugasubiza ahahera hepfo, yar’ umuriro: uhereye ahobaye mu rukenyerero rwiwe ugasubiza ahahera haruguru, hāsa n’ibica ibibatsi, biboneka nk’umuringa w’ umujumbu.
So there will be eight frames and sixteen silver bases—two under each frame.	Nukw izo mbaho zose na zose zizoba munani, n’ibitereko vyazo vy’ifeza cumi na bitandatu: ibitereko bibiri‐bibiri bije musi y’urubaho rumwe‐rumwe.
Whether the cloud stayed over the tabernacle for two days or a month or a year, the Israelites would remain in camp and not set out; but when it lifted, they would set out.	Naho yaba imisi ibiri, cank’ ukwezi, canke kurengaho, ico gicu uko caguma kur’ iryo hema ni kw Abisirayeli baguma aho bashagaje, ntibagende: maz’ iyo kidūze bakabona kugenda.
This man was handed over to you by God’s deliberate plan and foreknowledge; and you, with the help of wicked men, put him to death by nailing him to the cross.	uwo muntu amaze gutangwa nk’ukw Imana yabigabiye yikomvomvoye, ibimenye bitaribgabe, mumubambisha amaboko y’abagarariji, muramwica.
I set out during the night with a few others. I had not told anyone what my God had put in my heart to do for Jerusalem. There were no mounts with me except the one I was riding on.	Ndaheza mpenga mw ijoro mvyukana n’ abantu bake, kandi sinagize umuntu n’umwe mbgira ivyo Imana yashize mu mutima wanje ngo ndabikorere Yerusalemu; kandi nta mafarasi twajanye atar’ iyo nagenderako.
Then he showed me Joshua the high priest standing before the angel of the Lord , and Satan standing at his right side to accuse him.	Maz’ anyereka Yosuwa umuherezi mukuru ahagaze imbere y’umumarayika w’Uhoraho, na Satani ahagaze i buryo bgiwe ngw amurege.
Even Elizabeth your relative is going to have a child in her old age, and she who was said to be unable to conceive is in her sixth month.	Kand’ umve, Elisabeti mwene wanyu na we atwaye inda y’umuhungu mu butāmakazi bgiwe, uwitwa ingumba uku n’ukwezi kwiwe kwa gatandatu:

What is more, I consider everything a loss because of the surpassing worth of knowing Christ Jesus my Lord, for whose sake I have lost all things. I consider them garbage, that I may gain Christ	Eka mbere n’ibintu vyose ndavyiyumvira kw ar’ ubuhombe, kubg’ ikibirengeye, ni co kumenya Kristo Yesu Umwami wanje. “So then, the days are coming,” declares the Lord , “when people will no longer say, ‘As surely as the Lord lives, who brought the Israelites up out of Egypt,’	Nuko rero, mu misi izoza, ni jewe Uhoraho mbivuze, ntibazoba bakirahira uguhoraho kwanje, jewe Uhoraho, ko nakūye Abisirayeli mu gihugu ca Egiputa,

For the husband is the head of the wife as Christ is the head of the church, his body, of which he is the Savior.	Kuk’ umugabo ari we mutwe w’umugore wiwe, nk’uko Kristo na we ar’ umutwe w’ishengero, akaba Umukiza waryo, ari wo mubiri wiwe.

I want you to know that I am not doing this for your sake, declares the Sovereign Lord . Be ashamed and disgraced for your conduct, people of Israel!	Ivyo simbikora kubganyu, mubimenye, ni k’Umwami Uhoraho agize; mutēterezwe, mumāramāzwe n’ ingeso zanyu, yemwe ab’ inzu ya Isirayeli.

We know that God does not listen to sinners. He listens to the godly person who does his will.	Turazi kw Imana itumviriza abanyavyaha, arik’ ūyubaha, agakora ivyo igomba, uwo ni we yumviriza.

“ ‘And if the prophet is enticed to utter a prophecy, I the Lord have enticed that prophet, and I will stretch out my hand against him and destroy him from among my people Israel. but I gave them this command: Obey me, and I will be your God and you will be my people. When Jesus stepped ashore, he was met by a demon-possessed man from the town. For a long time this man had not worn clothes or lived in a house, but had lived in the tombs. All of you are standing today in the presence of the Lord your God—your leaders and chief men, your elders and officials, and all the other men of Israel,	Rāba uyu musi muhagaze imbere y’Uhoraho Imana yanyu mwese: abakuru b’imiryango, n’ abashingantahe banyu, n’abagabisha banyu, n’abagabo mwese bo mu Bisirayeli,

Meanwhile a Jew named Apollos, a native of Alexandria, came to Ephesus. He was a learned man, with a thorough knowledge of the Scriptures.	Maz’ Umuyuda yitwa Apolo, amamo yiwe ni muri Alekisanderiya, yar’ umuntu w’ubgenge, ashika muri Efeso; yar’ umunyabushobozi mu vyanditswe.

“I do not accept glory from human beings,	Singomba gushimwa n’abantu,
These people are blemishes at your love feasts, eating with you without the slightest qualm—shepherds who feed only themselves. They are clouds without rain, blown along by the wind; autumn trees, without fruit and uprooted—twice dead. May its morning stars become dark; may it wait for daylight in vain and not see the first rays of dawn,	Inyenyeri zo mu gahuru karyo ziragacura umwiza: Ryitege umuco, riwubure, Kandi ntirikabone ugutambika kw’umutwenzi:

Not one of them was among those counted by Moses and Aaron the priest when they counted the Israelites in the Desert of Sinai.	Ariko muri bo ntihari hakigira n’umwe mu bāharūwe na Mose na Aroni umuherezi, igihe bāharūrira Abisirayeli mu bugaragwa bg’i Sinayi.
From the days of our ancestors until now, our guilt has been great. Because of our sins, we and our kings and our priests have been subjected to the sword and captivity, to pillage and humiliation at the hand of foreign kings, as it is today. Say to the southern forest: ‘Hear the word of the Lord . This is what the Sovereign Lord says: I am about to set fire to you, and it will consume all your trees, both green and dry. The blazing flame will not be quenched, and every face from south to north will be scorched by it.	ubgire ico kibira caho, uti Ni wumve ijambo ry’Uhoraho: uku ni k’Umwami Uhoraho agize, ngw Ehe ngira nkudomekek’ umuriro kand’ uzotongora igiti kibisi cose co muri wewe, n’igiti cumye cose: ibirimi vy’ibibengebenge vyawo ntibizohwamikwa, mu maso h’abantu bose hazobabuka uhereye i bumanuko ukageza i burārūko.

The Lord answered Moses, “Go out in front of the people. Take with you some of the elders of Israel and take in your hand the staff with which you struck the Nile, and go.	Uhoraho abarira Mose, ati Ca imbere y’abantu, ujane bamwe mu bakuru b’Abisirayeli; witwaze na ya nkoni wakubitishije rwa ruzi, ugende.
He and all his family were devout and God-fearing; he gave generously to those in need and prayed to God regularly.	Yar’ umuntu yubaha Imana akayitinyana n’abo mu nzu yiwe bose, yagirira abantu ubuntu bginshi, agasenga Imana ubudasība.
These were the clans of Naphtali; those numbered were 45,400.	Abo ni bo bābayemw’ amazu y’aba Nafutali, nk’ukw amazu yabo ari: abāharūwe bo muri bo bār’ ibihumbi mirongwine na bitanu n’amajana ane.
Now there were some present at that time who told Jesus about the Galileans whose blood Pilate had mixed with their sacrifices.	Ico gihe abantu bār’ aho bamwīgānira ivy’ Abanyagalilaya, abo Pilato yavanganije amaraso yabo n’ibimazi vyabo.
But little do they know that the dead are there, that her guests are deep in the realm of the dead.	Ariko wa wundi ntaba azi kw imizimu ari ho iri, Kandi kw abatumire biwe baba i bgina i kuzimu.
Why do the nations conspire and the peoples plot in vain?	Abanyamahanga n’iki kibateye umuvurungano? N’amoko yagīriye ingingo iki ivy’ ubusa?
This is what Moses had given to the tribe of Gad, according to its clans:	Kandi Mose yahaye umuryango w’Abagadi ishamvu, nk’ukw amazu yabo ari.
After this I heard what sounded like the roar of a great multitude in heaven shouting: “Hallelujah! Salvation and glory and power belong to our God,	Hanyuma y’ivyo numva mw ijuru ikimeze nk’ijwi rirenga ry’ishengero ryinshi, riti Haleluya ; agakiza n’ubgiza n’ububasha n’ivy’ Imana yacu,
He brought me out into a spacious place; he rescued me because he delighted in me.	Ayankūramwo, anshira ahantu hāgutse: Yandokoye kuko namuhimbaye.
Just as you, Judah and Israel, have been a curse among the nations, so I will save you, and you will be a blessing. Do not be afraid, but let your hands be strong.”	Nuko, nk’uko mwari mu mahanga murik’ umuvumo, yemwe ab’ inzu ya Yuda, namwe ab’ inzu ya Isirayeli, ni ko nzobakiza, mubek’ umuhezagiro; ntimutinye, arikw amaboko yanyu n’akomere.
when my path was drenched with cream and the rock poured out for me streams of olive oil.	Ibirenge vyanje bigitonyanga ivuta, Ubgato bgimbge mu gitandara bukinsendanishiriza amavuta ya elayo!

Keep reminding God’s people of these things. Warn them before God against quarreling about words; it is of no value, and only ruins those who listen.	Wame ubibutsa ivyo, ubihanikiririza mu nyonga z’Imana ntibarwanire amajambo kuko bitagira ikimazi, bigwisha abumva.

Abraham will surely become a great and powerful nation, and all nations on earth will be blessed through him.	kand’ ari we azohinduka ihanga rinini rikomeye, amahanga yose yo mw isi akazohērwa umugisha muri we?
For I did not speak on my own, but the Father who sent me commanded me to say all that I have spoken.	Kukw ivyo ntabivuze mvyigeneye, ariko Data yantumye, ni we yangeze ivyo nkwiye kuvuga n’ivyo nkwiye gusigura.

Then Absalom sent secret messengers throughout the tribes of Israel to say, “As soon as you hear the sound of the trumpets, then say, ‘Absalom is king in Hebron.’ ”	Bukeye Abusalomu atuma abantu ngo bagende mu mpisho, bakwiragire mu miryango yose y’Abisirayeli, ngo bavuge, bati Ni mwumva ijwi ry’inzamba, muce muvuga, muti Abusalomu agiye ku ngoma i Heburoni.

Now Peter was sitting out in the courtyard, and a servant girl came to him. “You also were with Jesus of Galilee,” she said.	Ariko Petero yari yicaye hanze mu rugo. Incoreke iza ah’ ari, iti Nawe nyene mwari kumwe na Yesu Umunyagalilaya.
“To the angel of the church in Sardis write: These are the words of him who holds the seven spirits of God and the seven stars. I know your deeds; you have a reputation of being alive, but you are dead. Then the Philistines seized him, gouged out his eyes and took him down to Gaza. Binding him with bronze shackles, they set him to grinding grain in the prison.	Maz’ Abafilisitiya baramufata, bamunogora amaso, bamumanukana i Gaza, bamufatisha iminyororo y’imiringa, bamugira umusyi mu nzu y’imbohe.

So Uriah the priest built an altar in accordance with all the plans that King Ahaz had sent from Damascus and finished it before King Ahaz returned.	Nuko Uriya yubaka igicaniro nk’ico, nk’ukw icitegererezo cari kimeze kwose, ico umwami Ahazi yamurungikiye ar’ i Damasiko; uko ni ko Uriya umuherezi yacubatse, kugira ng’ umwami Ahazi, ni yaza avuye i Damasiko, az’ asange cuzuye.
Then King Asa brought all the men of Judah, and they carried away from Ramah the stones and timber Baasha had been using. With them he built up Geba and Mizpah.	Maz’ umwami Asa ahitana Abayuda bose, baja i Rama, bakūray’ amabuye n’ibiti, ivyo Bayasha yarikw arubakisha; maz’ avyubakisha i Geba n’i Misipa.
I know that you are pleased with me, for my enemy does not triumph over me.	Iki ni co kimmenyesha yuk’ unnezererwa, N’uk’ umwansi wanje atonyitamba hejuru.
They inserted the poles into the rings so they would be on the sides of the altar for carrying it. They made it hollow, out of boards.	Yinjiza iyo miniho mur’ ivyo bigombo biri mu mbavu z’ico gicaniro, yo kukirerura; yakibāje mu mbaho, akigira igisamāre.
Any clothing or leather that has semen on it must be washed with water, and it will be unclean till evening.	Kand’ umwambaro wose cank’ urusato rwose kirikw izo ntanga, kize kimesurwe, kize gikomeze kiba igihumanye gushitsa ku mugoroba.

I was given a reed like a measuring rod and was told, “Go and measure the temple of God and the altar, with its worshipers.	Bampa irenga rimeze nk’inkoni, bati Va hasi ugere urusengero rw’Imana n’igicaniro n’abarusengeramwo.
“I will repay you for the years the locusts have eaten— the great locust and the young locust, the other locusts and the locust swarm — my great army that I sent among you. Will you never look away from me, or let me alone even for an instant?	Uzogeza ryari kutankūrakw ijisho, Ng’ umpumekere, mmire amate?

For the time will come when people will not put up with sound doctrine. So the Levite, the husband of the murdered woman, said, “I and my concubine came to Gibeah in Benjamin to spend the night.	Wa Mulewi, umugabo wa wa mugore yishwe, arabishura, ati Nashitse i Gibeya h’i Bubenyamini, mpāka indāro ndi kumwe n’umugore wanje.
For David had done what was right in the eyes of the Lord and had not failed to keep any of the Lord ’s commands all the days of his life—except in the case of Uriah the Hittite.	kuko Dawidi yakora ivyo Uhoraho abona kw ari vyiza, ntakikame ngw ace mu kintu na kimwe yamugeze igihe cose yamaze akiriho, ukūye ivyo yakoze ku vya Uriya Umuheti.
But now the Lord says: “Within three years, as a servant bound by contract would count them, Moab’s splendor and all her many people will be despised, and her survivors will be very few and feeble.”	Ariko noneho, Uhoraho avuze, ngw Imyaka itatu itarashira, urīmbūye imyaka nk’iy’ umucangero, icubahiro c’i Mowabu kizokēngērwa bo n’ishengero ryaho ryose rikomeye, kand’ amasigarira azoba ar’ inkehwa rwose, ata co bamaze.
Brothers and sisters, I urge you to bear with my word of exhortation, for in fact I have written to you quite briefly.	Ariko bene Data, ndabahanūra, mwihanganire iri jambo ribahanūra, kuko mbandikiye amajambo make.
those who are pure in their own eyes and yet are not cleansed of their filth;	Har’ urunganwe rw’abantu bibgira ko batunganye, Ariko ntibuhagiwe imyanda yabo.
“ ‘Therefore this is what the Sovereign Lord says: Because of your false words and lying visions, I am against you, declares the Sovereign Lord .	Nuko rer’ uku ni k’Umwami Uhoraho agize, ngo Ko mwavuze ibitagira ikimazi, mukerekwa ibinyoma, ngw Ehe muzohigūra na we, ni k’Umwami Uhoraho agize.
If I sinned, you would be watching me and would not let my offense go unpunished.	Iyo nkoze icaha unshinga ijisho, Kandi ntuzomparira ivyo nagabitanije.
“But now listen, Jacob, my servant, Israel, whom I have chosen.	Yamara noneh’ umve, yewe Yakobo musavyi wanje, yewe Isirayeli uwo natoranije:

While the whole assembly of Israel was standing there, the king turned around and blessed them.	Maz’ umwami arahindukira, ahezagira ikoraniro ryose ry’Abisirayeli; kand’ iryo koraniro ryose ryari rihagaze.
Therefore, just as sin entered the world through one man, and death through sin, and in this way death came to all people, because all sinned—	None rero ko bimeze birtyo, nk’ukw icaha cazanywe mw isi n’umuntu umwe, urupfu rukazanwa n’icaha, ni k’urupfu rushika ku bantu bose, kuko bose bākoze ivyaha:
After he left Hebron, David took more concubines and wives in Jerusalem, and more sons and daughters were born to him.	Maze Dawidi yābīrira i Yerusalemu abandi bamikazi, ahagirira n’izindi ncoreke zimeze bga bagore, amaze kwimukirayo avuye i Heburoni, yongera kuvyara abandi bana b’abahungu n’abakobga.
He said: “Some Jews have agreed to ask you to bring Paul before the Sanhedrin tomorrow on the pretext of wanting more accurate information about him.	Aramwishura, at’ Abayuda bahūje inama yo kukwinginga ngw ejo uz’ umanukane Paulo mw ikombe, nk’ūgomba kubaza ivyiwe ng’ urushirize kubimenya neza.
But a Pharisee named Gamaliel, a teacher of the law, who was honored by all the people, stood up in the Sanhedrin and ordered that the men be put outside for a little while.	Maze hahaguruka umwe mw ikombe, w’Umufarisayo yitwa Gamaliyeli, umwigisha w’ivyagezwe, yubahwa n’abantu bose, avuga ko bataramura abo bantu akanya gato.
Jesus replied, “And why do you break the command of God for the sake of your tradition?	Na we arababaza, ati None mweho, n’iki catumye murenga icagezwe c’Imana kubg’ imigenzo yanyu?
“Suppose one of you has a servant plowing or looking after the sheep. Will he say to the servant when he comes in from the field, ‘Come along now and sit down to eat’?	Ariko ni nde muri mwebge afise umugurano amurimira cank’ amuragirira intama, iyo yinjiye avuye ku kivi canke kuragira, mbega yomubarira, ati Ngwino n’ingoga wicare urye?
They are to bring to the priest as a guilt offering a ram from the flock, one without defect and of the proper value. In this way the priest will make atonement for them for the wrong they have committed unintentionally, and they will be forgiven.	Az’ azanire umuherezi impfizi y’intama itagira agasembga, ikūwe mu mukuku, iz’ ibe iyimaze igiciro uzocira, ibe ikimazi c’ impongano. Uwo muherezi az’ amuhongere kur’ ico kintu yacumuye atabigize ibigirankana, atabizi, na we azoharirwa.
unless, when we enter the land, you have tied this scarlet cord in the window through which you let us down, and unless you have brought your father and mother, your brothers and all your family into your house.	Enda ni twashika mur’ iki gihugu, uz’ upfundike aka kagozi gasa n’agahama kur’ iri dirisha uducishijemwo; maze so na nyoko n’abo muvukana n’abo mu rugo kwa so bose uz’ ubakoranirize aha i wawe.
So Jeremiah the prophet said to all the people of Judah and to all those living in Jerusalem:	Iryo ni ryo Yeremiya uwavugishwa n’Imana yabariye abantu bose b’i Buyuda, n’ababa i Yerusalemu bose,
But I said, “Should a man like me run away? Or should someone like me go into the temple to save his life? I will not go!”	Nanje ndamwishura, nti Mbeg’ umuntu nkanje nohunga? Kand’ umuntu nkanje yokwinjira mu rusengero ngo yikize? Eka sinjayo!
There the centurion found an Alexandrian ship sailing for Italy and put us on board.	Uwo mugabisha w’abasoda ijana ahasanga ubgato buvuye muri Alekisanderiya buja muri Italiya, adushiramwo.
“May my enemy be like the wicked, my adversary like the unjust!	Umwansi wanje n’amere nk’ umunyakibi, Kand’ ūnkūriye hasi n’amere nk’umugabitanyi.
At the king’s command they removed from the quarry large blocks of high-grade stone to provide a foundation of dressed stone for the temple.	Nuk’ umwami agera ko bimba amabuye manini‐manini y’igiciro kinini, kugira ngw itanguriro ry’iyo ngoro ryubakishwe amabuye abājwe.
They kept the matter to themselves, discussing what “rising from the dead” meant.	Babīka iryo jambo, basiguzanya ivy’ ukuzuka mu bapfuye ivy’ ari vyo.
From now on there will be five in one family divided against each other, three against two and two against three.	Ndababgire, si ko biri, ariko naje kuzana umucano. Kuk’ uhereye none hazobaho batanu mu nzu imwe batandukanye, batatu na babiri, na babiri na batatu.
A scoundrel plots evil, and on their lips it is like a scorching fire.	Umuntu w’umugarariji yimba ivyago, Kandi mu minwa yiwe harimw’ umuriro w’inkazi.

Some Pharisees came to him to test him. They asked, “Is it lawful for a man to divorce his wife for any and every reason?”	Abafarisayo baza kuri we bamugeza, baramubaza, bati Mbega biremerwa k’umuntu yirukana umugore kubg’ inyanduruko y’ikintu cose?
God is in her citadels; he has shown himself to be her fortress.	Imana yimenyekanishije mu ngoro zo kuri wo kw ar’ igihome kirekire gikīngira abantu.

The twelfth, for the twelfth month, was Heldai the Netophathite, from the family of Othniel. There were 24,000 men in his division.	Heludayi w’i Netofati wo mu ba Otiniyeli ni we yar’ umugabisha agira icumi na kabiri wo mu kwezi kw’icumi na kabiri; ingabo zo ku rubu rwiwe zār’ ibihumbi mirongwibiri na bine nyene.
The quiet words of the wise are more to be heeded than the shouts of a ruler of fools.	Amajambo y’abanyabgenge avuzwe buhoro yumvirizwa kurusha gusemerera kw’umuntu w’iremezo ry’ibipfu.
The caravans of Tema look for water, the traveling merchants of Sheba look in hope.	Igugu ry’ab’ i Tema ryari ribīteze, Ingenzi z’i Sheba zari zibarorereye;
At the end of that time, I, Nebuchadnezzar, raised my eyes toward heaven, and my sanity was restored. Then I praised the Most High; I honored and glorified him who lives forever. His dominion is an eternal dominion; his kingdom endures from generation to generation. This is the inheritance Moses had given when he was in the plains of Moab across the Jordan east of Jericho.	Ayo ni yo mashamvu Mose yagabuye ari mu kiyaya c’i Mowabu, hakurya ya Yorodani, aharābana n’i Yeriko ku ruhande rw’i burasirazuba.

At that time they sacrificed to the Lord seven hundred head of cattle and seven thousand sheep and goats from the plunder they had brought back.	Kur’ uwo musi baha Uhoraho ibimazi, inka amajana ndwi n’intama ibihumbi ndwi, babikūye ku minyago bāzanye.
But in the seventh year the land is to have a year of sabbath rest, a sabbath to the Lord . Do not sow your fields or prune your vineyards.	Arik’ umwaka ugira indwi uz’ ubere igihugu nk’isabato yo kuruhuka bihebuje, nk’isabato yo kunyubaha jewe Uhoraho: ntimuze muwurimemwo mu ndimiro zanyu, ntimuze muwutūtūriremw’ imizabibu yanyu.
As was his custom, Paul went into the synagogue, and on three Sabbath days he reasoned with them from the Scriptures,	Nuko Paulo, nk’uko yamenyereye, yinjira muri bo, amara amasabato atatu avugana na bo ivyo mu vyanditswe,
The destroyer will come against every town, and not a town will escape. The valley will be ruined and the plateau destroyed, because the Lord has spoken.	Kand’ umunyazi azoshika ku gisagara cose, nta gisagara na kimwe kizomukira: ababa mu mwonga bazohona, n’ababa mu kiyaya bazogesezwa, nk’uk’ Uhoraho yabivuze.
They came to Bethsaida, and some people brought a blind man and begged Jesus to touch him.	Baraza bashika i Betsayida. Bamuzanira impumyi, baramwinginga ngw ayikoreko.
Then they said to him, “Please inquire of God to learn whether our journey will be successful.”	Baramubarira, bat’ Enda se tubarize Imana, tumenye ko tuzogira amahirwe mu rugendo rwacu.
He answered, “Haven’t you read what David did when he and his companions were hungry?	Na we arababaza, ati Nta ho murasoma ico Dawidi yakoze, aho yar’ asonzanye n’abāri kumwe na we;
That night the Lord appeared to him and said, “I am the God of your father Abraham. Do not be afraid, for I am with you; I will bless you and will increase the number of your descendants for the sake of my servant Abraham.”	Uhoraho amwiyereka iryo joro, aramubgira, ati Nd’ Imana ya so Aburahamu: ntutinye, kuko ndi kumwe nawe, kandi nzoguha umugisha, ngwize uruvyaro rwawe, kubg’ umusavyi wanje Aburahamu.
Whoever keeps commandments keeps their life, but whoever shows contempt for their ways will die.	Uwitondera icagezwe aba azigamye ubugingo bgiwe, Arik’ ūtitwaririka inzira ziwe azopfa.
I have revealed and saved and proclaimed— I, and not some foreign god among you. You are my witnesses,” declares the Lord , “that I am God.	Ni jewe nabitāngāje, ni jewe nakijije, ni jewe nabimenyekanishije, kandi nta yindi mana yariho muri mwebge: ni co gituma ari mwebge vyabona vyanje, ni k’Uhoraho agize, kandi ni jewe Mana.
From the tribe of Judah 12,000 were sealed, from the tribe of Reuben 12,000, from the tribe of Gad 12,000,	Abo mu muryango wa Yuda bākidomweko n’ibihumbi cumi na bibiri: Abo mu muryango wa Reyubeni n’ibihumbi cumi na bibiri: Abo mu muryango wa Gadi n’ibihumbi cumi na bibiri:
However, the Lord your God would not listen to Balaam but turned the curse into a blessing for you, because the Lord your God loves you.	Yamar’ Uhoraho Imana yanyu yanka kwumvira Balamu, arik’ uwo muvumo Uhoraho Imana yanyu awubahindurira umugisha, kuko yabakunda.
Then Zophar the Naamathite replied:	Maze Zofari w’i Nayama arishura,
these I will bring to my holy mountain and give them joy in my house of prayer. Their burnt offerings and sacrifices will be accepted on my altar; for my house will be called a house of prayer for all nations.”	abo na bo nzobashikana ku musozi wanje wera, mbanezereze mu ngoro yanje yo gusengeramwo; ibimazi vyabo vyo kwoswa n’ivyo gukererwa bizokwemerwa ku gicaniro canje: kukw ingoro yanje izokwitwa inzu yo gusengerwamwo n’amahanga yose.
Where can we go? Our brothers have made our hearts melt in fear. They say, ‘The people are stronger and taller than we are; the cities are large, with walls up to the sky. We even saw the Anakites there.’ ”	Muti None tudūga tuja hehe? Muti Bagenzi bacu ko baturanduye imitima, ngw Abantu baho ni banini, kandi baradusumba; ngw Ibisagara vyabo ni binini, bizitijwe inzitiro z’ amabuye zigera mw ijuru; ngo Mbere babonyeyo n’Abanaki.
Magdiel and Iram. These were the chiefs of Edom, according to their settlements in the land they occupied. This is the family line of Esau, the father of the Edomites.	na Magidiyeli na Iramu. Abo ni bo bakuru b’imiryango yakomōtse kuri Edomu ari we Esau, sekuruza w’ Abanyedomu, nk’ukw amashamvu yabo ari mu gihugu bīzīziye.
Then the Babylonians came to her, to the bed of love, and in their lust they defiled her. After she had been defiled by them, she turned away from them in disgust.	Maz’ ab’i Babuloni baraza, bamusanga ku buriri yabengukirwako, bamwononesha ubusambanyi bgabo, mbere ahumanywa na bo; hanyuma umutima wiwe urabazinukwa.
He was with God in the beginning.	Uwo yahoranye n’Imana ubga mbere na mbere;
My fellow prisoner Aristarchus sends you his greetings, as does Mark, the cousin of Barnabas. (You have received instructions about him; if he comes to you, welcome him.)	Arisitariko, uwo dusangiye umunyororo, arabatasha; na Mariko, mwene se wabo wa Barunaba, arabatasha, umwe mwabgirizwa ivyiwe: ni yaramuka aje i wanyu muze mumwākīre.
I will give you hidden treasures, riches stored in secret places, so that you may know that I am the Lord , the God of Israel, who summons you by name.	kandi nzoguha itunga rihishijwe mu mwiza, n’ubutunzi bunyegejwe mu mpisho, kugira ng’ umenye kw ari jewe Uhoraho nguhamagaye mw izina, jewe nyene Imana y’Abisirayeli.
For it is: Do this, do that, a rule for this, a rule for that ; a little here, a little there.”	Kukw ivyiwe ar’ ibgirizwa ku rindi, ibgirizwa ku rindi, n’umurongo ku wundi, umurongo ku wundi, hamwe tumwe, ahandi utundi.
Later that night, the boat was in the middle of the lake, and he was alone on land.	Bgagorovye, bga bgato bushitse mw idamba, ariko we yar’ i musozi wenyene.
But the Pharisees and the teachers of the law were furious and began to discuss with one another what they might do to Jesus.	Ariko bo birabasaza rwose, baja inama y’ico bogira Yesu.
He burned the bones of the priests on their altars, and so he purged Judah and Jerusalem.	Aturirira amagufa y’ abaherezi ku bicaniro vyabo; nukw atunganya i Buyuda n’i Yerusalemu.
Samson went down to Timnah and saw there a young Philistine woman.	Samusoni aramanuka aja i Timuna; abonay’ umwigeme wo mu Bafilisitiyakazi.
then do to the false witness as that witness intended to do to the other party. You must purge the evil from among you.	muze mumushire aho yagira ashire mugenzi we. Ukw az’ abe ari ko mukūra ikibi hagati muri mwebge.
Their people, drained of power, are dismayed and put to shame. They are like plants in the field, like tender green shoots, like grass sprouting on the roof, scorched before it grows up.	Ni co catumye abābibamwo baba imburamaboko, bagacika ivutu, bakamāramāra; bagacika nk’ubgatsi bgo ku gahinga, nk’ubgatsi bg’urumerera, nk’ivyatsi vyimejeje ku nzu, nk’ingano zirumvye zikir’ ibironge.
Then the woman, seeing that she could not go unnoticed, came trembling and fell at his feet. In the presence of all the people, she told why she had touched him and how she had been instantly healed.	Wa mugore abonye yukw atayoberanye, aza ahinda agashitsi, amwikubita imbere, amubgirira mu maso y’abantu bose icatumye amukorako, n’ukw akize uwo mwanya.
“And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. Your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions. One day the evil spirit answered them, “Jesus I know, and Paul I know about, but who are you?”	Impwemu ihumanye irabishura, iti Yesu ndamuzi, na Paulo ndamuzi, ariko mweho muri ba nde?
Look to the Lord and his strength; seek his face always.	Murondere Uhoraho n’inkomezi ziwe; Murondere mu nyonga hiwe ibihe bidashira.

to submit to such people and to everyone who joins in the work and labors at it.	Nuko namwe mugāmburukire abameze bartyo, n’uwundi wese afatanije n’abandi mur’ ico gikorwa, agatama.
Then David approached, and when Araunah looked and saw him, he left the threshing floor and bowed down before David with his face to the ground.	Nuko Dawidi aja kwa Orunani; Orunani agize ngw ararāba, abona Dawidi; ava ku mbuga, arenga irembo, akubita inkoro hasi imbere yiwe, aramwunamira.
Therefore this is what the Sovereign Lord says: “My servants will eat, but you will go hungry; my servants will drink, but you will go thirsty; my servants will rejoice, but you will be put to shame. Its alcoves, its projecting walls and its portico had the same measurements as the others. The gateway and its portico had openings all around. It was fifty cubits long and twenty-five cubits wide.	agera n’ivyumba bigendanye ikirirīsi caco, n’ ibishimaryango vyaco, n’amabaraza yaco, bihwana n’ukw amatambge ya mbere angana: kandi kuri co hārikw amadirisha bo no ku mabaraza yaco impande zose: uburebure bg’ikirirīsi caco buba amatambge mirongwitanu, n’ubgaguke bgaco buba mirongwibiri n’ atanu.
As a cloud vanishes and is gone, so one who goes down to the grave does not return.	Nk’ukw igicu cēyūka kigakamangana, Ni ko n’ūmanuka aja mu kuzimu atazosubira kudūga ukundi.
We know that we are children of God, and that the whole world is under the control of the evil one.	Turazi yuko tur’ ab’ Imana, kand’ isi yose iri muri wa Mubi.
Brothers and sisters, as an example of patience in the face of suffering, take the prophets who spoke in the name of the Lord.	Abāvugishijwe mw izina ry’Umwami Imana bababere icitegererezo bene Data, co kubabazwa no kwihangana.
Then Moses set aside three cities east of the Jordan,	Maze Mose arobanura ibisagara bitatu hakuno ya Yorodani ahahera i burasirazuba,
By faith in the name of Jesus, this man whom you see and know was made strong. It is Jesus’ name and the faith that comes through him that has completely healed him, as you can all see.	Kand’ uyu, uwo mubona kandi muzi, kuko yizeye izina ry’uwo, iryo zina ryamuhaye inkomezi: mber’ ukwizera ahawe na we ni kwo kumukirije rwose imbere yanyu mwese.
As soon as you hear the sound of the horn, flute, zither, lyre, harp, pipe and all kinds of music, you must fall down and worship the image of gold that King Nebuchadnezzar has set up.	ngo Ni mwumva amajwi y’inzamba n’imyironge n’inanga n’amakembe n’imiduri n’ivyitwa sumponya n’ibindi vy’ubgoko bgose bivuzwa, muce mwikubita hasi musenge iki gishushanyo c’izahabu umwami Nebukadineza yahagaritse;
But concerning Israel he says, “All day long I have held out my hands to a disobedient and obstinate people.”	Ariko ku Bisirayeli aravuga, ati Nirirwa ntegeye amaboko ubgoko butumva butongana.
“A voice is heard in Ramah, weeping and great mourning, Rachel weeping for her children and refusing to be comforted, because they are no more.”	ngw Induru yumvikana i Rama, Amarira n’amaborogo menshi; Rakeli aririra abana biwe, Yanka kwīrūrwa, kuko batakiriho.
Consequently, faith comes from hearing the message, and the message is heard through the word about Christ.	Nuk’ ukwemera kuva ku kwumva, n’ukwumva kuzanwa n’ijambo rya Kristo.

They set the ark of God on a new cart and brought it from the house of Abinadab, which was on the hill. Uzzah and Ahio, sons of Abinadab, were guiding the new cart	Nuko bashira iyo sandugu y’Imana ku mukogote musha, bayikūra kwa Abinadabu yaba kur’ uwo musozi; Uza na Ahiyo bene Abinadabu bayobora inka zikwega uyo mukogote musha.
It was because of the Lord ’s anger that all this happened to Jerusalem and Judah, and in the end he thrust them from his presence. Now Zedekiah rebelled against the king of Babylon.	Kukw ivyabaye i Yerusalemu n’i Buyuda vyavuye ku burake bg’ Uhoraho, gushitsa ah’ amaramarije kubirukana imbere yiwe. Hanyuma Zedekiya agarariza umwami w’i Babuloni.

Who has woe? Who has sorrow? Who has strife? Who has complaints? Who has needless bruises? Who has bloodshot eyes?	Ni nde agira ngo Yō! Ni nde agira ngw Agwē! Ni nde afise imitongano? Ni nde afise imyidodombo? Ni nde afise inguma ata nyanduruko? Ni nde afise amaso atukuye?

So now the Lord is about to strike your people, your sons, your wives and everything that is yours, with a heavy blow.	ngo Rāba Uhoraho ngw Azotēza abantu bawe ivyago bikomeye, bo n’abana bawe n’ abamikazi bawe n’ivy’ ufise vyose;
as well as the priests—Eliakim, Maaseiah, Miniamin, Micaiah, Elioenai, Zechariah and Hananiah with their trumpets—	bo n’abaherezi Eliyakimu na Mayaseya na Minyamini na Mikaya na Eliyowenayi na Zekariya na Hananiya bafise inzumbete;
Jacob came home to his father Isaac in Mamre, near Kiriath Arba (that is, Hebron), where Abraham and Isaac had stayed.	Yakobo ashika kwa se Isaka, i Mamure, i Kiriyati‐Araba, ari ho Heburoni, aho Aburahamu na Isaka bāba nk’abashitsi.
Then Judas (not Judas Iscariot) said, “But, Lord, why do you intend to show yourself to us and not to the world?”	Yuda (atari Isikaryota), aramubaza, ati Mugenzi, bibaye bite, k’ugira wihishurire twebge, ntiwihishurire ab’ isi?
Be wise, my son, and bring joy to my heart; then I can answer anyone who treats me with contempt.	Mwana wanje, uce ubgenge, unezereze umutima wanje, Kugira ngo ngire ico nishura uwontuka.
There remains, then, a Sabbath-rest for the people of God;	Nuko rero haracarih’ uburuhukiro bg’isabato bubīkiwe abantu b’Imana.

Saul also went to his home in Gibeah, accompanied by valiant men whose hearts God had touched.	Sauli na we arītāhira, aja i muhira i Gibeya, acagatiwe n’abantu b’abahizi, abo Imana yakoze mu mitima.
The land produced vegetation: plants bearing seed according to their kinds and trees bearing fruit with seed in it according to their kinds. And God saw that it was good.	Nukw isi imera ivyatsi n’ibimera vyose vyama utubuto ukw amoko yavyo ari, n’ibiti vyama ivyamwa birimw’ imbuto zavyo, ukw amoko yavyo ari: nukw Imana ibona kw ari vyiza.

How awful that day will be! No other will be like it. It will be a time of trouble for Jacob, but he will be saved out of it.	Ew’ amagorwa ari hano! Kuk’ uwo musi uhambaye, nta wuhwanye na wo: n’igihe c’umubabaro wa ba Yakobo; yamara bazogikizwa.
Moses could not enter the tent of meeting because the cloud had settled on it, and the glory of the Lord filled the tabernacle.	Mose ntiyashobora kwinjira mur’ iryo hema ry’ibonaniro, kukw ico gicu cari kuri ryo, n’ubgiza bg’Uhoraho bguzuye mur’ iryo hema ry’imbere.
The towns of the Levites in the territory held by the Israelites were forty-eight in all, together with their pasturelands.	Ibisagara Abalewi bāhawe mu mashamvu y’Abisirayeli bandi, vyose na vyose vyari mirongwine n’umunani, hamwe n’amaragiro bigendanye.
In the twelfth year of Ahaz king of Judah, Hoshea son of Elah became king of Israel in Samaria, and he reigned nine years.	Mu mwaka ugira icumi na kabiri Ahazi umwami w’i Buyuda ari ku ngoma, ni ho Hoseya mwene Ela yima i Samariya mu Bisirayeli; amara imyaka cenda ari ku ngoma.
After Seth was born, Adam lived 800 years and had other sons and daughters.	Adamu amaze kuvyara Seti, amara imyaka amajana munani, ayivyaramw’ abahungu n’abakobga.

Therefore the Lord will take no pleasure in the young men, nor will he pity the fatherless and widows, for everyone is ungodly and wicked, every mouth speaks folly. Yet for all this, his anger is not turned away, his hand is still upraised.	Ni co gitumye Umwami Imana atazonezererwa imisore yo muri bo, kand’ atazoterwa akagongwe n’impfuvyi zo muri bo n’abapfakazi: kukw abantu bose ar’ abatubaha Imana, bakaba inkozi z’ibibi, kandi n’akanwa kose kakavuga ubupfu. Yamara na ho nyene uburake bg’Uhoraho ntiburahwama, arik’ ukuboko kwiwe kuracabānguye.

and said to me, ‘I am going to make you fruitful and increase your numbers. Then I saw in the right hand of him who sat on the throne a scroll with writing on both sides and sealed with seven seals.	Mbona igitabo mu kuboko kw’i buryo kw’Īvyagiye kuri ya ntebe, canditse imbere n’inyuma, kidombagijek’ udushashara ndwi, tukimatanije tudomyemw’ ikimenyetso.
For I know that good itself does not dwell in me, that is, in my sinful nature. For I have the desire to do what is good, but I cannot carry it out.	Ndazi yuko muri jewe, mu kameremere kanje, ata ciza kimbamwo: kuko kugomba gukora iciza kubana nanje, ariko kugikora nta kwo.
Then he lay down under the bush and fell asleep. All at once an angel touched him and said, “Get up and eat.”	Araheza yiryamira musi y’ico giti c’umurotemu, arasinzira; maz’ umumarayika araza aramukoma, aramubarira, ati Vyuka, urye.

So they called together all the rulers of the Philistines and asked them, “What shall we do with the ark of the god of Israel?” They answered, “Have the ark of the god of Israel moved to Gath.” So they moved the ark of the God of Israel.	Ni kwo gutuma ku baganwa b’Abafilisitiya bose, bakoraniraho barababaza, bati Mbeg’ isandugu y’Imana y’ Abisirayeli tuyigenze dute? Barabishura, bati Ni bayijane i Gati. Nuko bajanay’ iyo sandugu y’ Imana y’Abisirayeli.
The sons of Elpaal: Eber, Misham, Shemed (who built Ono and Lod with its surrounding villages),	Bene Elipali ni Eberi na Mishamu na Shemedi; Shemedi uwo ni we yubatse Ono na Lodi bo n’ibisagara bihakūkira;
Then Jesus said, “Did I not tell you that if you believe, you will see the glory of God?”	Yesu aramubgira, ati Sinakubgiye nti Ni wizera urabona ubgiza bg’Imana?
The company of the prophets said to Elisha, “Look, the place where we meet with you is too small for us.	Bukeye abiga ivy’ ukuvugishwa babarira Elisa, bat’ Ehe rāba, aho tuba haratwāgiye, nk’ uko nawe ubibona.
After he became the father of Enoch, Jared lived 800 years and had other sons and daughters.	Yeredi amaze kuvyara Henoki, amara iyindi myaka amajana munani, ayivyaramw’ abahungu n’abakobga.
When the sun goes down, he will be clean, and after that he may eat the sacred offerings, for they are his food.	Izuba ni ryamara kurenga azoba ahumanutse; ni h’azobona kurya ku vyejejwe, kukw ivyo ari vyo vyar’ indya ziwe.
And it will be said: “Build up, build up, prepare the road! Remove the obstacles out of the way of my people.”	Kand’ azovuga, ati Ni muharure, ni muharure, mutunganye inzira, mukūre ibitsitaza mu nzira y’abantu banje.
Moses came with Joshua son of Nun and spoke all the words of this song in the hearing of the people.	Nuko Mose araza, avugira amajambo yose y’iyo ndirimbo mu matwi y’abantu, afatanije na Yosuwa mwene Nuni.
His mouth is full of lies and threats; trouble and evil are under his tongue.	Akanwa kiwe kuzuye imivumo n’ubugunge n’akadenderezo; Musi y’ururimi rwiwe har’ ukugira nabi n’ukugabitanya.
“I, wisdom, dwell together with prudence; I possess knowledge and discretion.	Jewe Bgenge, amakenga nayagize inzu yanje, Nserangura ukumenya n’inama nziza.
So the people went out and brought back branches and built themselves temporary shelters on their own roofs, in their courtyards, in the courts of the house of God and in the square by the Water Gate and the one by the Gate of Ephraim.	Nukw abantu bava hasi baragenda barondera amashami, bīcīra insāgo, hejuru ku nzu zabo, no mu ngo zabo, no mu ntangaro y’ingoro y’Imana, no ku kibuga co kw irembo ry’amazi no ku co kw irembo ry’Abefurayimu.
That is all they are to you— these you have dealt with and labored with since childhood. All of them go on in their error; there is not one that can save you.	Uko ni ko bizokubera, ivyo wakobereje; abādandaza nawe uhereye mu buto bgawe bazokwīgīra, umuntu wese yīgīre ahiwe; ntihazogira ūgukiza.
And we urge you, brothers and sisters, warn those who are idle and disruptive, encourage the disheartened, help the weak, be patient with everyone.	Kandi turabahanūra, bene Data, muhubūre abasaragurika, muremeshe abarandutse imitima, muramire abanyantege nke, mwihanganire bose.
Even though we speak like this, dear friends, we are convinced of better things in your case—the things that have to do with salvation.	Ariko, abo nkunda, naho tuvuze durtyo, turazi ivyanyu tudakekeranya yuko birusha ivyo kuba vyiza, kandi bizanana n’agakiza.
For it is clear that our Lord descended from Judah, and in regard to that tribe Moses said nothing about priests.	Birazwi yuk’ Umwami wacu yakomotse kuri Yuda, kand’ uwo muryango Mose nta co yawuvuzeko c’ubuherezi.
I will maintain my innocence and never let go of it; my conscience will not reproach me as long as I live.	Ukugororoka kwanje ndakubangirije, nta ho nzokurekura, Umutima wanje ntuzokwigera unyagiriza no ku vy’umusi n’umwe mu yanje yose.
Now you have a king as your leader. As for me, I am old and gray, and my sons are here with you. I have been your leader from my youth until this day.	Eh’ umwami azobarōngōra nguyo; jeho ndashaje, mmeze imvi; kandi rāba abahungu banje muri kumwe: nanje murazi ko nabarōngōye uhereye mu buto bganje ugashitsa n’ubu.
“Listen to me, my lord; the land is worth four hundred shekels of silver, but what is that between you and me? Bury your dead.”	ati Mushingantahe, ni wumve: non’ agatongo gaciye shekeli z’ifeza amajana ane konteranya nawe? nuko hamba umuntu wawe.
Moreover, as you Philippians know, in the early days of your acquaintance with the gospel, when I set out from Macedonia, not one church shared with me in the matter of giving and receiving, except you only;	Kandi yemwe Bafilipi, namwe n’ico muzi yuko mw itanguriro ry’ubutumwa bgiza, hamwe nava i Makedoniya, ata rindi shengero rya Kristo ryafatanije nanje mu vyo gutanga no guhabga, atari mwebge mwenyene.
They put worn and patched sandals on their feet and wore old clothes. All the bread of their food supply was dry and moldy.	bambara inkweto z’imishire mu birenge ziteye ibiremo, bambara n’impuzu z’imishire nyene; bakora imitsima y’impamba yabaye impehe iguye ifira.
Then Moses and the Israelites sang this song to the Lord : “I will sing to the Lord , for he is highly exalted. Both horse and driver he has hurled into the sea.	Maze Mose n’Abisirayeli baririmbira Uhoraho iyi ndirimbo, bati Ndaririmbira Uhoraho, kukw ari n’intsinzi y’agahebūza. Ifarasi n’ūyigenderako yabinuze mu kiyaga.
And Mephibosheth lived in Jerusalem, because he always ate at the king’s table; he was lame in both feet.	Nuko Mefibosheti aba i Yerusalemu, kuko yama arīra ku meza y’umwami; kandi yari yaramugaye ibirenge vyompi.
But thanks be to God! He gives us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ.	Arikw Imana ishimwe, iduha gutsinda kubg’ Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo.
A voice says, “Cry out.” And I said, “What shall I cry?” “All people are like grass, and all their faithfulness is like the flowers of the field.	Ijwi ry’ūvuga, ati Semerera. Uwundi ati Nsemerere iki? Ut’ Abafise umubiri bose n’ivyatsi gusa, n’ubgiza bgabo bgose bumeze nk’amashurwe yo ku musozi:
Hodiah, Bani and Beninu.	na Hodiya na Bani na Beninu.
“Therefore I say: Listen to me; I too will tell you what I know.	Ni co gitumye mvuga, nti Ni muntege amatwi, Nanje mbaserurire ico niyumvira.
and said, “If you are the king of the Jews, save yourself.”	baramubarira, bati Ni waba ur’ Umwami w’Abayuda, ni wikize.
A fool’s mouth lashes out with pride, but the lips of the wise protect them.	Akanwa k’igipfu kamera inkoni yo gukubita ubgibone bgaco, Arikw iminwa y’abanyabgenge irabazigama.
Meshelemiah had sons: Zechariah the firstborn, Jediael the second, Zebadiah the third, Jathniel the fourth,	Kandi Meshelemiya yar’ afise abahungu; Zekariya ni we mfura, uwa kabiri ni Yediyayeli, uwa gatatu ni Zebadiya, uwa kane ni Yatiniyeli,
He covers the face of the full moon, spreading his clouds over it.	Itwikira intebe yayo, Ikayirenzakw igicu cayo.
On that day tell your son, ‘I do this because of what the Lord did for me when I came out of Egypt.’	Kandi kur’ uwo musi umuntu wese az’ abarire umwana wiwe, at’ Ibi mbikorera kwibuka ivyo Uhoraho yadukoreye, igihe twava muri Egiputa.
But since it involves questions about words and names and your own law—settle the matter yourselves. I will not be a judge of such things.”	ariko kw ar’ibihāri vy’amajambo n’ivy’ amazina n’ivy’ ivyagezwe vyanyu ubganyu, ni mubimare ubganyu: jeho singomba guca urubanza rwa ben’ ivyo.
Some of the elders of the land stepped forward and said to the entire assembly of people,	Maze hava hasi bamwe bo mu bashingantahe b’igihugu, babarira ikoraniro ryose ry’abantu,
“Now, son of man, take a block of clay, put it in front of you and draw the city of Jerusalem on it.	Nuko nawe, mwana w’umuntu, wiyabīrire itafari, urirambike imbere yawe, urishushanyekw igisagara, ari co Yerusalemu:
Just as he was speaking, Judas, one of the Twelve, appeared. With him was a crowd armed with swords and clubs, sent from the chief priests, the teachers of the law, and the elders.	Buno nyene akivuga, Yuda, umwe muri bamwe cumi na babiri, araza, azananye n’igitero kizanye inkota n’amahiri, kivuye ku baherezi bakuru n’abanyabgenge b’ivyanditswe n’abashingantahe.
So she said, “Let Abishag the Shunammite be given in marriage to your brother Adonijah.”	Aramubgira, ati Adoniya mukurwawe n’ahabge Abishagi w’i Shunemu, amucūre.
And I have taken the Levites in place of all the firstborn sons in Israel.	None ntwaye Abalewi ngo basubire mu gishingo c’abana bose b’imfura b’Abisirayeli.
Someone in the crowd said to him, “Teacher, tell my brother to divide the inheritance with me.”	Maz’ umuntu wo mw ishengero aramubgira, ati Mwigisha, mbaririra mwene mama tugabure umwandu.
For to us a child is born, to us a son is given, and the government will be on his shoulders. And he will be called Wonderful Counselor, Mighty God, Everlasting Father, Prince of Peace.	Kuk’ umwana atuvukiye, duhawe umwana w’umuhungu; ubutware buzoba ku bitugu vyiwe: azokwitwa Igitangaza, Umujanama, Imana y’ubushobozi, Data wa twese ahoraho, Umukama w’amahoro.
He thwarts the plans of the crafty, so that their hands achieve no success.	Yica imigabo y’ingunge, Kugira ngw amaboko yazo ntāgire ingene yoyishitsa.
and then come and stand before me in this house, which bears my Name, and say, “We are safe”—safe to do all these detestable things?	maze mukaza mugahagarara imbere yanje mur’ iyi ngoro yitirirwa izina ryanje, mukavuga, muti Turakijijwe: mwaheza mugakora ivyo bizira vyose?
You may say to yourselves, “These nations are stronger than we are. How can we drive them out?”	Kumbure mwokwibaza mu mitima yanyu, mut’ Aya mahanga kw aturuta ubginshi, twoshobora dute kuyanesha?
To God’s holy people in Colossae, the faithful brothers and sisters in Christ: Grace and peace to you from God our Father.	turabandikiye bene Data bo muri Kristo bera b’abizigirwa, mur’ i Kolosayi. Ubuntu n’amahoro bibe muri mwebge biva ku Mana Data wa twese.
Get up, go away! For this is not your resting place, because it is defiled, it is ruined, beyond all remedy.	Ni muhaguruke, mugende; kukw aha atar’ uburuhukiro bganyu, kubg’ ibihumanya bizana gutikira kw’agahebuza.
Then Joab and the troops with him advanced to fight the Arameans, and they fled before him.	Nuko Yowabu n’ ingabo ziri kumwe na we begereza Abasiriya ngo barumaneko; baca bariruka baramuhunga.
Jaala, Darkon, Giddel,	no mu ba Yahala, no mu ba Darikoni, no mu ba Gideli,
Endless ruin has overtaken my enemies, you have uprooted their cities; even the memory of them has perished.	Abansi barayogeye, hasigaye imisaka ibihe vyose, N’ibisagara vyabo warabikomvomvoye, Mbere no kwibukwa kwabo kwarazimanganye.
This is the one who came by water and blood—Jesus Christ. He did not come by water only, but by water and blood. And it is the Spirit who testifies, because the Spirit is the truth.	Ni we Yesu Kristo yaje agaca mu mazi no mu maraso: si mu mazi yonyene, ariko ni mu mazi no mu maraso.
To the Jews who had believed him, Jesus said, “If you hold to my teaching, you are really my disciples.	Nuko Yesu abgira Abayuda bāri bamwemeye, ati Ni mwaguma mw ijambo ryanje, mur’ abigishwa banje vy’ukuri;
So Saul took three thousand able young men from all Israel and set out to look for David and his men near the Crags of the Wild Goats.	Nuko Sauli ahitana ingabo ibihumbi bitatu zitoranijwe mu Bisirayeli bose, baja kurondera Dawidi n’ingabo ziwe mu bitandara ah’ impene z’inyeshamba ziba.
Then some of the leaders in Ephraim—Azariah son of Jehohanan, Berekiah son of Meshillemoth, Jehizkiah son of Shallum, and Amasa son of Hadlai—confronted those who were arriving from the war.	Maz’ abaganwa bamwe b’Abefurayimu, Azariya mwene Yohanani, na Berekiya mwene Meshilemoti, na Yehizikiya mwene Shalumu, na Amasa mwene Hadulayi, barahaguruka, babuza abo batabārutse mu ntambara,
Everyone was amazed and gave praise to God. They were filled with awe and said, “We have seen remarkable things today.”	Bose barumirwa cane, bahimbaza Imana, baterwa n’ubgoba bginshi, bat’ Uyu musi tubonye ibitangaza.
Sanctify them by the truth; your word is truth.	Ubeze mu kuri: ijambo ryawe ni ryo kuri.
Whoever tries to keep their life will lose it, and whoever loses their life will preserve it.	Ūzogerageza gukiza ubugingo bgiwe azobubura; arik’ ūzoheba ubugingo bgiwe azoburokora.
After Moses had sent spies to Jazer, the Israelites captured its surrounding settlements and drove out the Amorites who were there.	Maze Mose atuma gutata i Yazeri, banesha ibisagara vyaho, birukana Abamori bābayo.
“The Lord was very angry with your ancestors.	rit’ Uhoraho yarakiye cane ba sogokuruza banyu.
You saw that the walls of the City of David were broken through in many places; you stored up water in the Lower Pool.	Mubona ibirengero vy’ibizitiriye umurwa wa Dawidi kw ari vyinshi; mugomera amazi yo mu kidengeri co hepfo.
Go to the Levitical priests and to the judge who is in office at that time. Inquire of them and they will give you the verdict.	mushikīre abaherezi, ari bo Balewi, n’ umucamanza azoba ariho mur’ iyo misi, mubibashikirize, na bo bazobamenyesha uko baciye urwo rubanza.
After John’s messengers left, Jesus began to speak to the crowd about John: “What did you go out into the wilderness to see? A reed swayed by the wind?	Abatumwa ba Yohana bagiye, atangura kubgira ishengero ivya Yohana, ati Mwagiye mu bugaragwa kurāba iki? Mbega n’irenga rihungabanywa n’umuyaga?
“So when you give to the needy, do not announce it with trumpets, as the hypocrites do in the synagogues and on the streets, to be honored by others. Truly I tell you, they have received their reward in full.	Ni wagira ubuntu, ntuz’ uvugishe inzamba imbere yawe, nk’ukw indyarya zikora mu masinagogi no mu nzira, ngo bashimwe n’abantu: ndababgire ukuri: Baramaze guhabga impēra zabo.
For the Lamb at the center of the throne will be their shepherd; ‘he will lead them to springs of living water.’ ‘And God will wipe away every tear from their eyes.’ ”	kuko wa Mwagazi ari hagati ahahanganye n’iyo ntebe, azobaragira, kand’ azobashōra ku masōko y’amazi y’ubugingo; kand’ Imana izohanagura amosozi yose ku maso yabo.
At daybreak they entered the temple courts, as they had been told, and began to teach the people. When the high priest and his associates arrived, they called together the Sanhedrin—the full assembly of the elders of Israel—and sent to the jail for the apostles.	Bavyumvise, binjira mu rusengero hāri nko mu mutwenzi, barigisha. Maz’ umuherezi mukuru azanana n’abāri kumwe na we, bahamagaza abanyekombe, n’abakuru bose b’Abisirayeli, maze batuma mu nzu y’abanyororo kubazana.
In those days Hezekiah became ill and was at the point of death. The prophet Isaiah son of Amoz went to him and said, “This is what the Lord says: Put your house in order, because you are going to die; you will not recover.”	Mur’ iyo misi Hezekiya ararwara agera hafi yo gupfa. Bukeye ūvugishwa n’Imana Yesaya mwene Amosi aza kuri we, aramubgira, at’ Uku ni k’Uhoraho agize, ngo Tunganya ivyo mu rugo rwawe, kuk’ ugira utange, utagikira.
The donkey saw me and turned away from me these three times. If it had not turned away, I would certainly have killed you by now, but I would have spared it.”	Indogoba yambonye, ikebereza imbere yanje ibihetangabo gatatu: iy’ idakebereza imbere yanje, simba nabuze kukwica, na yo nkayireka.
This is the account of Shem, Ham and Japheth, Noah’s sons, who themselves had sons after the flood.	Uru ni rwo ruvyaro rwa bene Nowa, ni bo Shemu na Hamu na Yafeti: bavyaye abana, wa mwuzure uvuyeho.
This man, however, did not trace his descent from Levi, yet he collected a tenth from Abraham and blessed him who had the promises.	Ariko wa wundi adaharūrwa mu muryango wabo yatangishije Aburahamu ikigiracumi, kand’ ahezagira nyene gusezeranywa.
The tents of marauders are undisturbed, and those who provoke God are secure— those God has in his hand.	Ingo z’abambuzi zigira amahirwe, N’abavyogoroza Imana baba amahoro; Inkomezi zabo ni zo bagize imana yabo.
It is hidden from the eyes of every living thing, concealed even from the birds in the sky.	Ko buhishijwe amaso y’abariho bose, Bukanyegezwa ibiguruka mu kirēre.
When Baasha heard this, he stopped building Ramah and withdrew to Tirzah.	Bayasha avyumvise, areka kwubaka i Rama, aragenda asubira i Tirusa.
The king of Assyria sent his supreme commander, his chief officer and his field commander with a large army, from Lachish to King Hezekiah at Jerusalem. They came up to Jerusalem and stopped at the aqueduct of the Upper Pool, on the road to the Washerman’s Field.	Bukeye umwami w’i Ashuri atuma Tarutani na Rabusarisi na Rabushake, bava i Lakishi bajanye ingabo nyinshi, ngo baje ku mwami Hezekiya i Yerusalemu. Nuko baradūga baja i Yerusalemu nyene. Bashitseyo bahagarara ku mugende wo ku kidengeri co haruguru, ku nzira yo ku kibuga c’umumesuzi.

because of your father’s God, who helps you, because of the Almighty, who blesses you with blessings of the skies above, blessings of the deep springs below, blessings of the breast and womb. Paul, Silas and Timothy, To the church of the Thessalonians in God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ: Grace and peace to you.	Paulo na Siluwano na Timoteyo turabandikiye abo mw ishengero ry’i Tesalonike, bari mu Mana Data wa twese no mu Mwami Yesu Kristo: ubuntu bube muri mwebge n’amahoro.
Then the people of Israel—the priests, the Levites and the rest of the exiles—celebrated the dedication of the house of God with joy.	Maz’ Abisirayeli n’abaherezi n’Abalewi, n’abandi bavuye mu kinyago, bagira umusi mukuru wo gushikiriza Imana iyo ngoro yayo banezerewe.
so he sent men to capture him. But when they saw a group of prophets prophesying, with Samuel standing there as their leader, the Spirit of God came on Saul’s men, and they also prophesied. that conforms to the gospel concerning the glory of the blessed God, which he entrusted to me.	gukurikira ubutumwa bg’ubgiza bg’Imana ishemagizwa, ubgo najejwe.
From the throne came flashes of lightning, rumblings and peals of thunder. In front of the throne, seven lamps were blazing. These are the seven spirits of God.	Kandi kuri ya ntebe y’ubgami hava imiravyo n’amajwi n’imituragaro: kand’ imuri ndwi z’umuriro zākira imbere y’iyo ntebe, ni zo Mpwemu ndwi z’Imana:
Ishmael son of Nethaniah and the ten men who were with him got up and struck down Gedaliah son of Ahikam, the son of Shaphan, with the sword, killing the one whom the king of Babylon had appointed as governor over the land.	Maze Ishimayeli mwene Netaniya avana hasi n’abo bagabo cumi bāri kumwe na we, bacumita inkota Gedaliya mwene Ahikamu, Ahikamu wa Shafani, baramwica, kand’ ari we umwami w’i Babuloni yashizeho kuganza igihugu.
Does a young woman forget her jewelry, a bride her wedding ornaments? Yet my people have forgotten me, days without number.	Mbeg’ umwigeme yoshobora kwibagira utugenegene twiwe? Cank’ umugeni yokwibagira umwitwikiro wiwe? Arikw abantu banje bānyibagiye imisi myinshi itoharūrwa.
For the entire law is fulfilled in keeping this one command: “Love your neighbor as yourself.”	Kukw ivyagezwe vyose bihūrira mur’ iri jambo, ngo Mukunde bagenzi banyu nk’uko mwikunda.
for which I am an ambassador in chains. Pray that I may declare it fearlessly, as I should.	kuko nd’ intumwa yabgo iboheshejwe umunyororo, nsigure ivyabgo nshize amanga, nk’uko bimbereye kuvuga.
On that same day the king consecrated the middle part of the courtyard in front of the temple of the Lord , and there he offered burnt offerings, grain offerings and the fat of the fellowship offerings, because the bronze altar that stood before the Lord was too small to hold the burnt offerings, the grain offerings and the fat of the fellowship offerings.	Kur’ uwo musi umwami ashinga umwanya wo hagati mu nyubakwa imbere y’ingoro y’ Uhoraho, arahēza; aho ni ho yoshereje ibimazi vyo kwoswa n’ amashikanwa y’amafu n’ibinure vy’ibimazi vy’ishimwe, kukw igicaniro c’umuringa car’ imbere y’ Uhoraho cari gito, kitokwirwakw ibimazi vyo kwoswa n’amashikanwa y’amafu n’ibinure vy’ibimazi vy’ishimwe.
and Benaiah and Jahaziel the priests were to blow the trumpets regularly before the ark of the covenant of God.	na Benaya na Yahaziyeli abaherezi bari bafise inzumbete, bakāma babivuza imbere y’iyo sandugu y’isezerano ry’Imana.
When Job’s three friends, Eliphaz the Temanite, Bildad the Shuhite and Zophar the Naamathite, heard about all the troubles that had come upon him, they set out from their homes and met together by agreement to go and sympathize with him and comfort him.	Nukw abakunzi ba Yobu batatu bumvise ivyo vyago vyose vyamuteye, baraza, umuntu wese muri bo ava i we: Elifazi w’i Temani, na Biludadi w’i Shuhi, na Zofari w’i Nayama; baragana indagano kuja kumugarukirako no kumugandaza.
So they went in to make sacrifices and burnt offerings. Now Jehu had posted eighty men outside with this warning: “If one of you lets any of the men I am placing in your hands escape, it will be your life for his life.”	Nukw arinjira ngw atange ibimazi, yōse n’ivy’ ukwoswa. Ariko Yehu yari yaregetse hanze abantu mirongumunani, arababarira, at’ Aba bantu mbagomoreye, ni haramuka hagize ūcika, uwo acikanye arasubira mu gishingo ciwe apfe.
Even jackals offer their breasts to nurse their young, but my people have become heartless like ostriches in the desert.	Imbgebge zo ziha ivyana vyazo amabgabga, zikavyonsa; Umukobga w’ubgoko bgacu we agira icīra, nk’ibisīga vyo mu bugaragwa vyitwa imbuni.
“You Cushites, too, will be slain by my sword.”	Namwe Banyetiyopiya n’uko, muzokwicwa n’inkota y’Uhoraho.
Of the greatness of his government and peace there will be no end. He will reign on David’s throne and over his kingdom, establishing and upholding it with justice and righteousness from that time on and forever. The zeal of the Lord Almighty will accomplish this.	Ukugwira kw’ubutware bgiwe n’amahoro ntibizogira iherezo, ku ngoma ya Dawidi no ku bgami bgiwe, bibukomeze, bibushigikize guca imanza zibereye n’ukugororoka, uhereye none ugashitsa ibihe vyose. Umwete w’Uhoraho Nyen’ ingabo uzoshitsa ivyo.
He made my mouth like a sharpened sword, in the shadow of his hand he hid me; he made me into a polished arrow and concealed me in his quiver.	akanwa kanje yakagize nk’inkota ikarishe, ampisha mu gitūtu c’ukuboko kwiwe; kandi yampinduye umwampi usennye, mu mutana wiwe ni ho anzigamira rwose.
And I saw a mighty angel proclaiming in a loud voice, “Who is worthy to break the seals and open the scroll?”	Mbona umumarayika w’inkomezi nyinshi asemereza ijwi rirenga, ati Ni nde bibereye kw azingurura kirya gitabo ngw amene ibikimatanije?
And from the tribe of Benjamin they were given Gibeon, Geba, Alemeth and Anathoth, together with their pasturelands. The total number of towns distributed among the Kohathite clans came to thirteen.	kandi ku bisagara vy’umuryango w’Ababenyamini batanga Geba n’i Alemeti n’i Anatoti, bo n’amaragiro bigendanye. Ibisagara vyabo vyose na vyose, guhetūra amazu yabo, vyar’ icumi na bitatu.
through whom we have gained access by faith into this grace in which we now stand. And we boast in the hope of the glory of God.	yadushikanishije ukwizera mur’ ubu buntu duhagazemwo, kandi tunezerezwa no kwizigira kuzobona ubgiza bg’Imana.
so that no one may boast before him.	kugira ngo ntihagire umuntu yirata imbere y’Imana.
During the last watch of the night the Lord looked down from the pillar of fire and cloud at the Egyptian army and threw it into confusion.	Nuko mu gicugu ca nyuma Uhoraho acishiriza ari mu nkingi y’umuriro n’igicu, arunguruka ingabo z’Abanyegiputa, azica ivutu.
To humans belong the plans of the heart, but from the Lord comes the proper answer of the tongue.	Inama umutima wigeneye n’iy’ umuntu, Arikw ivyo ururimi rwishura biva k’Uhoraho.
Now the king was attracted to Esther more than to any of the other women, and she won his favor and approval more than any of the other virgins. So he set a royal crown on her head and made her queen instead of Vashti.	Nuk’ umwami agomwa Esiteri, amurutisha abamikazi bose, na we arakundwakara, aba intoni mu nyonga ziwe kuruta za nkumi zose; bituma amwambika igitsibo c’ubgami mu mutwe, amugira umwamikazi mu gishingo ca Vashiti.
When Asa heard these words and the prophecy of Azariah son of Oded the prophet, he took courage. He removed the detestable idols from the whole land of Judah and Benjamin and from the towns he had captured in the hills of Ephraim. He repaired the altar of the Lord that was in front of the portico of the Lord ’s temple.	Maze Asa yumvise ayo majambo, ayo mwene Odedi yavugishijwe, arema mu mutima, akūrah’ ibizira vy’ubuyobe mu gihugu cose c’i Buyuda n’i Bubenyamini, no mu bisagara yihesheje umuheto vyo mu mugamba w’ Abefurayimu; yongera guhagarika igicaniro cār’ imbere y’urubaraza rw’ingoro y’Uhoraho.
As for me, I call to God, and the Lord saves me.	Jeho nzokwambaza Imana, Uhoraho azonkiza.
Then Saul prayed to the Lord , the God of Israel, “Why have you not answered your servant today? If the fault is in me or my son Jonathan, respond with Urim, but if the men of Israel are at fault, respond with Thummim.” Jonathan and Saul were taken by lot, and the men were cleared.	Maze Sauli aravuga, at’ Ewe Uhoraho, Mana y’Abisirayeli, (n’ iki gitumye utishura umusavyi wawe uyu musi? Namb’ ico caha kiri muri jewe canke muri Yonatani umwana wanje, Uhoraho Mana y’Abisirayeli, rekura Urimu, arikw asangwa kiri mu bantu bawe Abisirayeli), rekura Tumimu. Nuk’ ubupfindo bufata Yonatani na Sauli, arikw abantu barēra.
They have one purpose and will give their power and authority to the beast.	Abo bahūza inama, baha ca gikōko ububasha bgabo n’ubutware bgabo.
These were his instructions: “Take nothing for the journey except a staff—no bread, no bag, no money in your belts.	Ababuza ngo ntibagire ico bajana ku nzira, atar’ inkoni gusa, ati Ntimujane impamba cank’ isaho cank’ amahera mu mipfuko yanyu,
I will make those who are of the synagogue of Satan, who claim to be Jews though they are not, but are liars—I will make them come and fall down at your feet and acknowledge that I have loved you.	Ehe nguhaye bamwe bo mw isinagogi ya Satani, biyita Abayuda, atari bo, ariko babesha; ehe nzobagōbēra kuza, bikubite imbere y’ibirenge vyawe, bamenye yuko nagukunze.
He will come and kill those tenants and give the vineyard to others.” When the people heard this, they said, “God forbid!”	Azoza yice rubi abo barimyi, uruzabibu arusigarane abandi. Bavyumvise baravuga, bati Biragahera.
They took the things Moses commanded to the front of the tent of meeting, and the entire assembly came near and stood before the Lord .	Nuko bazana ivyo Mose yageze imbere y’ihema ry’ibonaniro; ikoraniro ryose ryīgira hafi, rihagarara imbere yo Uhoraho.
Immediately what had been said about Nebuchadnezzar was fulfilled. He was driven away from people and ate grass like the ox. His body was drenched with the dew of heaven until his hair grew like the feathers of an eagle and his nails like the claws of a bird.	Maz’ ako kanya iryo jambo riba kuri Nebukadineza: yirukanwa mu bantu, asigara arisha nk’inka, umubiri wiwe utondwako n’urume ruva mu kirēre, gushitsa ah’ umushatsi wiwe wabereye ikigunda nk’amoya y’inkukuma, n’inzāra ziwe zihinduka nk’iz’ ibisīga.
16,000 people, of whom the tribute for the Lord was 32.	Mu bantu banyaze, abo bahawemwo bār’ ibihumbi cumi na bitandatu; abo Uhoraho yirogōje muri bo bari mirongwitatu na babiri.
After he became the father of Enosh, Seth lived 807 years and had other sons and daughters.	Seti amaze kuvyara Enoshi, amara imyaka amajana munani n’indwi, ayivyaramw’ abahungu n’abakobga.
Miriam and Aaron began to talk against Moses because of his Cushite wife, for he had married a Cushite.	Miriyamu na Aroni banegura Mose, kubg’ Umunyetiyopiyakazi yābiriye; kuk’ uwo Munyetiyopiyakazi yari yaramwābiriye koko.
The Levites purified themselves and washed their clothes. Then Aaron presented them as a wave offering before the Lord and made atonement for them to purify them.	Nukw Abalewi biyuhagira ivyaha, bamesura impuzu zabo; Aroni abatanga kw ishikanwa rijungujwe imbere y’Uhoraho, kand’ abatangira impongano ngo bahumanuke.
Look! An eagle will soar and swoop down, spreading its wings over Bozrah. In that day the hearts of Edom’s warriors will be like the heart of a woman in labor.	Eh’ azodūga aguruke nk’inkukuma, asānze amababa i Bosira: kand’ umutima w’abahizi b’i Edomu kur’ uwo musi uzohinduka nk’umutima w’ umugore ari ku bise.
The Lord will afflict you with madness, blindness and confusion of mind.	Uhoraho azobatērēra ibisazi n’ubuhumyi n’ubuyingiyingi;
With his wife’s full knowledge he kept back part of the money for himself, but brought the rest and put it at the apostles’ feet.	yisigariza ku biguzi vyayo, umugore wiwe abizi, azana ikigabane, agishira imbere y’ibirenge vy’intumwa.
The king of Babylon has heard reports about them, and his hands hang limp. Anguish has gripped him, pain like that of a woman in labor.	Umwami w’i Babuloni yumvise inkuru zavyo, amaboko yiwe arareganuka: uburibge buramufashe, nk’ibise vy’umugore aramutswe.
“No one ever spoke the way this man does,” the guards replied.	Abagendanyi barabishura, bat’ Erega ntihigeze kuboneka umuntu avuga nka we.
Some of the plunder taken in battle they dedicated for the repair of the temple of the Lord .	Ivyo bākūye mu masahu bāsahuye mu ntambara, babitangakw inyegu ngo bibīkirwe kuzohora bitunganya ingoro y’Uhoraho.
Joel, Jehu son of Joshibiah, the son of Seraiah, the son of Asiel,	na Yoweli na Yehu mwene Yoshibiya, Yoshibiya mwene Seraya, Seraya mwene Asiyeli,
This is the city of revelry that lived in safety. She said to herself, “I am the one! And there is none besides me.” What a ruin she has become, a lair for wild beasts! All who pass by her scoff and shake their fists.	Ico ni ca gisagara cihaya, cahora cicaye ata co cinona, kikīyāgira mu mutima, kiti Ni jewe ndiho, nta wundi atari jewe! Ewe kuntu gicitse amatongo, n’ubugaramango bg’ibikōko! Umuntu wese azohaca azohavuzakw agahwa, ahadōdekw agatoke.
Look away from me, that I may enjoy life again before I depart and am no more.”	Unkūrekw igitsure, mbone ingene nsubizwamw’ intege, Ntarava ino, nkaba ntakiriho.
“Just as you say,” Moses replied. “I will never appear before you again.”	Mose aramwishura, at’ Uvuze ko: sinzosubira kukugaruka mu maso ukundi.
Leaving the crowd behind, they took him along, just as he was, in the boat. There were also other boats with him.	Basiga abantu hano, bamujana mu bgato yahozemwo, kand’ ayandi mato yari kumwe na bo.
To the pure, all things are pure, but to those who are corrupted and do not believe, nothing is pure. In fact, both their minds and consciences are corrupted.	Ku badahumanye nta gihumanye, ariko ku banduye, batizera, nta kidahumanye, arik’ ubgenge bgabo n’imitima ibāgiriza vyaranduye.
When evening came, many who were demon-possessed were brought to him, and he drove out the spirits with a word and healed all the sick.	Ku kagoroba, bamuzanira benshi binjiwemwo n’abadayimoni; izo mpwemu mbi azirukanisha ijambo, akiza abāri barwaye bose,
To this end I strenuously contend with all the energy Christ so powerfully works in me.	ico ni co kintamisha, mbirwanira nk’uk’ ubushobozi bgiwe buri, bunkoreramwo bishimitse.

“So I will put an end to lewdness in the land, that all women may take warning and not imitate you.	Uko ni ko nzoca ubushakanyi mu gihugu, kugira ngw abagore bose bigishwe kudatora ubushakanyi bganyu.
Be merciful to me, Lord , for I am in distress; my eyes grow weak with sorrow, my soul and body with grief.	Ngirira ikigongwe Uhoraho we, kuko ngowe: Ijisho ryanje rikabiranijwe n’ intuntu, bo n’ubugingo bganje n’umubiri.
Now Jehoshaphat built a fleet of trading ships to go to Ophir for gold, but they never set sail—they were wrecked at Ezion Geber.	Yehoshafati abāzisha amato y’i Tarushishi yo kwama aja i Ofiru kuzana amazahabu; ariko ntiyashikayo, kuko yamenagurikiye i Eziyoni‐geberi.
so I bought the field at Anathoth from my cousin Hanamel and weighed out for him seventeen shekels of silver.	Nuko ngura na Hanameli mwene wacu iyo shamvu iri Anatoti, ndamugerera ifeza ku munzane, ziba shekeli cumi n’indwi.
Stop judging by mere appearances, but instead judge correctly.”	Ntimupfe guca imanza ku biboneka, ariko muce imanza z’ukuri.
“The sons of Aaron, the priests, are to blow the trumpets. This is to be a lasting ordinance for you and the generations to come.	Bene Aroni abaherezi az’ abe ari bo bavuza izo nzumbete, bibabere icagezwe c’intahava, uk’ urunganwe rwanyu ruzogenda rukurikirana.

Then the nations around you that remain will know that I the Lord have rebuilt what was destroyed and have replanted what was desolate. Such a high priest truly meets our need—one who is holy, blameless, pure, set apart from sinners, exalted above the heavens.	Vyari bitubereye kugira umuherezi mukuru ameze artyo, yera, atagira ubugunge, atanduye, yatandukanijwe n’abanyavyaha, yashizwe hejuru y’amajuru,
When the king heard this, he was greatly distressed; he was determined to rescue Daniel and made every effort until sundown to save him.	Maz’ umwami yumvise iryo jambo biramutuntuza, ashira umutima kuri Daniyeli kugira ngw amukize; yihambirira ku vyo kurokora Daniyeli gushitsa izuba rirenze.
Lazy hands make for poverty, but diligent hands bring wealth.	Ukuboko kw’umunebge kwizanira ubgoro, Arik’ ukuboko kw’umunyamwete kuratungisha.
The priest shall take the basket from your hands and set it down in front of the altar of the Lord your God.	Uwo muherezi amwākīrire ico gisimbo, akijane agitereke imbere y’igicaniro c’ Uhoraho Imana yanyu.

King Jehoiakim, however, sent Elnathan son of Akbor to Egypt, along with some other men.	nuk’ umwami Yehoyakimu atuma abantu muri Egiputa, ni bo Elunatani mwene Akabori n’abandi bagabo bamwe bajanye na we muri Egiputa;
