When it was almost time for the Jewish Passover, many went up from the country to Jerusalem for their ceremonial cleansing before the Passover.	Maze Pasika y’Abayuda yarikw irashika, benshi bava mu misozi, badūga i Yerusalemu, Pasika itarashika, ngo bihumanure.

“ ‘If what they vowed is an animal that is acceptable as an offering to the Lord , such an animal given to the Lord becomes holy.	Ni caba ar’ igitunzwe co mu vyo basanzwe bampakw ibimazi, ic’ ari co cose co muri ben’ ivyo umuntu azonshikanira jewe Uhoraho, ico kizoba icera.

A prophecy against the Desert by the Sea: Like whirlwinds sweeping through the southland, an invader comes from the desert, from a land of terror.	Imbūri yo ku bugaragwa buri ku kiyaga. Nk’ukw agashururu ko mu gihugu c’i bumanuko gasuriranya, ni ko biza bivuye mu bugaragwa, mu gihugu giteye ubgoba.

And I myself will be a wall of fire around it,’ declares the Lord , ‘and I will be its glory within.’	Kukw ari jewe nzohabera uruzitiro rw’umuriro ruhakikije, ni k’Uhoraho agize, kandi nzohabera ubgiza ndi hagati mu mugoma.
And he will send his angels and gather his elect from the four winds, from the ends of the earth to the ends of the heavens.	Ni ho azotuma abamarayika, akoranye abatoranijwe biwe, bave mu birēre bine, guhēra ku mpera y’isi kugeza impera y’ijuru.
He is to provide as a grain offering an ephah for each bull and an ephah for each ram, along with a hin of olive oil for each ephah.	Kand’ az’ ashikane ishikanwa ry’amafu, ku masa yose hajekw ingero imwe yitwa efa, no ku mpfizi y’intama hajeko efa imwe nyene; no kuri efa yose y’ifu hajekw ingero yitwa hini y’ amavuta.
The day after the Passover, that very day, they ate some of the produce of the land: unleavened bread and roasted grain.	Bukeye, umusi wa Pasika ushize, barya ivyeze mur’ ico gihugu, bacumba udutsima tutambiwe, barya n’ impeke zikaranze.
“Bring the best of the firstfruits of your soil to the house of the Lord your God. “Do not cook a young goat in its mother’s milk.”	Ivy’ intangamarāra vyo mu vy’ imishuzo yo mu mirima yanyu muze mwame mubizana mu ngoro yanje, jewe Uhoraho Imana yanyu. Ntimuze mutekeshe umwagazi w’ impene amata ya nyina.

The wicked draw the sword and bend the bow to bring down the poor and needy, to slay those whose ways are upright.	Abanyakibi basokōye inkota, bafoye imiheto, Kugira ngo batūre hasi umugorwa n’umukene, Bice abagenda batunganye.

The following came up from the towns of Tel Melah, Tel Harsha, Kerub, Addon and Immer, but they could not show that their families were descended from Israel:	Kand’ aba ni bo bādūze bava i Telimela n’i Teliharisha n’i Kerubu n’i Adoni n’i Imeri, ariko vyarabananira kwerekana amazu ya ba sekuruza bandurutseko cank’ abo bākomōtseko yukw ar’ Abisirayeli vy’ukuri.
He made ten tables and placed them in the temple, five on the south side and five on the north. He also made a hundred gold sprinkling bowls.	Abāza n’ameza cumi, ayatereka mu rusengero, atanu mu ruhande rw’i buryo, yandi atanu mu ruhande rw’i bumoso nyene. Acurisha n’amakarabo ijana mw izahabu.
Next to them, the men of Tekoa repaired another section, from the great projecting tower to the wall of Ophel.	Hakurikirakw abantu b’i Tekowa, basana ikindi gihimba kirābana n’ uwo munara munini wometseko nyene, bashitsa ku ruzitiro rw’i Ofeli.
When David came to Mahanaim, Shobi son of Nahash from Rabbah of the Ammonites, and Makir son of Ammiel from Lo Debar, and Barzillai the Gileadite from Rogelim	Nuko Dawidi ashitse i Mahanayimu, Shobi mwene Nahashi w’i Raba mu Bamoni, na Makiri mwene Amiyeli w’i Lo‐debari, na Baruzilayi Umunyagileyadi w’i Rogelimu,
therefore this is what the Sovereign Lord says: I will stretch out my hand against Edom and kill both man and beast. It has laid waste my vines and ruined my fig trees. It has stripped off their bark and thrown it away, leaving their branches white.	Bononye umuzabibu wanje, kand’ umusukoni wanje barawuvunnye, barawushishuye rwose, bawutsinda hasi; amashami yawo asigaye ar’ igihororo c’imitonore.

The hearts of the wise make their mouths prudent, and their lips promote instruction.	Umutima w’umunyabgenge wigisha akanwa kiwe, Ukungura ubgenge bg’iminwa yiwe.

For I will be like a lion to Ephraim, like a great lion to Judah. I will tear them to pieces and go away; I will carry them off, with no one to rescue them. The Lord spoke to Moses in the Desert of Sinai in the first month of the second year after they came out of Egypt. He said,	Mu kwezi kwa mbere, mu mwaka ugira kabiri bavuye mu gihugu ca Egiputa, Uhoraho abaririra Mose mu bugaragwa bg’i Sinayi,
From one man he made all the nations, that they should inhabit the whole earth; and he marked out their appointed times in history and the boundaries of their lands. Do not drag me away with the wicked, with those who do evil, who speak cordially with their neighbors but harbor malice in their hearts.	Ntunkwegane n’abanyakibi N’inkozi z’ibibi; Bavugana ivy’ amahoro na bagenzi babo, Ariko mu mitima yabo har’ imanga.

From the Levites: Shemaiah son of Hasshub, the son of Azrikam, the son of Hashabiah, the son of Bunni;	Mu Balewi n’aba: Shemaya mwene Hasubu, Hasubu wa Asirikamu, Asirikamu wa Hashabiya, Hashabiya wa Buni,
King Solomon gave twenty towns in Galilee to Hiram king of Tyre, because Hiram had supplied him with all the cedar and juniper and gold he wanted.	umwami Salomo aha Hiramu ibisagara mirongwibiri mu gihugu c’i Galilaya; kandi Hiramu uwo, umwami w’i Tiro, ni we yari yarahaye Salomo ibiti vy’amasederi n’ivy’ akajwari n’amazahabu, nk’uko yagomba kwose.
He was accompanied by Sopater son of Pyrrhus from Berea, Aristarchus and Secundus from Thessalonica, Gaius from Derbe, Timothy also, and Tychicus and Trophimus from the province of Asia.	Abājana na we bashikana no muri Asiya ni Sopatero mwene Puro w’i Beroya, n’ab’i Tesalonike ni Arisitariko na Sekondo, bo na Gayo w’i Derube, na Timoteyo, n’abo muri Asiya ni Tukiko na Tirofimo.
Acknowledge and take to heart this day that the Lord is God in heaven above and on the earth below. There is no other.	Nuk’ uyu musi mubimenye, mubishirekw imitima, yuk’ Uhoraho ari we Mana mw ijuru no mw isi, ata yindi.
As for the other events of Solomon’s reign—all he did and the wisdom he displayed—are they not written in the book of the annals of Solomon?	Ibindi vyose vyadonzwe kuri Salomo, n’ivyo yakoze vyose, n’ ivy’ ubgenge bgiwe, mbega ntivyanditswe mu Gitabo c’Ivyakozwe na Salomo nyene?
and Bela son of Azaz, the son of Shema, the son of Joel. They settled in the area from Aroer to Nebo and Baal Meon.	na Bela mwene Azazi, Azazi wa Shema, Shema wa Yoweli; abo aho bāba, bāhēra i Aroweri ukarinda ushitsa i Nebo n’i Bayali‐meyoni;
That each of them may eat and drink, and find satisfaction in all their toil—this is the gift of God.	kand’ ikindi, yuk’ ubuntu bg’Imana ar’ uk’ umuntu wese yorya, akanywa, akanezererwa ivyiza mu butame bgiwe bgose.
David took his men with him and went out and killed two hundred Philistines and brought back their foreskins. They counted out the full number to the king so that David might become the king’s son-in-law. Then Saul gave him his daughter Michal in marriage.	Igihe gishinzwe kitaragera, Dawidi ahagurukana n’ingabo ziwe, yica mu Bafilisitiya abagabo amajana abiri; nuko Dawidi atabarukana ubugabo bgabo, babushikiriza umwami ukw igitigiri cabgo kingana, kugira ngo Dawidi abone kuba umukwe w’umwami. Nuko Sauli amushingira umukobga wiwe Mikali.
because a great door for effective work has opened to me, and there are many who oppose me.	kuko nugururiwe urugi runini ruja mu bikorwa bikomeye, kand’ abarwanizi bakaba benshi.

We have this hope as an anchor for the soul, firm and secure. It enters the inner sanctuary behind the curtain,	Ivyo vyizigiro tubifise nk’ikizirika umutima kigumye, gikomeye, cinjira hirya y’igihūzu gikīngiriye ahēra cane,
In the course of time, at the end of the second year, his bowels came out because of the disease, and he died in great pain. His people made no funeral fire in his honor, as they had for his predecessors.	Maz’ igihe kiragera, imyaka ibiri ihise, indwara yiwe ituma amara avyagira, amuva mu nda, apfa yībōnye. Arikw abantu biwe ntibamwosereza imibavu nk’ uko bābigenza kuri ba sekuruza.
The foundations were laid with large stones of good quality, some measuring ten cubits and some eight.	Ay’ amatanguriro na yo nyene yar’ ay’ igiciro kinini, kandi yar’ amabuye manini‐manini, amwe yar’ ay’ amatambge cumi y’ukuboko uciriye mu nkokora, ayandi yar’ ay’ amatambge munani.
Absalom ordered his men, “Listen! When Amnon is in high spirits from drinking wine and I say to you, ‘Strike Amnon down,’ then kill him. Don’t be afraid. Haven’t I given you this order? Nuko mugumye imitima, mube abahizi.

Just as Jesus was coming up out of the water, he saw heaven being torn open and the Spirit descending on him like a dove.	Avuye mu mazi, aca abona ijuru ritandukanye, Mpwemu aramanuka amugwako, asa n’inuma.

Therefore anyone who sets aside one of the least of these commands and teaches others accordingly will be called least in the kingdom of heaven, but whoever practices and teaches these commands will be called great in the kingdom of heaven. “Judah’s sin is engraved with an iron tool, inscribed with a flint point, on the tablets of their hearts and on the horns of their altars. The beast was given a mouth to utter proud words and blasphemies and to exercise its authority for forty-two months.	Gihabga akanwa kavuga ibihambaye n’ivyo kurogota: gihabga n’ubushobozi bgo gushishikara amezi mirongwine n’abiri.
Once a year Aaron shall make atonement on its horns. This annual atonement must be made with the blood of the atoning sin offering for the generations to come. It is most holy to the Lord .”	Aroni az’ ahongere ico gicaniro rimwe gusa mu mwaka; amaraso y’ikimazi c’impongano gitangirwa ivyaha az’ ayakoze ku mahembe yaco, abe ari yo akibera impongano rimwe gusa mu mwaka, ukw ibihe vy’urunganwe rwanyu bizogenda bikurikirana: ico gicaniro kizoba icera cane, cerejwe jewe Uhoraho.
But if anyone schemes and kills someone deliberately, that person is to be taken from my altar and put to death.	Arik’ umuntu ni yatera mugenzi we ibigirankana, ngw amwice mu bugunge, muze mumukūre ku gicaniro canje, kugira ngo yicwe.

“My children, I will be with you only a little longer. You will look for me, and just as I told the Jews, so I tell you now: Where I am going, you cannot come. I do not write to you because you do not know the truth, but because you do know it and because no lie comes from the truth.	Sindabandikiye kuko mutazi ukuri, ariko n’uko mukuzi, kandi kukw ata binyoma biva mu kuri.

the red kite, the black kite, any kind of falcon,	n’ikinyamwotsi n’inkōna n’ikinyamwanira, ukw amoko yavyo ari;

So they asked him, “What sign then will you give that we may see it and believe you? What will you do?	Nuko baramubaza, bati Non’ ukora ikimenyetso ki, ngo tukirābe tukwizere? Ukora ikimeze gite?
To answer before listening— that is folly and shame.	Ūwishura atarumva Bimubera ubupfu n’agatētereza.
They made a grating for the altar, a bronze network, to be under its ledge, halfway up the altar.	Ico gicaniro agicurira ikintu c’insobane kimeze bga rusenga, agicuze mu miringa, agishira musi y’ igikugīrwa gikīkūje ico gicaniro, gihēra hasi, kigarukira ahacāgatije ico gicaniro nyene.
If anyone turns a deaf ear to my instruction, even their prayers are detestable.	Uwica ugutwi ngo ntiyumve ivyagezwe, N’ugusenga kwiwe na kwo kuba igisesema.

“You saw the suffering of our ancestors in Egypt; you heard their cry at the Red Sea.	Wabonye ivyago vya ba sogokuruza bacu bari muri Egiputa, wumva ugutakamba kwabo bari ku Kiyaga Gitukura,
and do not ever cut off your kindness from my family—not even when the Lord has cut off every one of David’s enemies from the face of the earth.”	na ho ni napfa, na ho nyene ntuz’ ukūre imbabazi zawe ku nzu yanje gushitsa ibihe vyose, eka mbere gushitsa ah’ Uhoraho azoba ahejeje kurandura abansi bawe bose kw isi.

At sunset, the people brought to Jesus all who had various kinds of sickness, and laying his hands on each one, he healed them.	Kandi ku kirengazuba, abari bafise abarwaye bose barwaye indwara zitari zimwe barabamuzanira. Abarambikakw ibiganza umwe‐umwe, arabakiza.
That evening quail came and covered the camp, and in the morning there was a layer of dew around the camp.	Nuko ku mugoroba inkware ziraza, zigwa aho bashagaje, zirahazimya; mu gitondo buca ikime gitonze impande zaho zose.
What if he did this to make the riches of his glory known to the objects of his mercy, whom he prepared in advance for glory—	kugira ngo yerekanire ubutunzi bg’ubgiza bgayo ku nzavya z’ikigongwe, izo yiteguriye guha ubgiza kera,
When they got up early in the morning, the sun was shining on the water. To the Moabites across the way, the water looked red—like blood.	Maz’ abo Banyamowabu bazindutse kare mu gatondo, izuba riserutse, rirasiye ku mazi, babona ayo mazi ahahanganye na bo atukura nk’amaraso.
If a prophet or a priest or anyone else claims, ‘This is a message from the Lord ,’ I will punish them and their household.	Kandi kamenyi cank’ umuherezi cank’ uwo mu bantu ni hagira ūpfa kuvuga ivy’ imbūri yanje jewe Uhoraho, uwo muntu nzomuhana, bo n’abo mu nzu yiwe.
Yet you have a few people in Sardis who have not soiled their clothes. They will walk with me, dressed in white, for they are worthy.	Arik’ ufise amazina makeya y’ab’ i Sarudi batanduje impuzu zabo; ni bo bazogendana nanje bambaye impuzu zera, kuko bibabereye.
When Solomon had finished building the temple of the Lord and the royal palace, and had achieved all he had desired to do,	Maze Salomo arangije kwubaka ingoro y’Uhoraho n’ingoro y’ubgami n’ivyo yagomvye gukora vyose,
It is unthinkable that God would do wrong, that the Almighty would pervert justice.	Eka n’ivy’ ukuri, Imana nta ho yokora icaha, Īshobora vyose nta ho yogoreka imanza.
I will make your forehead like the hardest stone, harder than flint. Do not be afraid of them or terrified by them, though they are a rebellious people.”	Uruhanga rwawe ndaruhaye gukomera nk’intosho rurushe isare: ntuz’ ubatinye canke ng’ urandurwe umutima n’igitsure cabo, nah’ ar’ inzu y’abagarariji.
So the man gave them his attention, expecting to get something from them.	Abashirak’ umutima agira ngo har’ ico bamuha.
He has performed mighty deeds with his arm; he has scattered those who are proud in their inmost thoughts.	Yerekanishije ubushobozi ukuboko kwayo, Yasābagije abībona mu vyo biyumvira mu mitima yabo.
Then you will delight in the sacrifices of the righteous, in burnt offerings offered whole; then bulls will be offered on your altar.	Ni ho uzonezerwa n’ibimazi bitunganye, ni vyo bimazi vyoshejwe, n’ibimazi vyoshejwe bidasonōye; Ni ho bazoshikanira amamasa ku gicaniro cawe.
At the end of every three years, bring all the tithes of that year’s produce and store it in your towns,	Ku mpera y’umwaka wose ugira gatatu muze mwame mukūra ikigiracumi ku vyo mwejeje vyose mur’ uwo mwaka, mubikoranirize i wanyu,
Gaza will be abandoned and Ashkelon left in ruins. At midday Ashdod will be emptied and Ekron uprooted.	Gaza hazohebga, Ashikeloni hahinduke imisaka: abo muri Ashidodi bazokwirukanwa ku murango w’amashōka, na Ekuroni hazorandurwa.
Accept the one whose faith is weak, without quarreling over disputable matters.	Ūdakomeye mu vyizerwa, mumwemere, ariko s’ukumuhāririza ku vy’ akekeranya.
Have mercy on me, O God, according to your unfailing love; according to your great compassion blot out my transgressions.	Ngirira ikigongwe Mana, kubg’ imbabazi zawe: Kubg’ isinzi ry’imbabazi zawe usibanganye ibicumuro vyanje.
But if serving the Lord seems undesirable to you, then choose for yourselves this day whom you will serve, whether the gods your ancestors served beyond the Euphrates, or the gods of the Amorites, in whose land you are living. But as for me and my household, we will serve the Lord .”	Kandi namba mubona bibabangamiye gusaba Uhoraho, uyu musi ni mwitoranirize uwo muzosaba, namb’ ari za mana ba sogokuruza bāsaba hakurya ya rwa ruzi, cank’ imana z’Abamori ben’ iki gihugu murimwo; ariko jeho n’abo mu rugo rwanje tuzokwama tugendanira Uhoraho.
Jesus did many other things as well. If every one of them were written down, I suppose that even the whole world would not have room for the books that would be written. He made a colonnade fifty cubits long and thirty wide. In front of it was a portico, and in front of that were pillars and an overhanging roof. Then Haman said to King Xerxes, “There is a certain people dispersed among the peoples in all the provinces of your kingdom who keep themselves separate. Their customs are different from those of all other people, and they do not obey the king’s laws; it is not in the king’s best interest to tolerate them.	Nuko Hamani abarira umwami Ahasuwerusi, ati Harih’ ubgoko busābagiye, bukwiragiye mu mahanga yo mu bihugu vyawe vyose; kand’ ivyagezwe vyabo nta ho bihūriye n’ivy’ ayandi mahanga yose, kandi ntibitondera ivyagezwe vyawe, mwami: ni co gituma, mwami, bitabereye gupfa kubarekera ngaho.

from Simeon, warriors ready for battle—7,100;	Abo mu Basimeyoni, abantu b’abahizi b’abanyentambara, bār’ ibihumbi ndwi n’ijana.

So even if I boast somewhat freely about the authority the Lord gave us for building you up rather than tearing you down, I will not be ashamed of it.	Kuk’ ububasha bgacu Umwami wacu yaduhaye kugira ngo tububake, ntitubasambure, naho norushiriza kubgirata, sinzomāramāzwa;
Some pour out gold from their bags and weigh out silver on the scales; they hire a goldsmith to make it into a god, and they bow down and worship it.	Basukanura izahabu mu mupfuko, bagera ifeza ku munzane, bagaha umucuzi w’izahabu ingero, akabicuramw’ imana; bakayīkubita imbere bakayisenga.
All the stars in the sky will be dissolved and the heavens rolled up like a scroll; all the starry host will fall like withered leaves from the vine, like shriveled figs from the fig tree.	Ingabo z’inyenyeri zo kw ijuru zose zizokamangana, kand’ amajuru azozingirwa hamwe nk’umuzingo w’igitabo, n’izo ngabo zayo zose zizokabirana, nk’ukw akaragarira kava ku muzabibu, kandi nk’ ukw akaragarira kava ku musukoni.
So, if you think you are standing firm, be careful that you don’t fall!	Nuko rer’ uwiyumvira kw ahagaze ni yiyubare ntagwe.
And he said to me, “This is the curse that is going out over the whole land; for according to what it says on one side, every thief will be banished, and according to what it says on the other, everyone who swears falsely will be banished. Year after year, everyone who came brought a gift—articles of silver and gold, and robes, weapons and spices, and horses and mules. Therefore, my brothers and sisters, make every effort to confirm your calling and election. For if you do these things, you will never stumble,	Ni co gituma, bene Data, mukwiye kurushiriza kugira umwete wo gukomeza ihamagarwa ryanyu, bo n’ugutoranywa. Ni mwakora ivyo, ntimuzotsitara na gatoya.

So then, don’t be afraid. I will provide for you and your children.” And he reassured them and spoke kindly to them.	None rero mureke gutinya: nzobaha ivyo kubatunga, mwe n’abana banyu. Nukw arabaremēsha, ababarira neza.

And I will provide a place for my people Israel and will plant them so that they can have a home of their own and no longer be disturbed. Wicked people will not oppress them anymore, as they did at the beginning	Uti Kand’ abantu biwe b’Abisirayeli azobagenera ahantu, ahababadike, bahībēre ar’ ahabo bgite, batazohimuka ukundi; uti Kand’ abantu b’ibirara ntibazosubira kubakubagura nk’ubga mbere,

and poverty will come on you like a thief and scarcity like an armed man.	Uko ni k’ubgoro bgawe buzogushikako nk’umwambuzi, N’ikigoyi kizogushikako nk’ umuntu w’umurwanyi.

The increase from the land is taken by all; the king himself profits from the fields.	Ikigirira ikimazi igihugu muri vyose, n’umwami kwubahwa mu gihugu.
The Lord will march out like a champion, like a warrior he will stir up his zeal; with a shout he will raise the battle cry and will triumph over his enemies.	Uhoraho azoja gutera nk’umuhizi, arwanane ishaka nk’intōre mu ntambara: azobīrahira, mber’ azobīvuga n’ijwi rirenga; abansi biwe azobagirira ibikomeye.
He spoke these words while teaching in the temple courts near the place where the offerings were put. Yet no one seized him, because his hour had not yet come.	Ayo majambo yayavugiye mw iyakīriro ry’amashikanwa, arikw arigisha mu rusengero; kandi nta n’umwe yamufashe, kukw igihe ciwe kitaribgashike.
When Pilate saw that he was getting nowhere, but that instead an uproar was starting, he took water and washed his hands in front of the crowd. “I am innocent of this man’s blood,” he said. “It is your responsibility!”	Maze Pilato abonye kw arushwa n’ubusa, ariko ko barushirije kuvyura umugūmūko, yābīra amazi akarabira imbere y’ishengero, ati Jeho ndacuna kubg’ amaraso y’uyu mugororotsi: n’ivyanyu.
And I declared that the dead, who had already died, are happier than the living, who are still alive.	Ni co catumye nshima abahisi bamaze gupfa kurusha abariho bakibona;
so that you may eat and drink at my table in my kingdom and sit on thrones, judging the twelve tribes of Israel.	ngo muze murīre, munywere ku meza yanje mu bgami bganje: kandi muzokwicara ku ntebe z’icubahiro, mucire imanza imiryango y’Abisirayeli, ukw ar’icumi n’ibiri.
The shepherds are senseless and do not inquire of the Lord ; so they do not prosper and all their flock is scattered.	Kukw abungere bācitse ibiyingiyingi, ntibagīsha Uhoraho inama: ni co cababujije kumererwa neza, kand’ imikuku yabo yose yarasābagiye.
“Why go to him today?” he asked. “It’s not the New Moon or the Sabbath.” “That’s all right,” she said.	Aramwishura, ati N’iki kikujanyey’ uyu musi? Kw atari mu mboneko z’ukwezi canke ngo habe kw isabato! Na we ati Pfa kundeka ngende.

but the seventh day is a sabbath to the Lord your God. A prayer of Habakkuk the prophet. On shigionoth .	Isengesho ry’uwavugishwa n’ Imana Habakuki, ryaririmbishwa mw ijwi ryitwa Shigiyonoti.
Your eyes will see the king in his beauty and view a land that stretches afar.	Amaso yawe azokwitegereza umwami afise ubgiza bgiwe: azorāba igihugu kigera kure.
He will roll you up tightly like a ball and throw you into a large country. There you will die and there the chariots you were so proud of will become a disgrace to your master’s house.	Uti N’ukuri azokugira itu, akuraririze nk’ umupira, ugwe mu gihugu cāgutse; ut’ Aho ni ho uzogwa, kandi ni ho imikogote yawe y’icubahiro izogangarara, wa gatētereza k’inzu ya shobuja.
Lord , the God of our fathers Abraham, Isaac and Israel, keep these desires and thoughts in the hearts of your people forever, and keep their hearts loyal to you.	Ewe Uhoraho, Mana ya ba sogokuruza bacu Aburahamu na Isaka na Isirayeli, uze wame ukomeza mu mitima y’abantu bawe iyo migabo n’ivyo vyiyumviro, kandi wame werekeje imitima yabo kuri wewe.
So give their children over to famine; hand them over to the power of the sword. Let their wives be made childless and widows; let their men be put to death, their young men slain by the sword in battle.	Kubg’ ivyo tanga abana babo ubahe inzara, ubagaburire ubugi bg’inkota; abagore babo ni babure abana babo, bateko bapfakare; abagabo babo ni bicwe n’urupfu, imisore yabo ni yicwe n’inkota yo mu ntambara.
He was faithful to the one who appointed him, just as Moses was faithful in all God’s house.	ayobokera iyamutoranije, nk’uko Mose yayoboka mu rugo rwayo hose.

Adam made love to his wife again, and she gave birth to a son and named him Seth, saying, “God has granted me another child in place of Abel, since Cain killed him.”	Adamu yongera kubana n’ umugore wiwe, avyara umuhungu, amwita Seti, ati Kukw Imana inshumbushije urundi ruvyaro mu gishingo ca Abeli, kuko Kayini yamwishe.

Wisdom is a shelter as money is a shelter, but the advantage of knowledge is this: Wisdom preserves those who have it.	Kuk’ ubgenge ar’ ubgugamo, nk’ukw amahera ar’ ubgugamo; arikw inyungu iva mu kumenya n’iyi: n’uk’ ubgenge buzigama ubugingo bga nyenebgo.

Abram traveled through the land as far as the site of the great tree of Moreh at Shechem. At that time the Canaanites were in the land.	Aburamu adwēbēra ico gihugu, ashika ahantu hitwa i Shekemu, ku giti c’umweloni ca More. Ico gihe Abanyakanani ni bo bāba mur’ ico gihugu.
You will pursue your enemies, and they will fall by the sword before you.	Muzokinagiza abansi banyu, bahindikiranywe n’inkota imbere yanyu.
Therefore do not be foolish, but understand what the Lord’s will is.	Nuko ntimube ibipfu, ariko mutahure ivy’ Umwami wacu agomba ivy’ari vyo.

Now if you obey me fully and keep my covenant, then out of all nations you will be my treasured possession. Although the whole earth is mine,	Uti None rero, ni mwamwumvira vy’ ukuri, mukitondera isezerano ryiwe, muzomubera inyegu yiharije, yitoranirije mu mahanga yose: uti Kukw isi yose ar’ iyiwe;

These are the kings of the land whom the Israelites had defeated and whose territory they took over east of the Jordan, from the Arnon Gorge to Mount Hermon, including all the eastern side of the Arabah:	Aba ni bo bami b’ibihugu Abisirayeli bānesheje, bakegukira ibihugu vyabo, hakurya ya Yorodani ahahera i burasirazuba, uhereye ku mwonga wo kuri Arunoni ugashitsa ku musozi Herumoni n’ikiyaya cose citwa Araba ahahera i burasirazuba:

The men of Israel took captive from their fellow Israelites who were from Judah two hundred thousand wives, sons and daughters. For a prostitute can be had for a loaf of bread, but another man’s wife preys on your very life.	Kuko kubga maraya umuntu afūtāna gushitsa asigaye ku kamanyu k’agatsima: Kand’ umusambanyikazi ahīga ubugingo bg’igiciro.

Then Moses led the people out of the camp to meet with God, and they stood at the foot of the mountain.	Maze Mose akūra abantu aho bashagaje ngo baze gusanganira Imana; bahagarara musi y’uwo musozi.

Do not let her be like a stillborn infant coming from its mother’s womb with its flesh half eaten away.”	Ndakwinginze, yoye kumera nk’ikivutse gihwereye, kivuye mu nda ya nyina kiriko kirabora.
This is what the Lord says: “Heaven is my throne, and the earth is my footstool. Where is the house you will build for me? Where will my resting place be?	Uku ni k’Uhoraho agize, at’ Ijuru ni ryo ntebe yanje y’ubgami, isi na yo n’indava y’ ibirenge vyanje: muzonyubakira inzu ki, kandi n’ahantu ki hombera uburuhukiro?
Then they will follow my decrees and be careful to keep my laws. They will be my people, and I will be their God.	ngo babone kugendera mu vyagezwe vyanje, no kwitondera amabgirizwa yanje ngo babishitse: maze bazoba ihanga ryanje, nanje nzoba Imana yabo.
May those who curse days curse that day, those who are ready to rouse Leviathan.	Abazi kuvuma imisi ni barivume, Ni bo bar’ uburyo bgo kuvyutsa Lewiyatani.
The eastern boundary is the Dead Sea as far as the mouth of the Jordan. The northern boundary started from the bay of the sea at the mouth of the Jordan,	Urubibe rw’i burasirazuba rwar’ Ikiyaga c’Umunyu gushitsa aho Yorodani rushikira muri co. Urubibe rw’i burārūko rwāhēra ah’ ico kiyaga gitaye ikirimi, hamwe nyene Yorodani rushikira muri co;
Esau took his wives from the women of Canaan: Adah daughter of Elon the Hittite, and Oholibamah daughter of Anah and granddaughter of Zibeon the Hivite—	Esau yarongoye Abanyakananikazi, Ada umukobga wa Eloni Umuheti, na Oholibama umukobga wa Ana, Ana mwene Sibeyoni Umuhiwi;
My beloved has gone down to his garden, to the beds of spices, to browse in the gardens and to gather lilies.	Umukunzi wanje yamanutse aja mu murima wiwe, mu turima tw’imbazi, Kuragira mu matongo, no guca ibirungu.
“This is what the Lord Almighty says: ‘If you will walk in obedience to me and keep my requirements, then you will govern my house and have charge of my courts, and I will give you a place among these standing here.	at’ Uku ni k’Uhoraho Nyen’ ingabo agize, ati Ni wagendera mu nzira zanje, ukitondera ivyo nakujeje, nawe uzogaba ivyo mu ngoro yanje, urinde n’urugo rwanje, kandi nzoguha ubgishikira hagati mur’ aba bahagaze hano.
“Here now is the man who did not make God his stronghold but trusted in his great wealth and grew strong by destroying others!”	Bati Rāba, uyu ni we atāhinduye Imana igihome kimukīngira, Ariko yizigira ibihinda vy’ ivyo atunze, Akiha inkomezi mu bubi bgiwe.
Ascribe to the Lord , all you families of nations, ascribe to the Lord glory and strength.	Yemwe miryango y’amahanga, mwaturire Uhoraho, Mwaturire Uhoraho ingen’ afise icubahiro n’inkomezi.
The one who sent me is with me; he has not left me alone, for I always do what pleases him.”	Kand’ uwantumye turi kumwe na we, ntiyansize jenyene, kuko jewe na ntaryo nama nkora ibimuhimbara.
And when the men of that place recognized Jesus, they sent word to all the surrounding country. People brought all their sick to him	Abantu b’aho hantu baramumenya, batumatumanako mur’ ico gihugu cose, bamuzanira abarwaye bose,
For truly I tell you, until heaven and earth disappear, not the smallest letter, not the least stroke of a pen, will by any means disappear from the Law until everything is accomplished.	Ndababgire ukuri, Gushitsa ah’ ijuru n’isi bizoviraho, nta kanyuguti na kamwe canke n’akazatsa bizova ku vyagezwe, gushitsa aho vyose bizoheraherezwa.
And he took bread, gave thanks and broke it, and gave it to them, saying, “This is my body given for you; do this in remembrance of me.”	Yābīra umutsima, awushimira Imana, arawumanyagura, arawubaha, arababgira, at’ Uyu n’umubiri wanje ubatangiwe: murakore murtya kugira ngo kibe icibutso canje.
Esau said, “Isn’t he rightly named Jacob ? This is the second time he has taken advantage of me: He took my birthright, and now he’s taken my blessing!” Then he asked, “Haven’t you reserved any blessing for me?”	Aramwishura, ati Yakobo ni Yakobo koko; izina ni ryo muntu! Yambereye intōnyōtsi kabiri kose: yannyaze kuba samuragwa, non’ asubiriye n’umuhezagiro wanje! Arongera aramubaza, ati Nta muhezagiro wansigarije na mba?
Fishermen will stand along the shore; from En Gedi to En Eglaim there will be places for spreading nets. The fish will be of many kinds—like the fish of the Mediterranean Sea.	Kand’ abarovyi bazohagarara ku nkombe zaco; uhereye kuri Eni‐gedi ugashitsa kuri Enegulayimu hazoba aho gutera insenga; hazobamw’ amafi y’uburyo bginshi, nk’amafi yo mu kiyaga kinini, kand’ azoba ari menshi cane.
“Be strong and very courageous. Be careful to obey all the law my servant Moses gave you; do not turn from it to the right or to the left, that you may be successful wherever you go.	Mugabo shikama, ushire amanga cane, kugira ngo witondere ivy’ ivyagezwe vyose bivuga, ubishitse, ivyo Mose umusavyi wanje yakugeze; ntuz’ utambamire i buryo cank’ i bumoso, kugira ng’ ugire ukuboko kwiza ah’ uja hose.
Include one male goat as a sin offering, in addition to the regular burnt offering with its grain offering and drink offering.	Mutange n’impfizi y’impene imwe kw ikimazi gitangirwa ivyaha; muze muvyongere kuri ca kimazi co kwoswa c’intasība, no kw ishikanwa ry’ifu n’iry’ ibiturire, uko bigendana na co.
The king said to him, “How many times must I make you swear to tell me nothing but the truth in the name of the Lord ?”	Umwami aramubarira, at’ Aho nakurahirije nzogeza ryari, kugira ngo ntugire ico umbarira kitar’ ic’ ukuri mw izina ry’ Uhoraho?
Then the Lord said to Abraham, “Why did Sarah laugh and say, ‘Will I really have a child, now that I am old?’	Uhoraho abaza Aburahamu, ati N’iki gitumye Sara atwenga, akavuga ngw Aho n’ivy’ ukuri, noba nkivyara umwana nkecuye?
“When you fast, do not look somber as the hypocrites do, for they disfigure their faces to show others they are fasting. Truly I tell you, they have received their reward in full.	Kand’ iyo mwisonzesha, ntimwijirwe nk’uko za ndyarya zigira. Kuko bīyoberanya mu maso ngo babonwe n’abantu ko bisonzesheje. Ndababgire ukuri: Baramaze guhabga impēra zabo.
Yet it was good of you to share in my troubles.	Ariko mwagize neza, kuko mwafatanije nanje amarushwa.
I am like a moth to Ephraim, like rot to the people of Judah.	Ni co gituma mmereye Efurayimu nk’ inyenzi ku mpuzu, n’inzu ya Yuda nk’ibungwe.
Araunah said to David, “Let my lord the king take whatever he wishes and offer it up. Here are oxen for the burnt offering, and here are threshing sledges and ox yokes for the wood. in Ziklag, in Mekonah and its settlements,	bāba n’i Sikulagi, n’i Mekona no mu bisagara bihakūkira,
The officials who murdered him were Jozabad son of Shimeath and Jehozabad son of Shomer. He died and was buried with his ancestors in the City of David. And Amaziah his son succeeded him as king.	Abo banyarugo biwe bāmwishe ni Yozakari umwana wa Shimeyati na Yehozabadi umwana wa Shomeri; nukw arapfa, bamuhamba hamwe na ba sekuruza ku murwa wa Dawidi; maz’ umuhungu wiwe Amaziya asubira ku ngoma yiwe.
They will stumble repeatedly; they will fall over each other. They will say, ‘Get up, let us go back to our own people and our native lands, away from the sword of the oppressor.’	Yatumye benshi batsitara, mbere bātsitaranyeko: bati Ngo tuvyuke twisubirire mu b’i wacu, no mu gihugu twavukiyemwo, duhunge inkota iririka.
They made their hearts as hard as flint and would not listen to the law or to the words that the Lord Almighty had sent by his Spirit through the earlier prophets. So the Lord Almighty was very angry.	Mbere bīkomantaje imitima imera nk’isare, ngo boye kwumva ivyagezwe n’amajambo Uhoraho Nyen’ ingabo yarungitse muri Mpwemu wiwe, ayavugira mu bavugishwa na we ba kera; ni co catumye uburake buhambaye buva k’Uhoraho Nyen’ ingabo.
Now the Pharisees who had been sent	Kand’ abo bātumwe bār’ Abafarisayo;
because our gospel came to you not simply with words but also with power, with the Holy Spirit and deep conviction. For the Lord Almighty has purposed, and who can thwart him? His hand is stretched out, and who can turn it back?	Uhoraho Nyen’ ingabo kw ari we yabigabiye, ni nde yobihindura? Kand’ ukuboko kwiwe ko kubānguye, ni nde yogupfunya?
As the flame blazed up from the altar toward heaven, the angel of the Lord ascended in the flame. You have seen many things, but you pay no attention; your ears are open, but you do not listen.”	Abona vyinshi yamara ntiyitegereza; amatwi yiwe arazibūtse, yamara ntiyumva.
I am torn between the two: I desire to depart and be with Christ, which is better by far;	Ndazazaniwe mur’ ivyo bibiri, kuko nifuza gutaha ngo mbane na Kristo, kukw ari co kirushirije cane:
All who sin apart from the law will also perish apart from the law, and all who sin under the law will be judged by the law.	Abākoze ivyaha bose, batazi ivyagezwe, bazohona ivyagezwe bitarinze kwiyumvirwa; kand’ abākoze ivyaha bose bazi ivyagezwe bazotsindishwa n’ivyagezwe:
Peter, an apostle of Jesus Christ, To God’s elect, exiles scattered throughout the provinces of Pontus, Galatia, Cappadocia, Asia and Bithynia,	Petero, intumwa ya Yesu Kristo, ndabandikiye abātoranijwe b’inyambukīra zo mu bāsanzariye i Ponto n’i Galatiya n’i Kapadokiya no muri Asiya n’i Bituniya,
Humtah, Kiriath Arba (that is, Hebron) and Zior—nine towns and their villages.	na Humata na Kiriyati‐Araba (ari ho Heburoni) na Siyori; vyar’ ibisagara cenda bifise imihana ibikūkira.
Now they grope through the streets as if they were blind. They are so defiled with blood that no one dares to touch their garments.	Badandabagirana mu nzira zaho nk’impumyi, bihumanishije amaraso, Bituma abantu batagishobora gukora ku myambaro yabo.
keep your tongue from evil and your lips from telling lies.	Uz’ ubuze ururimi rwawe, rwoye kuvuga ikibi, N’iminwa yawe yoye kuvuga ivy’ uguhendana.
I will make the land a desolate waste, and her proud strength will come to an end, and the mountains of Israel will become desolate so that no one will cross them. But the Lord your God will deliver them over to you, throwing them into great confusion until they are destroyed.	Arik’ Uhoraho Imana yanyu izobagabura mu maboko yanyu, ibace igikuba gihambaye, gushitsa batikiye.
Now if there is no resurrection, what will those do who are baptized for the dead? If the dead are not raised at all, why are people baptized for them?	Cank’ ababatizwa mu gishingo c’abapfuye bazobamarira iki? Asangw’ abapfuye batazurwa na mba, n’iki gituma bababatirizwa?
So he took another road and did not return by the way he had come to Bethel.	Nukw aragenda, ajana iyindi nzira, ntiyasubira mu nzira yazananye aza i Beteli.

Babylon’s warriors have stopped fighting; they remain in their strongholds. Their strength is exhausted; they have become weaklings. Her dwellings are set on fire; the bars of her gates are broken. But I warned them and said, “Why do you spend the night by the wall? If you do this again, I will arrest you.” From that time on they no longer came on the Sabbath. He is able to deal gently with those who are ignorant and are going astray, since he himself is subject to weakness.	kand’ ashobora kwihanganira inyoberwa n’abazimiye, kuko na we nyene har’ ah’ agira intege nke.

for the Lord will be at your side and will keep your foot from being snared.	Kuk’ Uhoraho azokubera ivyizigiro, Kand’ azorinda ikirenge cawe ngo ntigifatwe.
For Macedonia and Achaia were pleased to make a contribution for the poor among the Lord’s people in Jerusalem.	Kukw ab’i Makedoniya no muri Akaya bahimbawe no gusorōranya ivyo gutabara aboro bo mu bera b’i Yerusalemu.
He has made everything beautiful in its time. He has also set eternity in the human heart; yet no one can fathom what God has done from beginning to end. “Cursed is anyone who sleeps with his father’s wife, for he dishonors his father’s bed.” Then all the people shall say, “Amen!”	Abalewi bat’ Azoba avumwe, ūryamana na muka se, kukw aba yorosoye impuzu ya se. Abantu bose bitabirize, bati Amen.
They have sunk deep into corruption, as in the days of Gibeah. God will remember their wickedness and punish them for their sins.	Bīhumanije birengereje: izokwibuka ibigabitanyo vyabo, izobahanira ivyaha vyabo, nk’uko vyabaye mu gihe c’i Gibeya.
For if any Macedonians come with me and find you unprepared, we—not to say anything about you—would be ashamed of having been so confident.	twebge (sinovuga mwebge) ntituze tumāramāzwe n’ivyo twari twizigiye, namb’ Abanyamakedoniya bamwe bazozanana nanje bagasanga mutiteguye.
It is like a bridegroom coming out of his chamber, like a champion rejoicing to run his course.	Rimeze nk’umukwe asohoka ava mu nzu i we, Rinezerwa nk’umunyenkomezi ryiruka mu nzira yaryo.
But as for you, your bodies will fall in this wilderness.	Ut’ Ariko mweho, imivyimba yanyu izogenda ihindikirana mur’ ubu bugaragwa.

But Naomi said, “Return home, my daughters. Why would you come with me? Am I going to have any more sons, who could become your husbands?	Nawomi arabishura, ati Bakobga banje, ni mwisubirire inyuma: n’iki gitumye mugomba kujana nanje? Har’ abandi bana ngifise mu nda, ngo baze babe abagabo banyu?

“No one sews a patch of unshrunk cloth on an old garment. Otherwise, the new piece will pull away from the old, making the tear worse.	Nta wobarīra ikiremo c’igitambara gisha ku mpuzu y’umushire; kukw ico kiremo coyitabura, igisha kikavana n’umushire, ikarushiriza gutabuka.

who delight in doing wrong and rejoice in the perverseness of evil,	Banezererwa gukora ikibi, Bahimbarwa n’ibidadi vy’ikibi;

You will come from your place in the far north, you and many nations with you, all of them riding on horses, a great horde, a mighty army.	Ico gihe uzoza uvuye i wawe ahahera i burārūko, mwe n’amahanga menshi muzananye, bose bagendera ku mafarasi, ar’ igitero kinini n’ingabo nyinshi;

Who can withstand his indignation? Who can endure his fierce anger? His wrath is poured out like fire; the rocks are shattered before him.	Ni nde yoshobora guhagarara imbere y’ ubushangashirwe bgiwe? As I looked at the living creatures, I saw a wheel on the ground beside each creature with its four faces.	Nuko ncitegereza ivyo binyabugingo, mbona amakurudumu ahagaze hasi, imwe‐imwe i ruhande y’ivyo binyabugingo, imbere mu maso yavyo ukw ari bine.
Not a blacksmith could be found in the whole land of Israel, because the Philistines had said, “Otherwise the Hebrews will make swords or spears!”	Ico gihe nta mucuzi yar’ akiboneka mu gihugu cose c’Abisirayeli; kukw Abafilisitiya bari bavuze, bati Hinge tubuze Abaheburayo kwicurishiriza inkota n’ amacumu.
One Sabbath Jesus was going through the grainfields, and as his disciples walked along, they began to pick some heads of grain.	Kandi kw isabato, agenda aca mu mirima y’ingano; abigishwa biwe bakigenda batangura kumyōza ingano.

“The Lord lives! Praise be to my Rock! Exalted be my God, the Rock, my Savior!	Uhoraho yamaho; Igitandara canje gihimbazwe; Imana, Igitandara c’agakiza kanje, ishirwe hejuru:
Their land is full of silver and gold; there is no end to their treasures. Their land is full of horses; there is no end to their chariots.	Igihugu cabo na co cuzuye ifeza n’izahabu, kand’ ubutunzi bgabo n’isinzi; igihugu cabo cuzuye n’amafarasi, imikogote yabo n’ibitayega.
It is written in the Prophets: ‘They will all be taught by God.’ Everyone who has heard the Father and learned from him comes to me.	Mu majambo y’abavugishwa n’Imana handitswe, ngo Bose bazoba abigishijwe n’Imana. Uwumvise ivya Data wese akavyiga, aza kuri jewe.
King Solomon sent to Tyre and brought Huram,	Bukeye Salomo atuma i Tiro guhamagaza Hiramu.
Then Reuben, Gad and the half-tribe of Manasseh replied to the heads of the clans of Israel:	Nukw Abareyubeni n’Abagadi n’igihimba c’umuryango w’ Abamanase, bishura abo bakuru b’imiryango y’Abisirayeli,
and Zadok, a brave young warrior, with 22 officers from his family;	haza na Sadoki, yar’ umusore w’umuhizi, azanana n’abagabisha mirongwibiri na babiri bo mu nzu ya sekuruza.
If a man takes a wife and, after sleeping with her, dislikes her	Umuntu ni yarongora umugeni, akaryamana na we, agaheza akamwanka,
For them I sanctify myself, that they too may be truly sanctified.	kandi nanje niyeza kubgabo, kugira ngo na bo babe bejejwe mu kuri.
but a temporary resident or a hired worker may not eat it.	Inyambukīra cank’ umucangero ntibaze babiryeko.
When he went in and stood before his master, Elisha asked him, “Where have you been, Gehazi?” “Your servant didn’t go anywhere,” Gehazi answered.	Maz’ araza, yinjira aho shebuja ari. Elisa aramubaza, at’ Uvuye hehe ga Gehazi? Uwundi at’ Eka nta ho nagiye.
from Dan, ready for battle—28,600;	Abo mu Badani bazi uburyo bgo gutondesha urugamba bār’ ibihumbi mirongwibiri n’umunani n’amajana atandatu.
With a blinding flash he destroys the stronghold and brings the fortified city to ruin.	ni we atuma agatikizo gasūmira abanyenkomezi, kagashika no ku bihome bikomeye.
Make every effort to keep the unity of the Spirit through the bond of peace.	mushishikaye kuzigamisha ubumwe buva kuri Mpwemu umugozi w’amahoro.
This is the account of the family of Aaron and Moses at the time the Lord spoke to Moses at Mount Sinai.	Uru ni rwo ruvyaro Aroni na Mose bari bafise igihe Uhoraho yavuganira na Mose ku musozi Sinayi.
so David inquired of God again, and God answered him, “Do not go directly after them, but circle around them and attack them in front of the poplar trees.	Dawidi yongera gusiguza Imana; maz’ Imana iramwishura, iti Ntudūge ngo mubīsanganize, ariko mubaturuke inyuma, mubaserukire aharābana n’ibiti vyitwa imibaka.
Mordecai the Jew was second in rank to King Xerxes, preeminent among the Jews, and held in high esteem by his many fellow Jews, because he worked for the good of his people and spoke up for the welfare of all the Jews.	Kuk’ uwo Muyuda Moridekayi, uwar’ amurengeye yar’ umwami Ahasuwerusi gusa, kandi yar’ agahambaye mu Bayuda, yashimwa n’ab’i wabo uko bangana; kandi yama yendeza ubgoko bgabo ivyiza, akavuga ibihesha uruvyaro rwabo amahoro.
If you falter in a time of trouble, how small is your strength!	Ni wadendebukirwa ku musi w’ivyago Inkomezi zawe zizoba zari nke.
Now Boaz, with whose women you have worked, is a relative of ours. Tonight he will be winnowing barley on the threshing floor.	None ntihariho Bowazi wo mu muryango wacu, umwe wabana n’abigeme biwe? Umve iri joro aragosōreza sayiri kuri ya mbuga.
Then David set out and went to the place where Saul had camped. He saw where Saul and Abner son of Ner, the commander of the army, had lain down. Saul was lying inside the camp, with the army encamped around him.	aca ava hasi, aja ha handi Sauli yar’ ashagaje. Nuko Dawidi abona ikiryamo ca Sauli aho kiri, n’ica Abuneri mwene Neri, umugabisha w’ingabo ziwe; kand’ ikiryamo ca Sauli cari hagati y’aho bārāza imikogote y’intambara, ingabo na zo zari zimushagaje irya n’ino.
they, too, will drink the wine of God’s fury, which has been poured full strength into the cup of his wrath. They will be tormented with burning sulfur in the presence of the holy angels and of the Lamb.	uwo na we azonywa kuri vino, ni yo burake bg’Imana, yiteguwe idafunguye mu gakarabo k’uburake bgayo. Kand’ azobabarizwa n’umuriro n’amazuku imbere y’abamarayika bera n’imbere ya wa Mwagazi.
But when the apostles Barnabas and Paul heard of this, they tore their clothes and rushed out into the crowd, shouting:	Arikw intumwa, Barunaba na Paulo, bavyumvise, bītantamurirakw impuzu zabo, bītera mu bantu, basemerera,
The high places, however, were not removed, and the people still had not set their hearts on the God of their ancestors.	Mugabo ibitabo vyo ku mpinga z’imisozi vyo ntivyākūrwaho; kand’ abantu ntibāribgahereze imitima ku Mana ya ba sekuruza.
and in this way all Israel will be saved. As it is written: “The deliverer will come from Zion; he will turn godlessness away from Jacob.	Ni vyaba birtyo, Abisirayeli bose bazokizwa, nk’uko handitswe, ngw I Siyoni hazova Umurokozi, Azokūra muri Yakobo ukutubaha Imana;
They captured fortified cities and fertile land; they took possession of houses filled with all kinds of good things, wells already dug, vineyards, olive groves and fruit trees in abundance. They ate to the full and were well-nourished; they reveled in your great goodness.	Batsinda ibisagara bikomeye bifise inzitiro z’amabuye, bashikīra n’intāra zimera cane, binjira n’amazu yuzuye ivyiza vyose, bashikīra n’ ivyobo vyimbiwe kubīka amazi, n’imirima y’imizabibu n’iy’ imyelayo, n’ibindi biti vyama vy’isinzi, bararya barahāga baravyibuha, bidibamira mu vyiza vyose wabahaye.
And he is then also the father of the circumcised who not only are circumcised but who also follow in the footsteps of the faith that our father Abraham had before he was circumcised.	kand’ abe na sekuruza w’abākebge, batākebge gusa, ariko bagera ikirenge mu c’ukwo kwizera kwa sogokuruza Aburahamu, ukwo yar’ afise, atarakebga.
He replied, “The man they call Jesus made some mud and put it on my eyes. He told me to go to Siloam and wash. So I went and washed, and then I could see.”	Na we arabishura, ati Wa muntu yitwa Yesu yavurunze utwondo, atunsīga ku maso, arambgira, ati Ja kuri Silowamu wiyuhagire; nuko ndagenda, ndiyuhagira, ndahumūka.
Then the Israelites asked, “Who from all the tribes of Israel has failed to assemble before the Lord ?” For they had taken a solemn oath that anyone who failed to assemble before the Lord at Mizpah was to be put to death.	Maz’ Abisirayeli barabazanya, bati Ni ba nde bo mu miryango y’Abisirayeli boba batādūze ngo baje mw ikoraniro ry’ Uhoraho? Kuko bāri bararahiye indahiro ikomeye k’umuntu atazodūga gushengerera Uhoraho i Misipa atazobura gupfa.
Then Jehu and Jehonadab son of Rekab went into the temple of Baal. Jehu said to the servants of Baal, “Look around and see that no one who serves the Lord is here with you—only servants of Baal.”	Maze Yehu yinjirana na Yehonadabu mwene Rekabu mu ngoro ya Bayali, abarira abasenga Bayali, ati Ni musuzume murābe, ntihagire n’umwe mu bantu b’ Uhoraho yoba ari ngaha, atar’ abasanzwe basenga Bayali bonyene.
I will set fire to Egypt; Pelusium will writhe in agony. Thebes will be taken by storm; Memphis will be in constant distress.	Na Egiputa nzohanda umuriro; muri Sini hazoba kwembemba kwinshi, no muri No hazosangangurwa; kand’ i Nofu hazotsindwa n’abansi ku murango w’amaminangohe.
until the Lord gives rest to your fellow Israelites as he has to you, and they too have taken over the land that the Lord your God is giving them across the Jordan. After that, each of you may go back to the possession I have given you.”	Nti Muze mushitse aho Uhoraho azohēra bagenzi banyu gushika hasi nk’uko namwe yabibahaye, bakinjira igihugu Uhoraho Imana yanyu yabahaye hakurya ya Yorodani; nti Maze muze mubone kugaruka, umuntu wese mw ishamvu yiwe nabahaye.
“We—the priests, the Levites and the people—have cast lots to determine when each of our families is to bring to the house of our God at set times each year a contribution of wood to burn on the altar of the Lord our God, as it is written in the Law.	Kandi twebge abaherezi n’Abalewi n’ abantu dupfinze ubupfindo ngo tumenye ukw amashikanwa y’ inkwi azohora azanwa mu ngoro y’Imana yacu, ukw amazu ya ba sogokuruza akurikirana ku mbu zacu; uk’ umwaka utashe izo nkwi n’izo gukoma icoto ku gicaniro c’Uhoraho Imana yacu, nk’uko vyanditswe mu vyagezwe.
Moses reported this to the Israelites, but they did not listen to him because of their discouragement and harsh labor.	Mose abibarira Abisirayeli nk’uko nyene; ariko ntibāmwumvira kubg’ ubgihebe bgo mu mitima, no kubg’ ubuja bārimwo bg’agahahazo.
When he saw Peter and John about to enter, he asked them for money.	Uyo abonye Petero na Yohana bagira binjire mu rusengero, arabasēga ngo bamuhe.
David said to Abishai, “Now Sheba son of Bikri will do us more harm than Absalom did. Take your master’s men and pursue him, or he will find fortified cities and escape from us.”	Dawidi araheza abarira Abishayi, ati Sheba mwene Bikuri agiye kutugirira nabi kuruta Abusalomu; abe ari wewe ujana ingabo zanje, umukurikirane, kugira ngo ntiyegukire ibisagara vyubakiwe inzitiro z’amabuye, akaba atujanye.
He looked David over and saw that he was little more than a boy, glowing with health and handsome, and he despised him.	Nuko wa Mufilisitiya abonye Dawidi, aramwitegereza, aramukēngēra, kuko yar’ akir’ umwana w’umusore, kandi yar’ inzobe w’umunyakarānga.
Then I saw another angel coming up from the east, having the seal of the living God. He called out in a loud voice to the four angels who had been given power to harm the land and the sea:	Kandi mbona umumarayika wundi adūga, ava i burasirazuba, afise ikidomesho c’Imana nzima, asemerera n’ijwi rirenga, abarira ba bamarayika bane bahawe kwonona isi n’ikiyaga,
“I have come to bring fire on the earth, and how I wish it were already kindled!	Naje guta umuriro mw isi, non’ iyaba war’ umaze gufatwa, mba nkigomba iki kandi?
As they were walking along the road, a man said to him, “I will follow you wherever you go.”	Bariko baragenda mu nzira, umuntu aramubgira, ati Ndagukurikira ah’ uja hose.
